GSD36mvir_sau:725: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:727: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:740: daiva udayavyāpinyabhidhānaṃ tvanuvādaḥ“yajñopavītī hi devebhyo dohayati“itivat stuttyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:742: yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya udayaṃ yāti bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:744: yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya astaṃ yāti divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:754: vṛddhyādītyādipade vātadguṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā yajñopavītādidaivadharmavatāṃ daivaśrāddhādīnāṃ pitryāṇāṃ ca putravṛddhini mittavaśenāniyatakālakatvenānirṇeyatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:756: yugmavākyānāṃ tu mithovirodhe tadaviṣayībhūtatithiṣu ca daśamyādiṣu śuklakṛṣṇavākhyādvyavasthā apekṣitavighānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:758: na copavāsa eva śuklakṛṣṇavākyādvyavasthā tadatirikte tu
GSD36mvir_sau:760: tatra upavāsaprakrame 'pi“tayā karmāṇi kurvīta“iti bahuvacanena karmamātre tadavagamāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:761: yattu devalavākyaṃ tat yugmavākyādinā pūrvasyāmuttarasyāṃ vā grāhyatvena prāptāyāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:762: tattadaharbhāge tattithyabhāve titheḥ pradhānatvādaharbhāgasya ca guṇabhūtatvād guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyena
GSD36mvir_sau:766: prācyāstu dvi tīyādikayugmānāmiti pūrvārddhe na vivādaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:770: hāsavṛddhī candrasya tayorādirāśrayaḥ kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣau tatsambandhinī codanā śuklakṛṣṇapakṣavākyamityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:771: athavā hrāsa vṛddhī kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣau tāvādirnirmittabhūtā yasyāścodanāyā nirṇayasye tyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:778: yadyapi śuklakṛṣṇavākyaṃ daśamyādiviṣaye daive 'pi pravartata iti nāsya pitryamātraviṣayatvaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:787: yadapi“karmaṇo yasya yaḥ kāla“iti vākye “hrāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam';
GSD36mvir_sau:792: kiñca pūrvārddhe yugmavākyaṃ daiva eveti niyamavidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:793: upakramānurodhenottarārddhe 'pi pitrya eva śuklakṛṣṇavākyamiti niyamaucityāttadatikrameṇa pitrye śuklakṛṣṇavākyamevetiniyamakaraṇe vairūṣyāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:794: etena yat vivekatithitatvayorekoddiṣṭādītyādipadena pārvaṇagrahaṇāt vṛddhyādītyādipadena kṣayasāmyayogrīhaṇāt hāsavṛddhyādītyādipadena “yayā
GSD36mvir_sau:795: itivākyasya grahaṇādekoddiṣṭe paviṇe ca tithivṛddhikṣayasāmyaprayuktasandehe sati śuklakṛṣṇapakṣavākyāstamayavākyābhyāṃ krameṇa nirṇaya ityuktaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:798: kiñca vṛddhyādāvitipadena sandehapratipādanaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvanirṇayavākvānāṃ sandeha eva pravṛtteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:799: teṣu satsvapi karmakālavyāpto satyāṃ sandehābhāvānna sandehotthāpakatvamapi teṣāṃ kintu tithikhaṇḍatvasyaivetyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:800: yā ca yayāstamityādeḥ pārvaṇaviṣayatvena vyavasthā sāpyayuktā /
GSD36mvir_sau:804: ityādivākyaparyālocanayā dvidhāvibhaktadināparāhnaviṣayatvāt sakalapitryaviṣayatve 'pi na kāpi kṣatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:805: ekoddiṣṭāderapi hi kutapapūrvārddha upakrame 'pi tādṛśāparāhṇa eva samāpyamānatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:809: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:817: kṛṣṇapakṣe 'parāhṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:819: tasmāt yayāstamityādi na pārvaṇe 'stamayavyāpitithividhāyakaṃ kintu sarvapitrye kharvadarpavākyaprāptāstamayavyāpitvānuvādamātram /
GSD36mvir_sau:822: sā tithiḥ sakalā jñeyā pitrye 'rthe cāparāhṇikī //
GSD36mvir_sau:826: yugmavākyavirodhe tadaviṣayatithiṣu ca śuklakṛṣṇavākyānnirṇaya iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:827: yatra pūrvaviddhīyā grāhyatvaṃ yugmādivākyādavagataṃ yathā ddhitīyāviddhāyāstṛtīyāyāstatra tṛtīyāyā dvitīyādināstamayāt pūrvaṃ trimuhūrtāyāstato 'dhikāyā vā sattve evāgrāhyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:829: evaṃ yatra uttaraviddhāyā grāhyatvaṃ yugmādivākyādavagataṃ yathā tṛtīyāviddhāyā dvitīyāyāstatra
GSD36mvir_sau:830: dvitīyāyāstṛtīyādine udayādurdhvaṃ trimuhūrtāyāstato 'dhikāyā vā sattve eva tat na tu tato nyūnatve /
GSD36mvir_sau:834: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:841: na tu havye yodayavyāpinī kavye yāstamayavyāpinī tasyā dvitrimūhūrtasattoddeśyaviśeṣaṇasyābivakṣitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:843: yāṃ prāpyāstamupaityarkaḥ sā cet syāt trimuhūrtagā /
GSD36mvir_sau:847: trimūhūrtā na kartavyā yā tithiḥ kṣayagāminī /
GSD36mvir_sau:851: vastutastu pūrvottarārddhayorekavākayatārthamuttarārddhagatāpiśabdānu ṣaṅgeṇa dvimuhūrtānukalpastutyarthatvameva yuktaṃ na tu svatantro niṣedho vā kyabhedāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:852: etenāyaṃ svatantro niṣedhaḥ atastatra caturthamuhūrtasparśinī grāhyā iti mādhavoktamapyapāstam /
GSD36mvir_sau:853: evaṃ yatra pūrvaviddhottaraviddhā vā niṣidhyate tatrāpi yadi pūrvatithirvodhikā yathā pratipat dvitīyāyāstatra pratipadūdayānantaraṃ trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā vottaratithervedhikā,
GSD36mvir_sau:854: yadi uttaratithirvedhikā yathā dvitīyā pratipadastatra dvitīyā pratipadidane 'stamayātprāk trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā vā na tato nyūneti /
GSD36mvir_sau:862: ityādīni trimuhūrtanyūnāyā api sampūrṇatvapratipādakāni tānyaṣṭākapāla āgneyādhikaraṇanyāyena trimuhūrtavedhastāvakāni stokāpītyapiśabdopādānādityalam
GSD36mvir_sau:864: upavāsādau tu yā pūrvadine śuddhā satyuttaradine nāsti trimuhūrtanyūnāsti vā tatrāyugmāpi pūrvaiva trimuhūrtanyūnāyā yuṣmaśāstrāviṣayatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:865: yā tu pūrvadine trimuhūrtaviddhottaradine trimūhūrtā tato 'dhikā vā tatra yugmavākyānnirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:866: na cottarāyā yugmavākyavi ṣayabhūtatve 'pi pūrvaiva kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:868: upavāsasya ca saṅkalparūpatvāt tasya ca“prātaḥ saṅkalpayedvidvān“itivacanena prātaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:870: hemādrimadanaratnayostūpavāse tu yatra pūrvatithividdhottarā niṣiddhā yathā pratipadviddhā
GSD36mvir_sau:871: dvitīyā tatra trimuhūrtanyūnayāpi pratipadā viddhā dvitīyā yadyuttaradine trimuhūrtanyūnāpyasti tadottaraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:872: ghaṭikārghaṃ tribhāgaṃ vā svalpaṃ vā dūṣayottithim /
GSD36mvir_sau:882: udaye sā tithirgrāhyā viparītā tu paitṛke //
GSD36mvir_sau:884: pūrṇā ityeva mantavyā prasūtā nodayaṃ vinā //
GSD36mvir_sau:886: yadā tūttaradine svalpāpi na labhyate tadā niṣiddhapūrvatithividdhāpyupoṣyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:892: pañcamuhūrtaviddhāyā ekādaśryā grāhyatvaṃ ca yadā daśamī pañcamuhūrtā paradine ekādaśī dvimuhūrtā dvādaśī ca kṣayaṃ gatā tadā jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:896: yatra tu pūrvaviddhā grāhyetyuktaṃ tatra trimuhūrtavedha eveti viśeṣa iti yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:922: daivāntareṣu tu kṛṣṇāyā uttaraviddhātvaṃ śuklāyāśca pūrvaviddhātvamavivādameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:923: idaṃ cīpavāse daivāntareṣu ca śuklāyāḥ pūrvaviddhātvaṃ na sāyaṃ trimūhurttasattve kintu āparāhṇikyā eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:928: vacanāntaraprāptāṃ pitrya āparāhṇikīmuddiśya sammukhītvasya lāghavena vidhānādityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:932: daivaṃ karma tayā kāryaṃ pitryaṃ ca manurabravīt //
GSD36mvir_sau:938: yadā tu sammukhyāparāhṇikī na labhyate tadottaraiva“pratipat sadvitīyā syāt“itisāmānyavacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:942: caitre māsi jagata brahmā sasarja prathame 'hani /
GSD36mvir_sau:943: śuklapakṣe samagraṃ tu tadā sūryodaye sati //
GSD36mvir_sau:962: āśvinasya site pakṣe pratipatsu śubhe dine //
GSD36mvir_sau:967: ityāparāhṇikyā grāhyatvamuktaṃ tat paradine pratipado 'bhāve jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:968: pūrvaviddhā tu yā śuklā bhavet pratipadāśvinī /
GSD36mvir_sau:979: ubhayatra tathātvātathātvayostu vatsarādau vasantā dāviti vacanāt pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:991: sā ca sarvaṃdaivakāryeṣu śuklā parā kṛṣṇā tu pūrvā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1000: kecittu yugmāgnīti vākye“caturdaśyā ca pūrṇimā“iti paurṇamāsīsamabhivyāhārāt sarvaṃ vākyaṃ svata eva śuklapakṣaviṣayamiti na śuklapakṣe ityasya
GSD36mvir_sau:1011: iti nāradīyavākye tṛtīyāyā dvitīyādūṣakatvābhidhānadvārā upavāse paraviddhadvitīyāyā niṣedhāt sā upavāsātiriktadaivaviṣayaiva syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1012: viṣṇudharmottaravākyena ca upavāsa eva punaḥ parānvitāvidhāne sati vidhiniṣedhayorvirodhe sati śuklakṛṣṇavākyābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1013: tathācātra upavāsagrahaṇasya upalakṣaṇamātraparatayā paraviddhāyāḥ pūrvaviddhāyāśca śuklakṛṣṇapakṣavyavasthayā sarvadaivaviṣayatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:1014: evaṃ sarvatra sāmānyato nirṇīte 'rthe viśeṣato niṣedhe punarviśeṣavidhānasya idameva prayojanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1015: yacca kṛṣṇadvitīyāyāḥ pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvamuktaṃ tat pūrvāhṇasaṃsparśe satyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1017: paurvāhṇikī ca kartavyā dvitīyā tādṛśī vibho/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1022: yatra pūrvaviddhatvaṃ prāptaṃ tatraiva paurvahṇikatvavidhānāt kṛṣṇapakṣaviṣayatvameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1023: asmiṃśca vākhye yadyapi pūrvāhṇāparāhṇaśabdadarśanāt dvedhā vibhāga eva pratibhāsate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1026: anhaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvāhṇa ityevaṃ vyutpattyā prātaḥ-kālasambandhitvameva vyākhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1027: nanvevaṃ vyākhyāne etasyāḥ śuddhatvādeva grāhyatvaṃ prāptamiti vacanāmidamanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1029: etadvacanābhāve hi yā pūrvedyuḥ sarvaṃ prātaḥ kālaṃ parityajya pravṛttā paredyuśca trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā vā sā kṛṣṇapakṣagatatvena pūrvaiva grāhyā syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1031: paredyuśca paraviddhāvacanānāṃ yugmāgnītyādīnāṃ pravṛtteḥ parasyā eva grāhyatvasiddhirityasya vacanasya prayojanaṃ vyatirekataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati
GSD36mvir_sau:1032: nanu yugmādivākyānāṃ śuklakṛṣṇavākyābhyāṃ śuklakṛṣṇaviṣayatvena vyavasthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe pravṛttiḥ ? ucyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1034: yadā tu tāni vacanāni paurvāhvikītyanena vi śeṣavacanena sambadhyante yā pratipadyuktā
GSD36mvir_sau:1035: grāhyā sā paurvāhṇikītyevamarthatayā tadā etādṛśānāmeva yugmāgnivākyavirodhāt śuklakṛṣṇapakṣaparatayā vyavasthāpanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1036: yā tu sarvaṃ prātaḥ kālaṃ parityajya pravṛttā paradine ca trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā ca tasyāṃ pūrvaviddhāgrāhyatvavacanābhāvāt bhavedeva yugmavākyānāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:1038: yā tu paredyustrimuhūrtanyūnā sā pūrvāhṇasaṃsparśābhāve 'pi pūrvaiva grāhyā sandehābhāvāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:1047: śrāvaṇādimāsacatuṣṭayāsitapakṣadvitīyāsu aśūnyaśayanākhye vrate candrodayavyāpinī grāhyā tasya candrodaye vidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1054: yāmupoṣya na vaidhavyaṃ strī prayāti narādhipa/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1067: prathamā śrāvaṇe māsi māsi bhādre tathā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1069: śrāvaṇe kaluṣā nāma tathā bhādre ca gīrmatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1071: ityuktvā grathamāyāṃ vrataṃ dvitīyāyāṃ sarasvatīpūjāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ śrāddhamuktvā caturthyāmuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:1090: caturthīsaṃyutā yā ca sā tṛtīyā phalapradā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1096: dvitīyayā tu yā viddhā tṛtīyā na kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:1102: tṛtīyā tu na kartavyā dvitīyopahatā vibho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1103: dvitīyayā yutāṃ tāṃ tu yaḥ karoti narādhamaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1107: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ kālasūtraṃ bhayaṅkaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:1111: tṛtīyā tu na kartavyā dvitīyāsaṃyutā tithiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1112: yā karoti vimūḍhā strī puruṣo vā śikhidhvaja/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1117: sā tṛtīyā na kartavyā kartavyā gaṇasaṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1120: kāryā dvitīyayā sārddhaṃ na tṛtīyā kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:1122: atra“rambhākyāṃ varjayitvā“iti“vihāyaikāṃ tu rambhākhyāṃ“iti ca śravaṇādrambhāvrate dvitīyāyuktatṛtīyā grāhyeti gamyate sākṣādvidhānāccayathoktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:1125: kṛṣṇāṣṭamī ca bhūtā ca kartavyā sammukhī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1133: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca tā upoṣyāḥ parānvitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1136: ityādivacaneṣu upavāsavyatiriktakārye 'pi paraviddhātvasahkīrttanāt ekādaśyaṣṭamītivākyaṃ tu tithiviśeṣe upavāse paraviddhatvaṃ pratipādayati
GSD36mvir_sau:1152: śuklapakṣagatāyāstu tasyā eva titheryasyāmabhyudito raviriti caturthīyutāyā grāhyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1153: vastutastu na śuklakṛṣṇabhedena vidhiniṣedhayorviṣaya vyavasthā yuktimatī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1154: tathāsati dvitīyāyuktatṛtīyānaṣedhakānāṃ caturthīyuktatṛtīyāvidhāyakānāṃ ca prāgudāhṛtānāṃ bahūnāṃ saṅkocāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1156: rambhāvrataparityāgena dvitīyāyutatṛtīyāniṣedhānāṃ caturthīyutatṛtīyāvidhīnāṃ ca śuklapakṣe 'pi pravṛtteraṅgīkaraṇāt“anyeṣu sarvakāryeṣu“iti vacanaṃ ca bhavatpakṣe bādhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1157: kevalaṃ yugmavākyameva tu rambhāvrataviṣayatvenāsmatpakṣe saṅkocyate iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1158: ayaṃ ca dvitīyāvedhaḥ svalpo 'pi tyājyo na tu muhūrtatrayaparimita eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1161: caturthīyutā svalpāpi grāhyā na tu trimuhūrtatvakarmakālatvādaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1164: vratāntareṣu tu niṣedhyadvitīyāvedhādestrimuhūrtatvamādaraṇīyameva yadā tūttaradine alpāpi tṛtīyā na labhyate tadā sarvavrateṣu dvitīyāyuktāpi grāhyaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1165: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1166: pūrvaviddhāpi kartavyā yadi na syāt pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:1168: yadā tu pūrvadine tṛtīyā śuddhā satī uttaradine varddhate tadā śuddhāmapi tyaktvā
GSD36mvir_sau:1169: caturthīyuktaiva grāhyā“gaṇayuktā praśasyata“ityādivacanaiḥ caturthīyuktāyāḥ prāśastyāvagamāditi kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:1172: tṛtīyāyāḥ dvitīyāvedhacaturthīvedhayoḥ satoḥ pūrvaviddhā vā grāhyā uttaraviddhā vā
GSD36mvir_sau:1173: grāhyā ityevaṃ sandehe sati nirṇāyakatvāt etādṛśaviṣaye ca titheḥ pūrṇatvena sandehānudayāt
GSD36mvir_sau:1176: rambhāvra tārikteṣu upavāsādisakaladevakāryeṣu na dvitīyāviddhā tṛtīyā grāhyā kintu caturthīṃyuktā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1177: gaurīvrateṣu svalpayāpi dvitīyayā yuktā varjyā na dvitīyāyāstrimuhūrtatvādaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1178: tathā gaurīvrata eva atrimuhūrtāpi caturthīyuktā grāhyā vratāntareṣu vedhyavedhakayostṛtīyādvitīyayostrimuhūrtatvamāśrayaṇīyameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1179: yadā tu svalpāpi tṛtīyottaradine na labhyate tadā dvitīyāviddhāpi sarvavrateṣu grāhyaiva
GSD36mvir_sau:1180: rambhāvrate tu dvitīyāyuktaiva grāhyā tadalābhe ca dvitīyāyuktāpi śudrādhikā punaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:1191: caturthīsaṃyutā yā tu tṛtīyā sā phalapradā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1196: atra gaṇanāthetiviśeṣaṇasāmarthyāt gaṇanāthavrate tṛtīyāyuktā caturthī grāhyeti gamyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1204: si dvivināyakavrate ca madhyāhnavyāpinī caturthā prāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1209: yadi paredyureva madhyāhnavyāptiḥ tadaiva pare 'hani pañcamīviddhetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1213: yadā tu pūrvaṃdine mātṛviddhā paredyureva ca madhyāhnavyāpinī bhavati tadā mātṛviddhātvaguṇayogena paradina eva vināyakavratamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1218: viṣāṇiṃ tasya naśyanti na taṃ hiṃsanti pannagāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1221: yadā pūrvedyu reva madhyāhnavyāptiḥ tadaiva pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1223: pañcamyā nāgatithitvena tadyogasya prāśastyāt kecittu nāgadevatāvrate 'pi vināyakavratavat tṛtīyāyuktā grāhyetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1228: tatra hi caturthī tṛtīyāyuktā grāhyetyeyāvat pratīyate na punarnāgacaturthī tṛtīyāyukteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1230: tena nāgadevatāvrate dinadvaye madhyāhnabyāptyādinā caturthīgrahaṇasandehe yugmavākyāt paraiva grāhyā,
GSD36mvir_sau:1231: yadā tu pūrvadina eva madhyāhnavabyāptistadā karmakālaśāstrasya prābalyāt pūrvā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1236: gaurīvrate tu tṛtīyāyuktacaturthī grāhyā tṛtīyāyā gaurīdevatātvena tadyogasya prāśastyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1241: nidrāṃ ratiṃ śivāṃ bhadrāṃ kīrtiṃ medhāṃ sarasvatīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:1242: prajñāṃ tuṣṭiṃ tathā kāntiṃ tatraivāhani pūjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1247: pūjāṃ kṛtvā labhet siddhiṃ saubhāgyaṃ ca naraḥ kramāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:1251: caturthī varadā nāma gaurī tatra supūjitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1253: jayā ca yadi sampūrṇā caturthī hasate punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1254: jayā saiva hi kartavyā nāgaviddhāṃ na kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1255: iti vacanamapi gaurīvrate kaimutyanyāyena tṛtīyāyuktacaturthīṃ grāhyatayā pratipādayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:1257: yadā paradine caturthīhrāsena pañcamī viddhā bhavati pūrvadine punarjayā sampūrṇadinavyāpinī
GSD36mvir_sau:1258: bhavati tadā śuddhā tṛtīyāpi caturthīvrate grāhyā na tu doṣabhūyiṣṭhā pañcamīviddhā caturthīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1259: na tvidaṃ vacanaṃ caturthīvrate śuddhatṛtīyāṃ grāhyatayā pratipādayati pañcamīviddhacaturthīniṣedhaparatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1262: yadā pūrvadine madhyāhne jayā sampūrṇā uttaradine punarhāsavaśāccaturthī madhyāhvādarvāgeva
GSD36mvir_sau:1263: samāpyate tadā dinadvaye karmakāle caturthyā abhāve sati kiṃ dinaṃ grāhyāmatyapekṣāyāmidaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:1265: jayāyā madhyānhavyāpitve 'pi jayāyuktā pūrvaiṃva caturthī grāhyā na tu nāgaviddhā parā caturthī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1267: vatsasya pūjā śivarātriretāḥ parā vinighnanti nṛpaṃ sarāṣṭram //
GSD36mvir_sau:1268: itipurāṇamuñcayavacanādapi gaurīvrate tṛtīyāyuktā caturthī grāhyeti pratīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1272: kecittu śuklacaturthī pañcamīyutā kṛṣṇacaturthī tṛtīyāyutā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1276: saṅkaṣṭacaturthī tu candrodayavyāpinī grāhyā tasyāstatkalpe candrodayakālatvavidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1279: pañcamī upavāsādisakaladaivakarmasu pūrvayutā grāhyā yugabhūtānāmiti yuramavākyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1281: pañcamī ca tathā kāryā caturthīsaṃyutā vibho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1284: pañcamī tu caturthyā tu kāryā ṣaṣṭhyā na saṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1288: iti vaśiṣṭhavākye parigaṇitavyatiriktāyāḥ paraśabdasaṃgṛhītāyāḥ pañcabhyā upavāse pūrvasaṃyuktatvābhidhānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1291: iti śivarahasyasaurapurāṇayostithiprāntasyopavāse aṅgatvābhidhānāttithidvaidhe paraviddhā tithirupavāse grāhyeti pratīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1292: tathāpyasya sāmānyavidhitvāt prāgudāhṛtatattadviśeṣavacanaiḥ upavāse pañcamyāḥ pūrvayuktatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1293: etadevābhipretya prāyaḥ prānta iti prāyaḥśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1295: pañcamī tu prakartavyā ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā tu nārada/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1305: caturthyā saṃyutā kāryā pañcamī parayā na tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:1306: deve karmaṇi pitrye ca śuklapakṣe tathāsite //
GSD36mvir_sau:1309: yathā pitrye aparāhṇādyanurodhena ṣaṣṭhīyuktapañcamīṃ parityajya caturthīsaṃyutā pañcamī upādīyate tathā daive 'pīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1310: naca daive pūrvāhṇasya karmakālatvāt karmakālaśāstrasya ca prabalatvāt parayuktaiva pañcamī upādeyeti śaṅkanīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1311: pūrvodāhṛtatattadviśeṣavacanānāṃ prabalataratvāt etādṛśa eva ca viṣaye“yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya“itisākalyavacanamupapadyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1313: ata evopavāsa eva pañcamī pūrvayutānyatra daive 'pyuttaraivetyaṣyabhidhānamayuktamava /
GSD36mvir_sau:1314: daive kammeṇīti daivamātre pṛrvayutatvapratīteḥ parayuktapañcamīvacanānāṃ skandopavāsavacanena viṣayadānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1318: caturthīsaṃyutā yā ca sā tṛtīyā phalapradā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1319: pañcamī ca prakartavyā ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā ca nārada/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1321: tataśca yugmaśāstrayorvirodhe vyavasthāpakavacanāntarasyāpokṣitatvāt yuktā śuklakṛṣṇa śāstreṇa byavastheti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1323: prayuktā śuklakṛṣṇaśāstreṇa vyavasthā tāṃ nirākartumeva hārītavacane “śuklapakṣe tathāsita'; ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1324: tena viruddhamāpastambādiyugmaśāstraṃ skandopavāsaviṣayaṃ yuktamiti tasmāt pūrvoktaiva vyavasthā jyāyasī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1327: sā ca skandavratātirikte sarvatra daivakārye saptamīyuktā grāhya ṣaṇmunyoritiyugmavākyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1333: daive karmaṇi tāmantyāṃ pitrye pūrveṇa saṃyutām //
GSD36mvir_sau:1334: iti sumantunā pañcamīviddhāniṣedhapuraḥsaraṃ daive karmaṇi antyaḥśabdoditāyāḥ saptamīviddhāyā vidhānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1335: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭhī śivaviddhātu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1338: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭhī rudraviddho divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1339: kāmaviddho bhaved viṣṇurna grāhyāste tu vāsarāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1350: iti skandapurāṇavacanāt ṣaṇmuhūrtātmako na tu sāmānyatastrimuhūrtāmakaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1357: idaṃ vacanaṃ yā dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamyā viddhā ṣaṣṭhī sāmānyataḥ sarvadaivakāryeṣu niṣiddhā tasyā eva skandavrate pratiprasavārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:1358: tathāca skandavrate 'pi dvādaśanāḍīviddhāyā niṣiddhatvāt tato nyūnapañcamīyutaiva grāhyeti jñātavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1360: kiñca“nāgo dvādaśanāḍībhiḥ“iti vākyaṃ na sarvatra dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamyā uttaratithidūṣakatvābhidhānaparaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:1361: tadabhidhāne gauravāt kintu yatra dūṣakatvaṃ prāptaṃ tatraiva dūṣakatvānuvādena dvādaśanāḍīmitatvavidhānaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1362: skandavrate tu pūrvayutāyā eva grāhyatvābhidhānānna dūṣakatvamiti dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamīviddhāyāmapi tatkāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1364: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1367: pūrvedyuḥ ṣaṇmuhūrtapañcamīviddhāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāstrimuhūrtādhikakṣayāsambhavena uttaradine 'pi trimuhūrtāyā avaśyambhāvitvāt “yadi na syāt';
GSD36mvir_sau:1369: kintu ekabhaktādikāle madhyānhādau pare 'hani yadi na syāttadā yā skandavratātirikte savartra niṣiddhā pūrvaviddhā sāpi kartavyeti pratiprasavārtham
GSD36mvir_sau:1382: sā ca sarvatra daive pūrvaviddhaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1389: pañcamī saptamī caiva daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1395: iti upavāsa eva viddhāyā niṣedhāttatraiva pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvamastu /
GSD36mvir_sau:1401: ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā saptamī ca kartavyā tāta/ sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1402: ṣaṣṭhī ca saptamī yatra tatra sannihito raviḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1409: yadā tu pūrvedyuḥ astamayottaraṃ pravṛttā paredyuśca tithikṣayavaśena trimuhūrtayā aṣṭamyā viddhatvāt śuddhā pūrvaviddhā vā na labhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1410: tadā“guṇe tvanyāyyakalpanā“itinyāyāt guṇānurodhena pradhānatyāgāyogāt niṣedhamatikramyāpi va canābhāve 'pi guṇakālatvena aṣṭamīviddhāyā evopādānaṃ nyāyyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1415: vaiśākhaśuklasaptamyāṃ gaṅgāpūjā tatra madhyānhavyāpinī grāhyā śiṣṭācārāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1418: sā ca vratamātre śuklā parā kṛṣṇā pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1422: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na kutracit //
GSD36mvir_sau:1449: dūrvāṣṭamī tu sā jñeyā nottarā sā vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:1452: muhūrte rauhiṇe 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvā vā yadi vā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1453: dūrvāṣṭamī tu sā kāryā jyeṣṭhāṃ mūlaṃ ca varjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1454: iti parābhidhānaṃ tat pūrvadine jyeṣṭhādiyoge veditavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1460: iyaṃ ca kanyārke agastyodaye ca na kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1462: siṃhārka eva kartavyā na kanyārke kadācana //
GSD36mvir_sau:1466: vaidhavyaṃ pūrvaśokaṃ ca daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:1470: kanyārke yāṣṭamī śuklā jyeṣṭharkṣe mahatī smṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1475: navamyā saha kāryā syādaṣṭamī nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1482: tasmin haviṣyaṃ pūjā ca nyūnā cet pūrvavāsare //
GSD36mvir_sau:1491: ititallakṣaṇārthe skāndavacane tatreti saptamyā nirdiṣṭāyā aṣṭamyāstatra “jayāṃ juhuyāt'; (a 0 3 pā 04 adhi 0 13)
GSD36mvir_sau:1496: pūrvā vā paraviddhā vā grāhyā candrodaye sadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1499: ūrdhvaṃgāminī = candrodayordhvagāminī trimuhūrtā cet parato 'nyathā tu pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1509: iti navamīyuktāyā niṣedhakathanaṃ tadardharātrādūrdhvaṃ trimuhūrtatvābhāve trimuhūrtetyupādānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1513: āśvinaśuklāṣṭamī tu durgāṣṭamī sā ca sāmānyanirṇayādeva navamīviddhā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1515: sāmānyanirṇayādevāsyā uttaraviddhatvaṃ tathāpi iyaṃ leśato 'pi saptamīviddhā na kartavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1522: putrān hanti paśūn hanti hanti rāṣṭraṃ sarājakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1540: ahaṃ bhadrā ca bhadrāhaṃ nāvayorantaraṃ kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:1550: yadāṣṭamīṃ tu samprāpya cāstaṃ yāti divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1559: atra ca putravatā upavāso na kārya ityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:1562: yathā tathā vā pūtātmā vratī devīṃ prapūjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1565: kanyāṃ gate savitari śuklapakṣe 'ṣṭamī tu yā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1572: leśamātreṇa saptamyā api syād dūṣitā yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:1588: tadā tu sā mahāpuṇyā jayantī aṣṭamī śubhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1600: tathāpyekamūlakalpanālāghavāt paurṇamāsyantaṃ māsamādāya bhādre amāvāsyāntamādāya śrāvaṇe grāhyā ityanusandheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1601: evaṃ ca“tithikṛtye ca kṛṣṇādim“iti vacanaṃ nātra śrāvaṇasya paurṇamāstantatvavidhāyakaṃ kintu etadatiriktaviṣayakalpanā lāghavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1602: bhādrastu yadyapi bhādraśrutyāmāvāsyānta eva prāpnoti mūlaśrutikalpanāgauravasya
GSD36mvir_sau:1605: sā ca dvividhā śuddhā saptamīviddhā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1606: tatra dvividhā api sūryodayādūrdhvagāminī na veti dvividhā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1611: sūryodayordhvagāminyāṃ tu śuddhāyāṃ viddhāyāṃ vā rohiṇīyogasyānyataratra sattve saiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1617: tenottaradina eva rohiṇīyoge pūrvaniśīthavyāpinī śuddhāpi tyājyeti hemādrimādhavādayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1620: atrārddharātrasya vakṣyamāṇarītyā karmakālatvāt karmakālaśāstrasya ca sarvāpekṣayā balavattvāt parīdane ca tadabhāvāt pūrvaiveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1625: yaiḥ kṛtā śrāvaṇe māsi hyaṣṭamī rohiṇīyutā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1628: iti pādmāt pūrvejhurarddharātragatāṃ rohiṇīyutāmaṣyaṣṭamīṃ parityajya budhavārādiyutā parā kartavyā āpadyeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:1630: kulakoṭayāstu muktidā kiṃ punarbudhavāreṇetyādinā“yadi kāmayeta varṣukaḥ parjanyaḥ syāt“itivat (a0 3 pā0 8 adhi0 6)
GSD36mvir_sau:1639: udaye cāṣṭamī kiñcit navamī sakalā yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:1642: divā vā yadi vā rātrau nāsti cedrohiṇī kalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1644: itivacanāt paradine rohiṇīyogābhāva eva rātriyuktāṣṭamī grāhye ti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1645: tasya taddine svalpasyāpi rohiṇīyogasyābhāve 'pi nyāyaprāptaśuddhā ṣṭamīvratakartavyatānuvādakatvāt iti śiṣṭamatamanavadyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1646: dinadvaye rohiṇīyoge 'yoge vā śuddhādhikā pūrvaiva tadatikrame kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1647: viddhādhikāyāṃ tvanyatarasminneva dine niśīthe rohiṇīyoge saiva rohiṇīyogaprāśastyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1656: ata eva viddhādhikāyāṃ dvinadvaye 'pi niśītha matikramya rohiṇīyoge 'ṣṭamyāśca dinadvaye niśīthe sattvāsattavayoḥ paraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1658: sarvathā rohiṇīyogarahitāyāmaṣṭamyāṃ niśīthe dinadvayasattvānyatarasattveṣvayameva nyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1662: iti gauḍadhṛtaviṣṇurahasyavacanāt rohiṇyalābhe sarvathā pūrvaiva grāhyā syāditivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1666: arddharātre tu rohiṇyāṃ yadā kṛṣṇāṣṭamī bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:1672: na caivaṃ pūjopavāsayoḥ phalabhedāt samānaphalakatve 'pi vā nirapekṣavidhānāt citrodbhidādivadekaikasyāpyanuṣṭhānaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1673: sopavāso hareḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatra na sīdati /
GSD36mvir_sau:1677: varṣe varṣe tu kartavyā tuṣṭayarthaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1679: na cātra tuṣṭayarthamitiphalaśravaṇāt phalanimittoddeśyadvayanimittavākyabhedaḥ syāditi vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1687: tatra kevalāṣṭyamyupavāse pāraṇadine cāṣṭamyanuvṛttau tadante kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1693: rohiṇīsahitāṣṭamyupavāse tu pāraṇadine ubhayānuvṛttāvubhayānte tat kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1697: idaṃ cobhayānte pāraṇaṃ mahāniśāto 'rvāgubha yānte bhojanaparyāptakālalābhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:1698: na rātrau pāraṇaṃ kuryādṛte vai rohiṇīvratāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1703: iti smṛteḥ rohiṇīvrataṃ cātra taduktāṣṭamīvratameva prakaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1710: yadā tu tādṛśe kāle ubhayānto na labhyate tadānyatarānte 'pi tat kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1713: yadā tu mahāniśāyāḥ pūrvaṃ pāraṇāparyāptaḥ kālo na labhyate tadā tatrāpi kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1720: gauḍāstu arddharātrena tat kuryāt iti paṭhitvā yadyardharātre ubhayoranyatarasya vāntastadā nārddharātre pāraṇaṃ kintu divaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1723: tithyante votsavānte vā vratī kurvīṃta pāraṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1725: hemādristu ubhayānte pāraṇaṃ śaktaviṣayamaśaktasya tu anyatarānte tato 'pyaśaktasyotsavānta ityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:1737: navamyā saha kāryā syādaṣṭamī navamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1743: navamyekādaśī caiva diśā viddhā yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:1744: tadā varjyā viśeṣeṇa gaṅgāmbhaḥ surayā yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1756: nanu pūrvoṃktaniṣedhasya kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣobhayasādhāraṇatvena sāmānyarūpasya kṛṣṇapakṣe saṅkoco 'stviti cet, maivam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1757: bhavadukto 'pi“śuklapakṣe tithirgrāhyā“ityayaṃ saṅkocaheturapi sāmānyarūpa eva tasmāt pakṣayorubhayorapi pūrvaviddhaiva navamīti siddham /

GSD36mvir_sau:2357: hemādristu asmin dvitīye pakṣe śuddhaikādaśyupavāsavidhāyakānāṃ vacanānāṃ gṛhasthaviṣayakatvaṃ śuddhadvādaśyupavāsavidhāyakānāṃ tu yativiṣayatvam
GSD36mvir_sau:2360: na garbhe viśate janturityāha bhagavān hariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2362: atra ca na garbhe viśate janturityato yatipratīterityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:2365: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2383: vidhavāyāśca tatreva parato dvādaśī na cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2391: na ca prāgudāhṛtavacanānusārāt sakāmaniṣkāmapadaṃ gṛhiyatiparamastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2393: prātarbhavatu vā mā vā dvādaśī ca dvijottama/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2395: viṣṇuprītikāmanāyāṃ tu etādṛśe viṣaye dinadvaye 'pyupavāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2397: trayodasī uṣaḥ kāle upoṣyā tatra kābhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2400: kecittu dve upoṣye ityanena naikasyopavāsasya āvṛtyā vidhānaṃ kintu kaiścitpūrvā kaiściduttareti tithidvayopoṣyatvapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvaikavākyatvādityāhuḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:2405: ekādaśī na labhyate dvādaśī sakalā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2408: atra ca viddhāyā anādhikyaṃ sāmyena kṣayeṇa ca bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:2411: tasya putrā vinaśyanti maghāyāṃ piṇḍado yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2419: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā trayodaśryāṃ ca pāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2421: atraca dinakṣaye viddhāniṣedhasya putravadviṣayatvāt dvādaśyupavāso 'pi tadviṣaya eveti dhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2422: sāmyena anādhikye tu putra vatāmapi pūrvatraiva“dinakṣaya“ityādinā kṣaya evaiteṣāṃ viddhopavāsaparyudāsāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2424: ekādaśī kalāpyekā parato na ca varddhate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2429: daśamīmiśritā pūrvā pūrṇā ca dvādaśī parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2436: iti sumantuvacanaṃ tat kṣayaśabdena vṛddhyabhāvalakṣaṇayā sāmyaparameva vyākhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2438: na caitadvacanānurodhāt pādmasyaiva lakṣaṇayā sāmyaparatvamastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2440: madanaratnastu sāmye kṣaye ca yatīnāṃ paraiva pūrvodāhṛtasumantuviṣṇurahasyavacanābhyām /
GSD36mvir_sau:2452: ekādaśī yadā luptā parato dvādaśī bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2457: ityuttarārddhaṃ paṭhitvā śuklapakṣe daśamīviddhā tyājyā kṛṣṇapakṣe tu daśamīviddhā grāhyetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2459: kimatra viddhāniṣedhaḥ śuklapakṣa eveti vidhīyate kiṃ vā viddhāvidhiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣa eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2465: prātarbhavatu vā mā vā yato nityamupoṣaṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2466: iti vacanaṃ prātastrayodaśīdine dvādaśī bhadhatu vā mā veti vyākhyāya trayodaśryāṃ dvādaśīsattve 'pi viddhāyāmevopavāsa ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2471: daśamīvedhe prātaḥ saṅkalpakāle ekādaśī bhavatu vā mā vā sarvathopavāsaḥ kartavya eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2472: vastutastu hemādṣādau“dvādaśīmiśritā naraiḥ“ityeva vākyamudāhṛtamiti na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2473: yā tu viddhādhikādhikadvādaśikā sā sarveṣāṃ paraiva viddhāniṣedhavākyānāṃ niraṅkuśaṃ tatraiva pravṛtteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2474: yā tu viddhādhikānadhikadvādaśikā sā sarvairapi paraivopoṣyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2476: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ vidyate yadi vā navā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2479: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ ca pāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2481: asmiṃśca kṣayeṇa dvādaśyā anādhikye kaurmokteḥ putravadgṛhasthairnopavāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2486: ekādaśī yadā vṛddhā dbādaśī ca kṣayaṃ gatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2487: kṣīṇā sā dvādaśī jñeyā naktaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:2497: atra ca yeṣu pakṣeṣu viddhopavāsaprasaktistatra rātrau pūjāvratasaṅkalpāvanuṣṭheyau /
GSD36mvir_sau:2501: yeṣu tu śuddhopavāsaprasaktistatra yadi pūrvadine madhyarātrāt pūrvaṃ daśamī tadā“prātaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:2503: yadā tu madhyarātrottaraṃ daśamyā vedhastadā madhyāhnottaraṃ pūjāvratasaṅkalpā vanuṣṭheyau /
GSD36mvir_sau:2508: ardharātrāt parā yatra ekādaśyāṃ tu labhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2513: anye tu kapālavedhasyāpi aruṇodayavedhavannityavadeva dūṣakatvam asmād vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2524: yadā bhavati alpā tu dvādaśī pāraṇādine /
GSD36mvir_sau:2527: na coṣaḥkālasyālpatvāt kathaṃ tāvat karmānuṣṭheyamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2533: apakarṣaśca smārttasyaiva na śrautasya tato balīyastvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2536: atra ca prātarmādhyāhnikagrahaṇānna naimittikasaṅkrāntivyatīpātādiyuktasya tattatkāle vihitasya snānādikarmaṇaḥ sāṃvatsarikādervāpakarṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2537: evaṃ bhūyasyāmapi dvādaśryāṃ mādhyāhnikāpakarṣaḥ prātaḥ kārya eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2540: yadā tu prātaḥkālo dvādaśīprathamapādāntargato bhavati tadā tadante pāraṇā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2547: sā tu ekādaśīyuktā grāhyā“rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā“iti yugmavacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2548: dvādaśī ca prakartavyā ekādaśyā yutā prabho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2555: yadā caikādaśyupavāsadvādaśyupavāsayorekasmin dine prasaktistadopavāsadvayamapi tantreṇa kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2556: yadā tu sampūrṇayostithyorbhedenopavāsadvayaprasaktistadā ekādaśyupavāsasaṃyuktāṃ pāraṇāṃ jalena kṛtvā dvādaśīvratamārabheteti mādhavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2557: ayameva ca nyāyaḥ sarvatra upavāsadvayaprasaktau dhyeyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2562: pāraṇāhe na labhyeta dvādaśī ghaṭikāpi cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2566: śrāvaṇasya site pakṣe karkasthe ca divākare /
GSD36mvir_sau:2571: yā rāma/ śravaṇopetā dvādasī mahatī tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2576: dvikalo yadi labhyeta sa jñeyo hyāṣṭayāmikaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2579: tatra yā tāvadekasminneva dine śravaṇayogavatī śuddhā śuddhādhikā vā viddhā viddhādhikā vā tasyāṃ sandeha eva nāsti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2580: yadā viddhādhikāyāṃ dinadvaye 'pi śravaṇayogastadā ekādaśīyutā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2590: yadā tu dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇayoga eva nāsti tadā ekādaśyāmeva tadvatyāṃ śravaṇadvādaśīvrataṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2591: yadā na prāpyate ṛkṣaṃ dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇaḥ kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:2597: vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā bhaktānāṃ vijayapradā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2599: viddhādhikye 'pi cottaradine śravaṇayogābhāve tādṛśī daśamīviddhāpi grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2604: yadā caikādaśīśravaṇadvādaśyupavāsau dinabhedena prāpnutastadā śaktena dvayamapi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2609: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu nakṣatraṃ śravaṇaṃ yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2616: atra ca yadā kadācicchravaṇayoge 'pi prātareva saṅkalpa iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2619: mahatī nāma sā jñeyā upavāse mahāphalā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2625: śravaṇadvādaśīvratanimittopavāsapāraṇaṃ tu pāraṇādine ubhayānuvṛttau tūbhayānte kartavyamiti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2627: pāraṇaṃ tu na kartavyaṃ yāvannaikasya saṅkṣayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2629: madanaratnastu atra yadyapi tithinakṣatrayoranyatarānte pāraṇaṃ pratīyate tathāpi tithyanta eva kāryam na tu tithimadhye 'pi nakṣatramātrānte
GSD36mvir_sau:2639: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī pāpanāśinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2643: ekādaśī tu sampūrṇā varddhate punareva sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2649: ante trayodaśī bhadrā trispṛśā sā prakīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2660: atra ca tithiprayuktāsu na ko 'pi vicāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2662: itarāsu nakṣatraprayuktāsu tu na śravaṇadbādaśīvadalpayoge 'pi pūjyatvaṃ kintu sūryodayādārabhya punastatparyantamastamayaparyantaṃ vā sattva eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2667: etāścāṣṭau mahādvādaśyaḥ kāmyāḥ mahāpuṇyā ityādinā phalaśravaṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2669: na kariṣyanti ye loke dvādaśyo 'ṣṭau mamājñayā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2689: dvitīyā pañcamī vedhāt daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2690: caturdaśī copavāse hanyuḥ pūrvottare tithī // iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:2694: yadā tu paradine trayodaśī nāsti tadā pūrvaviddhā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2697: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2698: pūrvaviddhāpi kartavyā yadi na syāt pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:2706: dvitīyā pañcamī vedhāt daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2710: atra ca pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvaṃ na sāyāhnamātravyāpitve kintu aparāṅṇavyāpitve /
GSD36mvir_sau:2723: tatastu lohite bhānau snātvā saniyamo vratī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2726: dinadvaye pradoṣavyāpitve tadekadeśasparśe vā uttarā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2739: yadyāpi cātra sāmānyanirṇayādaparāhṇavyāpinī pūrvaviddhā prāpyate tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:2742: iti saṃvartavacanāt sāyānhavyāpinyā api pūrvaviddhāyā grahaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2743: anyathā hi sāmānyanirṇayādeva prāpteretasya vacanasya nirarthakatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2751: śuklā caturdaśī grāhyā paraviddhā sadā vrate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2755: etāḥ parayutāḥ kāryāḥ parāḥ pūrveṇa saṃyutāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2758: sadā kāryā trayodaśyā na tu yuktā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2766: ekādaśī daśamyā tu saptamyā cāṣṭamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2767: pañcamyā ca yadā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2768: āsu kriyā na kurvīta pūrvaviddhāsu mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2777: madhoḥ śrāvaṇamāsasya śuklā yā tu caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2781: niśi bhramanti bhūtāni śaktayaḥ śūlabhṛt/ yataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2793: dadarśa śīlā sā strīṇāṃ samūhaṃ raktavāsasām //
GSD36mvir_sau:2800: “daive hyaudayikī grāhyā“iti pratyakṣavacanavirodhāt audayikī grāhyā na madhyāhnagateti saṅkṣepaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2805: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2815: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca tā upoṣyāḥ parānvitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2818: śivavrate tu pakṣadvayagate caturdaśyau trayodaśīyute aparāhṇavyāpinyau grāhye /
GSD36mvir_sau:2821: caturdaśī tu kartavyā trayodaśyā yutā vibho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2831: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2834: taditaravrateṣu“ubhe pakṣe caturdaśī“iti prāgudāhṛtapadmapurāṇāt tādṛśavṛddhavaśiṣṭhavacanācca uttaraviddhā grāhyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2841: varṣe barṣe tu kartavyaṃ mama santuṣṭikāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2842: dinadvaye tadvyāptau aṃśataḥ samavyāptau vā paraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2845: paradine gauṇavyāpteḥ sattvāt pūrvadine ca tadabhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2851: tat saṅkalparūpavratopakramaviṣayaṃ na tu pradhānasya madhyāhnakālatvajñāpakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2867: vārāho girijāsute nabhasi yadbhūte site mādhave //
GSD36mvir_sau:2868: siṃho bhādrapade site haritithau śrīvāmano mādhave
GSD36mvir_sau:2878: jyeṣṭhaśuklacaturdaśyāṃ sarvasmin dine pañcāgnisādhanaṃ kṛtvā pradoṣe hemadhenurdeyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2887: atra dinodaya iti śravaṇāt prātaḥkālavyāptitvamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2907: varṣe ca hemalambākhye māse śrīmati kārttike /
GSD36mvir_sau:2917: rājā ca tatra sampūjyo yamaḥ pralayabhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2925: atra ca rātriśabdastithilakṣakaḥ sivaśabdaśca śivavratalakṣakaḥ prakaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2960: prabhāte vimale jāte dṛṣṭvā tatraiva śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:2974: jāgaraṃ kurute tatra sa rudrasamatāṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2976: tadetat śivarātrivrataṃ janmāṣṭamīvat saṃyogamapṛthaktvanyāyena nityaṃ kāmyaṃ ca tatra nityatvaṃ tāvat skandapūrāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:2985: arṇavo yadi vā śuṣyet kṣīyeta himavānapi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2991: śivaṃ ca pūjayitvā yo jāgartti ca caturdaśīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:2999: sarvān bhuktvā tato bhogān mṛto bhūpo 'bhijāyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:3003: sarvān kāmānavāpnoti pretya ceha ca mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3010: mādhamāse tu yā kṛṣṇā phālgunādau caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3016: anyathā yo dadātīha sa dātā narakaṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:3023: ata evātra vedho 'pi na divāvedha eva kintu janmāṣṭamīvadrātrivedho 'pi bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3028: bhūtāni śaktayo yoginyo 'pi śūlabhṛcchaṅkaraśca yato rātrau bhramanti ataḥ satyāṃ tasyāṃ pūjanaṃ bhavediti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3029: yadā dinadvaye niśīthavyāpinī tadā pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3038: śrāvaṇī durganavamī tathā dūrvāṣṭamī tu yā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3042: anaṅgena samāyuktā kartavyā sā sadā tithiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3050: bhūtaviddhā ca yā tatra śivarātrivrataṃ caret //
GSD36mvir_sau:3056: atra rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ yasmāditi hetuvaśāt pradoṣaśabdo rātriparo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3066: yadā tu niśīthādūrdhvagā trayodaśī pera'hani ca niśīthāvyāpinyapi caturdaśī bhavati tadā paraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3068: māghāsite bhūtadinaṃ hi rājannupaiti yogaṃ yadi pañcadaśyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3069: jayāprayuktāṃ na tu jātu kuryācchivasya rātriṃ priyakṛcchivasya //
GSD36mvir_sau:3071: jayāprayuktāṃ jayayā trayodaśyā prakarṣeṇa niśīthādūrdhvaṃ yuktāṃ na kuryāt nopavaset kintu sakaladinabhūyorātrilābhāt parāmevetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3072: tathāca yat śivarātrivrate bhūtāṃ kāmaviddhāṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3075: niśādvayacaturddraśyāṃ pūrvā tyājyā parā śubhā / iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:3078: pūrvasyā eva niśīthavyāptau uttarāyā eva vā niśīthavyāptau tatkālavyāpinī grāhyetyuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:3087: vyāptā sā dṛśyate yasyāṃ tasyāṃ kuryāt vrataṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3095: iti kāmyaṃ pratimāsaṃ śivarātrivrataṃ tatrāpi pūjopavāsajāgaraṇavidhānāt tasya ca sakalarātrisādhyatvāt bahurātrivyāpinyāmanuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3100: asyāśca mahāśiva rātreḥ ravibhaumavārānyatarayoge praśastataratvaṃ śivayogayoge praśastatamatvaṃ ca skandapurāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:3114: itivacanāt paradine yadi divā tithyantastadā tatraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3120: sikthe sikthe phalaṃ tasya vastuṃ śakto na pārvati/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3121: brahmāṇḍodaramadhye tu yāni tīrthāni santi vai /
GSD36mvir_sau:3135: bhūtaviddhā na kartavyā darśaḥ pūrṇā kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:3139: evaṃ yat“caturdaśyā ca pūrṇimā“itiyugmavākyaṃ tat sāvitrīvrataviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3141: atra ca na pūrvaviddhāniṣedhastasyāstrimuhūrtasattve kiṃ tvaṣṭādaśanāḍīmitacaturdaśīsattve /
GSD36mvir_sau:3144: mādhavastu idaṃ vacanaṃ yatra bhūtaviddhā kartavyā yathā sāvatrīvrate tatrāṣṭādaśanāḍīmitā na grāhyetyevaṃparamityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:3153: jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe pūrṇimāyāṃ tayā vratam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3154: cīrṇaṃ purā mahābhaktyā kathitaṃ te mayā nṛpa/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3156: amāyāṃ ca tathā jyeṣṭhe vaṭamūle tathā satī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3161: meṣe vā vṛṣabhe vāpi sāvitrīṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3165: śrāvaṇīṃ paurṇamāsīṃ prakṛtyāmnāte rakṣābandhane tu aparāhṇavyāpinī grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3171: anye tu aṅgatve pramāṇābāvāt tata ityasya cākhaṇḍaparvāṇi arthasiddhatvenāvidheyatvānna grahasaṅkrāntyādivarjanamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3173: bhadrāyāṃ dve na kartavye śrāvaṇī phālgunī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3176: śrāvaṇyāṃ śravaṇe jātaḥ pūrvaṃ hayaśirā hariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3192: 2) ityataḥ sūtrāt yā kācicchravaṇayuktā tithirlabhyate tathāpi śrāvaṇapauṇemāsyevātra vivakṣitā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3195: athāto 'dhyāyopākarma oṣadhīnāṃ prādurbhāve śravaṇena śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ śrāvaṇasya pañcamīṃ hastena veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3200: kecittu hastenetyato nakṣatrarūpakālajñāne 'pi titherākāṅkṣitatvāttatra yāvadanirṇītaṃ kiñciddinamityupasthitaṃ bhavati tāvatsannidhānāt pañcamyevopasthitānveti
GSD36mvir_sau:3202: oṣadhirbhāve iti śrāvaṇasya tviti ca sarvatra sambadhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3217: āśvalāyanastu--athāto 'dhyāyopākaraṇamauṣadhīnāṃ prādurbāve śrāvaṇasya pañcamyāṃ hastena vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3220: anena varṣāsambandhinoḥ śrāvaṇabhādrapadayormadhye śrāvaṇasya pūrvaṃ vihitatvāt saṃjñākaraṇasiddhaṃ bhādrapade 'nuṣṭhānaṃ stavayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:3222: māsāntarābhidhāne pūrvoktamāsasyaiva bādho yujyate avāntarasājātye na tasya śīghropasthitikatvāt na nakṣatrādīnām /
GSD36mvir_sau:3224: ete ca kālāḥ svasvagṛhnānusārā vyava sthitāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3225: yeṣāṃ ca śākhāyāmaneke kālā uktāsteṣāmākāṅkṣāvaśāt pā ukrameṇopādānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3229: (*) tatra ca saṅkrāntigrahaṇasū takādau hastayuktapañcamyāṃ tadasambhave kevalapañcamyāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:3230: kevalahaste vā tadasambhave auṣadhiprādurbhāvābhāve ca īdṛśanakṣatrādiyukte bhādrapade 'pi kartavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3233: avṛṣṭayauṣadhayastasmin māse tu na bhavanti cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3244: saṅkrāntau grahaṇe āśauce ca doṣo madanaratnādibahnunibandhodāhṛta smṛtau--
GSD36mvir_sau:3245: saṅkrāntau grahaṇe caiva sūtake mṛtake tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3246: gaṇaśrāddhaṃ na kurvīta nāradasya vaco yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3254: yadyardharātrādarvāk cet grahaḥ saṅkrama eva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3255: nopākarma tadā kuryāt āvaṇyāṃ śravaṇe 'pi vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3268: evaṃ ca grahaṇapūrvottaradine śravaṇasattve tatroyākarma na tyājyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3269: yadā ca grahaṇasaṅkrāntiduṣṭaṃ parva tadā kālaniyama uktaḥ smṛtimahārṇave--
GSD36mvir_sau:3276: vājasaneyibhirityanena yeṣāṃ pañcamī gṛhya uktā ta upalakṣyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:3280: anyathā vājasaneyibhiḥ pañcamyāmeveti cetyubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3281: na ca“saṅkrāntirgrahaṇaṃ vāpi yadi parvaṇi jāyate“ityasyānenopasaṃhāro yukto natu lakṣaṇā lakṣaṇāta upasaṃhārasya nyāyyatvāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:3283: prakṛte hi upasaṃhāre śuddhapañcamyā api vidheyatvena vākyabhedāpattyā lakṣaṇaiva yuktā tasmādyeṣāṃ gṛhye papañcamī noktā taiḥ pūrvodāhṛtamanuvākyāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:3287: baudhāyanaistu āṣāḍhyāmevā teṣāṃ kevalāyā evāṣāḍhyā uktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3291: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredbahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3310: āhṛtya tāḥ śrutīstasmai dadau lokaguruḥ svayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:3320: hastaśravaṇe api sakhaṇḍe audayike eva grāhye /
GSD36mvir_sau:3326: na ca śrāvaṇamiti naitasya karmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ kintu śravaṇākarmaṇa iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3343: kathamanyathātulyakakṣatayā bahvṛcānāmupādānaṃ kriyeta tulyakakṣāṇāmeva hi samabhivyāhāro yujyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3344: na hi sambhavati brāhmaṇairidaṃ kartavyaṃ kṣatriyairidaṃ kaṭhairidamiti yujyate ca vaiśyairidaṃ karttabyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3345: evaṃ ca bahvṛcaiḥ śravaṇa iti samabhivyāhāro yujyate yājuṣaiḥ parvaṇīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3346: kiṃ ca bahvṛcagṛhyapariśiṣṭakāro bahvṛcānāmeva karmasambandhidharmavidhānārthaṃ pravṛtto na tu taittirīyāṇām /
GSD36mvir_sau:3347: evaṃ ca yat tatra taittirīyasambandhitatkālādikaṃ śrūyate tadaṃśe 'nuvāda eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3356: tadapi na taittirīyātiriktānāṃ pūrvaviddhāvidhāyakaṃ kintu upākarmātiriktaviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3358: api cātra parvagataviśeṣasyaivaudayikasya vidhānaṃ yuktam apekṣitatvāt samabhivyāhārācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3359: na ca yadaudayike parvaṇyupākuryuḥ taittarīyakā eveti vacanavyaktirastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3361: na ca yadaudayike taittirīyakā ityeva vacanavyaktiḥ parvaudayikatvaṃ ca sannidhilabhyamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3364: tathā sati sannidhita eva śravaṇopasthityā tatrāpyaudayikatvalābhe uttarārddhaṃ nirarthakaṃ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3367: yaugikābhyāmanyataḥ prasiddhārthābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ parvaiva vidhīyate iti
GSD36mvir_sau:3375: smṛtayo hi svātantryeṇaiva pravṛttāḥ yuktaṃ yat prati smṛtividhiriti,
GSD36mvir_sau:3376: pariśiṣṭaṃ punaḥ śeṣapūraṇarūpaṃ śeṣiṇamupajīvyaiva pravṛttamiti na tatra tadananuvādena vidhāyakatvamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3390: etaccopākarma malamāse na kāryam tathā ca--
GSD36mvir_sau:3397: iti vākye sauramānavihitatvarūpahetūpanyāsapūrvakamanutkarṣavidhānācchandogānāṃ sauramānena vihitatvāt tadviṣayamidamṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanami ti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3414: ityanena nigamavacanena karkaṭasthe vidhānāt kathaṃ niṣedha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3417: kintu siṃhavidhiviśeṣa eva“na girāgiretibrūyāt“iti vat (*) (a. 9 pā. 1 adhi. 18) /
GSD36mvir_sau:3419: tatra yajñāyajñīyamityanena“yajñāyajñā vo girāgirā ca dakṣase“iti yajñāyajñapadaghaṭitāyāmṛci samutpannaṃ sāmābhidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3421: tatra yonigānamaghīyānaiḥ sāmagairgakāreṇa sahitaṃ “gāyīrā girā iti gīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3423: iti brāhmaṇavākyena tu girāśabde gakāralopapūrvakamirāśabdena gānaṃ vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3424: tathā ca yonigānabrāhmaṇagānayosaktulyabalatvena viṣeṣābhāvādvikalpena prayoge prāpte“nagirā gireti brūyāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:3425: yadgirāgireti brūyādātmānameva tadudghātā giret“iti gakārarahitagāne bādhamuktvā gakārarahitamirāpadaṃ geyatvena vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3428: iti vacanayoḥ samānabalatvena siṃhe karkaṭe ca vikalyenopākarmaṇaḥ prāptau “narmadottara';
GSD36mvir_sau:3430: evaṃ ca siṃhakarkaṭayorubhayorapi prāptatvādavyavasthāyāṃ deśabhedena vyavasthāmāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:3436: sarvatropākaraṇe prāpte dakṣiṇadeśe 'pi upākaraṇaṃ prāptam evaṃ sati tatrānena vākyena yaddakṣiṇe upākuryāt tat karkaṭe yaduttare tta siṃhe
GSD36mvir_sau:3438: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredvahiḥ (*) /
GSD36mvir_sau:3443: ityatra siṃhe ravāvityetasyobhayatra sambandhena yat sāmagānāṃ siṃhārkavidhānaṃ taddeśabhedaprāpakakarkasiṃhavyavasthānivṛttiphalakatayā
GSD36mvir_sau:3457: samāvṛtto brahmacārikalpena yathānyāyamitare jāyopeyītyeke prājāpatyaṃ taditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:3458: brahmacārikalpenauyena niyamaviśeṣeṇa brahmacāryadhīyīta tenaiva yuktaḥ samāvṛtto 'pyadhīyīta /
GSD36mvir_sau:3460: tathā jāyopeyī = gṛhastho 'pi brahmacārikalpoktaniyamena natu bhikṣādidharmeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3481: ata ūrdhvaṃ tu chandāṃsi śukleṣu niyataḥ paṭhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3485: yadā śrāvaṇyāmupākarma tadā puṣyamāsasya śuklapratipadi pūrvāhṇe,
GSD36mvir_sau:3486: yadā prauṣṭhapadyāṃ tadā māgha iti vyavasthito vikalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3490: arddhapañcamān iti ardhaḥ pañcamo yeṣu te sārddhāṃścatura iti yāvat /
GSD36mvir_sau:3502: baudhāyanaḥ- śrāvaṇyāmāṣāḍhayāṃ vopākṛtya taiṣyāṃ mādhyāṃ votsṛjet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3508: tathāpyatra sāmīpyasaptamīvivakṣayā māgyevoktā“agnīṣomīyeṇa carantyuttaravedyām“iti vaditi vṛttikṛtā vyākhyātam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3515: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāṅṇe vicaredvahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3518: yadā tu siṃhasthe sūrye hasta eva prathamastataḥ puṣyastadā karkaṭasthe puṣye utsarjanaṃ kāryamityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:3520: māse prauṣṭhapade hastāt puṣyaḥ pūrvo bhavedyadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3521: tadā tu śrāvaṇe kuryādutsargaṃ chandasāṃ dvijaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3523: prauṣṭhapade yo hastastasmāt pūrvaḥ puṣyo yadi śrāvaṇagato bhavet tadā śrāvaṇa evotsargaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3531: etacca daivatvātpūrvodāhṛtavacanebhyaśca sarvaiḥ pūrvāhṇa eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3541: darśāntāśvināmāvāsyā tu abhyaṅge prātaḥ kālavyāpinī grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3542: iṣe bhūte ca darśe ca kārttikaprathame dine /
GSD36mvir_sau:3548: dīpān dattvā pradoṣe tu lakṣmīṃ pūjya yathāvidhi /
GSD36mvir_sau:3567: iyaṃ ca bhadrāyāṃ na kartavyā“bhadrāyāṃ dve na kartavye“itipūrvodāhṛtavacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3571: tatra dinadvaye pradoṣasattve parā pūrvasya bhadrāyuktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3573: sūryodayāt pūrvaṃ ca yadi holākādīpanāya kiyānapi bhadrārahitaḥ kālo 'vaśiṣyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3582: yadā tu pūrvatra bhadrārihataḥ kālo na labhyate paratopi ca na pradoṣavyāptiḥ tadā pūrvatraiva bhadrāpucche kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3583: pṛthivyāṃ yāni kāryāṇi śubhāni tvaśubhāni ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3584: tāni sarvāṇi sidhyanti viṣṭipucche na saṃśayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3586: idaṃ ca yadottaratra sārddhayāmātrayāt pūrvameva paurṇa māsīsamāptistadā jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3587: yadā tu tanmitā tato 'dhikā vā paurṇamāsī pratipacca dvitīyadine vṛddhigāminī tadā pratipatpradoṣe 'pi sā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3589: pratipad varddhamānā tu tadā sā holikā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3594: ityādīni pūrvaviddhāvidhāyakāni tāni pūrvadine bhadrābhāve jñeyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:3595: yadā tu pūrvadine bhadrā dvitīyadine candragrahaṇaṃ tadā pūrvatraiva bhadrāpucche holākā kāryeti divodāsaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3603: sāṅgau darśapūrṇamāsau parvaṇi vihitau iti pratīyate tathāpi“pūrvamahardevatā gṛhṇantyuttaramaharyajeta”
GSD36mvir_sau:3610: athavā paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ sandhivācitvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt tasya cātisūkṣmatvenopakramasyāpi
GSD36mvir_sau:3613: evaṃ ca“sandhau yajeta“ityatrāpi sandhiśabdena tādṛśatithidbayameva lakṣyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3618: sāmīpyaṃ viṣayaṃ prāhuḥ pūrveṇānhā pareṇa vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3621: tatrāpi na sampūrṇaṃ parvānvādhānakālaḥ kintu ādyaṃ bhāgatrayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3629: antyau = parvapratipadorantyau bhāgauḥ yāge pratipado 'ntyo bhāgo varjyaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:3630: vratakarmaṇi anvādhāne parvaṇo 'ntyo bhāgo varjya ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3635: “yadaharupavasatho bhavati tadahaḥ pūrvāhṇa eva prātarāhutiṃ hutvā“iti gobhilokteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3643: prātaḥkāla iti prokto bhāgaścānhaḥ sa pañcamaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3649: evaṃ yāgānvādhānakāle nirūpite yadā tāvat parvapratipadoḥ sampūrṇatvaṃ tadā na kaścit sandehaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3650: yadā tu tayoḥ khaṇḍatvaṃ tadā prakāracatuṣṭayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3651: āvartanāt prāk āvartane vā tadūrddhvaṃ vā rātrau vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3653: pūrvāhṇe vātha madhyāhne yadi parva samāpyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3664: itilaugakṣivākyāt sandhidine 'nvādhāya prātaryāga iti aviśeṣeṇa pratīyate tathāpi aparāhṇasandhau tāvatparedyuścandradarśanābhāve sandhidine 'nvādhānaṃ prātaryāgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3668: atra caturdaśyāmanvādhānaṃ caturdaśīdine kiñcidamāvāsyāpraveśa eva bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3674: caturdaśyāṃ cutaryāme amā yatra na dṛśyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3675: śvobhūte pratipad yatra bhūte kavyādikī kriyā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3676: iti baudhāyanavākye amā sampūrṇā na dṛśyate kintu svalpā dṛśyata iti vyākhyātamiti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:3685: candradarśanābhāve sati aparāhṇasandhāvanvādhānaṃ cet kimu vaktavyaṃ rātrisandhāviti kaimutikanyāyenaiva
GSD36mvir_sau:3692: titheḥ parasyā ghaṭikāstu yāḥ syurnyūnāstathaivābhyadhikāśca tāsām /
GSD36mvir_sau:3693: arddhaṃ viyojyaṃ ca tathā prayojyaṃ hāse ca vṛddhau prathame dine tat //
GSD36mvir_sau:3696: vṛddhiḥ pratipado yāsti tadarddhaṃ parvaṇi kṣipet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3700: nanu evaṃ yadā pūrvedyuraparāhṇasandhiḥ paredyuśca pratipadaścaturtha eva bhāgo 'vaśiṣyate tadā kathaṃ sandhiśāstrānnirṇayaḥ paredyuryāgakālābhāvāt iticet, satyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3705: amāvāsyāyāṃ tu candradarśane yāgasya niṣedhādaparāhṇasandhau yāga evetyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3707: kṛtvā paurṇamāsyāmapi aparāhṇasandhau yadi paredyuryāgakālo 'sti tadaiva tatra yāgastadabhāve
GSD36mvir_sau:3715: na caivaṃ caturdaśyāmapi candradarśanasambhavāttatra ca“yadaivainaṃ na purastāt paśyat,
GSD36mvir_sau:3716: tarhyevopavaset“iti gobhilenānvādhānasya paryudastatbāt kathaṃ tatra tadanuṣṭhānamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3721: yadaharna dṛśyate tadaharamāvāsyāṃ śvo na draṣṭāra iti veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3723: eṣā vai sumanānāmeṣṭiryamabhiyajānaṃ paścāccandmābhyudetyasminnevāsmai loke 'rdhukaṃ bhavati iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3726: iti candrodaye yāgavidhānasya prāśastyāvagamāt kathaṃ tatra yāganiṣedha iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3727: atrābhyudayamātraśravaṇāttasya ca pratipadyapi sambhavānnaitasya candradarśanadine yāgakartavyatāparatvamiti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:3732: vastutastu rātrisandhau candradarśanadine 'pi yāgānuṣṭhānasya pūrvaṃ sādhitatvāttadviṣayāṇīti yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3734: tadanyeṣāṃ tu baudhāyanakātyāyanādīnāṃ candradarśane yāgo na bhavatye vetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3735: smṛtyarthasāre tu sandhiśāstreṇaiva sarvadā nirṇayastenāparāhṇasandhāvapi sarvadānvādhānameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3736: yāni tu candradarśanadine yāganiṣedhavacanāni tāni tasyaivopolabdakāni na tu nirṇāyakānītyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3737: nanvevaṃ yāgakālanirṇaye kriyamāṇe tithivṛddhyā kadācit pakṣavṛddhau pūrvayajanīyadinātsaptadaśe 'hanyapi yāgaḥ prasajyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3747: atrāpavasathasya sthānāni caturdaśī pañcadaśī ṣoḍaśī na tu trayodaśī saptadaśīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3759: āvartanāt prāk yadi parvasandhiḥ sadyastadā vā kriyate samastaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3761: evaṃ ca“pūrvo paurṇamāsīmuttarāṃ vopavaset“ityupakramya“sadyo vā prātaḥ“iti
GSD36mvir_sau:3765: madhyandināt syādahanīha yasmin prāk parvaṇaḥ sandhiriyaṃ tṛtīyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3769: atreyamiti paurṇamāsyevocyate na tvamāvāsyā asyā evāparāhṇarātrisandhibhyāṃ pūrvaṃ dvaividhyābidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3773: idamapi dvyahakālatve pratipattṛtīyāṃśalābha eva na caturthāṃśalābhe tasyāparāhṇasandhāveva“sandhiryadyaparāhṇe syāt“itivākyena vihitatvāditi
GSD36mvir_sau:3774: atra ca yadā parvasandhau iṣṭistadā antimaḥ padārthaḥ pratipadyeva anuṣṭheyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3781: yadaṣṭyi paśunā somena vā yajeta so 'māvāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā yajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:3783: tathā darśavikṛtau paurṇamāsyapi pūrṇamāsavikṛtāvamāvāsyāpi ityavyavasthā ca vidhīyata iti vyutpāditaṃ pañcamopāntye /
GSD36mvir_sau:3786: kṛttikāḥ prathamaṃ viśākhe uttamaṃ tāni devanakṣatrāṇi teṣu kurvīta yatkārī syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3790: etacca na darśapūrṇamāsau prati pravartate prākaraṇikena niravakāśena paurṇamāsyādikālenānārabhyādhītasya
GSD36mvir_sau:3791: sāvakāśasya nakṣatrasya pāñcadaśyena sāptadaśyasya dīkṣaṇīyāsvareṇopāṃśutvasyeva bādhitvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3794: yaḥ paramo viprakarṣaḥ sūryācandramasauḥ sā paurṇamāsī yaḥ paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ sāmāvāsyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3796: tatra ca sāṅgaprayogānuṣṭhānāsambhavād“yadīṣṭyā“iti vākyena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāpadalakṣitayoḥ sandhimadahorātrayorvikṛtervidhānādāvartane tataḥ prāgvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3797: parvasandhau ca prakṛterapi tatraiva vidhānādyugapatprakṛtivikṛtyoḥ prasaktau prakṛteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:3798: pūrvedyuḥ prārabdhatvādantarā karmāntarānuṣṭhānāsambhavāt prakṛtau ca prātaḥkālasyaupadeśikatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:3799: prakṛtiṃ kṛtvā vikṛtiḥ kartavyeti yājñikā āhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3806: na cāvartanāt parataḥ sandhau vikṛteḥ prāthamye prakṛteraupadeśikānvādhānakālabādhaḥ syāditi vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3807: anvādhānasyāṅgatvena tatkālasya pradhānāśritena vikṛtikālena“aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyāt” (a. 12 pā. 2 adhi. 9)
GSD36mvir_sau:3809: evaṃ sutyā yadyapyapūrvā tathāpi tadahareva kartavyā yadīṣṭyaṃtivacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3811: yasmin kāle 'māvāsyā sampadyeta tayeṣṭvāthaitayā yajeta yadi paurṇa māsī syāttayeṣṭyātha pūrṇamāsena yajate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3817: somasya vai rājño 'rdhamāsasya rātrayaḥ patnaya āsan tāsāmamāvāsyāṃ paurṇamāsīṃ ca nopait /
GSD36mvir_sau:3818: itiśrutau tacchabdanirdiṣṭarātryoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdaprayogā dāgopālāṅganaṃ tathāprasiddheśca tithivācakatvāvagateḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3832: yadā prācyāṃ gacchaṃścandraḥ pratyagavasthitasūryaprayuktabhūcchāyāṃ praviśati tadā candroparāga ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3852: asnāyī mṛtyumāpnoti snāyī pāpaṃ na vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:3854: prahaṇe saṅkrame caiva na snāyādyadi mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3855: saptajanmāni kuṣṭhī syāt duḥkhabhāgī ca jāyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:3862: atra yathāvidhītigrahaṇāt yat smṛtiratnāvalyāmuktametadamantrakaṃ snānamiti tat parāstam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3864: tisro nadyo mahāpuṇyā veṇī godā ca jāhnavī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3865: (*)gāṃ harīśāṅgataḥ prāptā gaṅgā iti hi kīrttitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3866: (*) kālamādhave tu gāṃ harīśāṅghikāt iti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3870: hareḥ padādīśvarasya śiraso gāṃ bhūmiṃ prāptā gaṅgā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3874: nyāyena jāhavyā sahanirdiṣṭayostayorapi gaṅgātvamaviruddhamiti vyākhyātaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3886: ādityakiraṇaiḥ pūtaṃ punaḥ pūtaṃ ca vahninā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3897: sarvaṃ gaṅgāsamaṃ toyaṃ sarve brahmasamā dvijāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3900: atra jalamātrasya gaṅgāsamatvoktyā prāśastyābhidhānenāvihitasya stutyānarthakyādarthavādeva yena kenāpi jalena snāyāditi vidhirunneyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3904: tato 'pi sārasaṃ puṇyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ nadījalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:3909: atra bhūmiṣṭhādeḥ puṇyātiśayatvastutirbhūmiṣṭhādyasambhava uddhṛtādividhyunnayanārthā na tu guṇaphalasambandhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3914: mārge tu grahaṇaṃ śastaṃ devikāyāṃ mahāmune/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3915: pauṣe tu narmadā puṇyā māghe sannihitā śubhā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3916: phālgune varuṇā puṇyā caitre puṇyā sarasvatī //
GSD36mvir_sau:3918: jyeṣṭhaṃ tu kauśikī puṇyā āṣāḍhe tāpikā nadī //
GSD36mvir_sau:3919: śrāvaṇe sindhunāmā tu tathā bhādre tu gaṇḍakī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3925: yadyapi pauṣe tu narmadā puṇyetyādau deśaprādhānyaṃ pratīyate tathāpi“kārttike grahaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ“ityupakramānurodhāt sarvatra grahaṇasyaiva prādhānyamanusandheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3928: sūrye ca rāhuṇā graste tamobhūte mahāmune/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3932: gaṅgā kanakhalaṃ puṇyaṃ prayāgaḥ puṣkaraṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3944: gāvo nāgāstilā dhānyaṃ ratnāni kanakaṃ mahīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:3947: atra kurukṣetre yat phalaṃ labhyate iti siddhavannirdeśānupapattyā kurukṣetre gavādi dadyāditi vidhirunneyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3962: ayanādau sadā deyaṃ dravyamiṣṭaṃ gṛhe ca yat /
GSD36mvir_sau:3966: yathā snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sūryasya grahaṇe divā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3967: somasyāpi tathā rātrau snānaṃ dānaṃ vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3988: bhūmirgāṃvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vā dhānyaṃ vā yadyadīpsitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3999: snānaṃ vidhāya gaṅgādau prāṇāyāmaṃ ca tarpaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4009: tata ādimadhyāvasāneṣu yadyad vihitaṃ tasya tasya phalādiśayārthamiti mādhavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4012: manuṣyā madhyakāle tu mokṣakāle tu rākṣasāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4018: rāhusparśe dvayoḥ snātvā dānādau kalpate naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4040: snāne naimittike prāpte nārī yadi rajasvalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4050: tena candragrahaṇe 'pi sapiṇḍādivārṣikamannādinā taddina eva kāryamiti madanapārijāta eva vyākhyātam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4054: taddine copavāsaḥ syāt pratyabdaṃ tu pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:4057: pratyabdaṃ tu tadā kāryaṃ pare 'hanyeva sarvadā //
GSD36mvir_sau:4061: darśasaṅkrāntyādiśrāddhakāle uparāge tu upa rāgaśrāddhenaiva siddhiḥ prasaṅgāt kāmyena ca nityasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:4063: sūtake matake caiva na doṣo rāhudarśane /
GSD36mvir_sau:4068: asnāyī mṛtyumāpnoti snāyī pāpaṃ na vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:4072: etenāśauca uparāge snānameva kāryaṃ na dānaśrāddhādīti jīmūtavāhanamatamapāstam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4074: yāvattāvacchabdābhyāṃ sparśādimokṣāntavyāpiśuddhyabhi dhānaṃ snānamātrārthatve 'narthakaṃ syāt snānasya sparśakālīnatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4082: sūtake mṛtake caiva na dauṣo rāhudarśane /
GSD36mvir_sau:4089: na hyuparāge nimitte mahādānādi vidhīyate kintu saṅkrāntyādāvivāṅnabhūta uparāgakāle /
GSD36mvir_sau:4094: aśrotriyaḥ śrotriyo vā pātraṃ vāpātrameva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4101: (*) na vidyayā kevalayā tapasā vāpi pātratā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4102: yatra vṛttamime cobhe taddhi pātraṃ prakīrtitam //
GSD36mvir_sau:4122: bhūmidānaṃ pātra eveti niyamaparaṃ vā vacanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4136: snehapakvaṃ ca tailaṃ ca na kadācit praduṣyati //
GSD36mvir_sau:4141: āranālaṃ ca takraṃ ca hyādeyaṃ ghṛtapācitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4149: tena rāhudarśane vāritakrādi tilakuśayutaṃ kuryāditi vidhīyate na duṣyatīti doṣābhāvastu nityanuvādaḥ tilakuśāyoge doṣaḥ syāditikhyāpanāyetyarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4151: pretaśrāddhe yaducchiṣṭaṃ grahe paryuṣitaṃ ca yat /
GSD36mvir_sau:4161: na svapenna ca bhuñjīta snātvā bhuñjīta muktayoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4164: mukte śaśini bhuñjīta yadi na syānmahāniśā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4169: ubhayato dve dve militvā vā dve ekaikamubhayata ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4193: atra ca na bhojanaṃ vidhīyate kintu rāgataḥ prāpte bhojane kālo nithamyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4198: “rathantare prastūyamāne 'bhiṇī sammīlayet“iti vihitasammīlanasya“svardṛśaṃ prati vīkṣeta“iti svardṛśapadāvadhisamarpaṇavat /
GSD36mvir_sau:4201: sāyāhne grahaṇaṃ cet syādaparāhṇe na bhojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4202: aparāhṇe na madhyāhne madhyāhne na tu saṅgave /
GSD36mvir_sau:4203: bhuñjīta saṅgave cet syānna pūrvaṃ bhojanakriyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4207: sāyāhnādau grahaṇe 'śaktānāṃ krameṇāparāhṇādāveva bhojananiṣedhastato 'rvāṅ na doṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4209: anenaiva nyāyena candroparāge 'pi bālādīnāṃ śeṣivirodho mābhūditi rātriṃ pañcadhā vibhajya pañcamabhāga uparāge caturthe na bhoktavyaṃ caturtha uparāge tṛtīye netyeva kalpanīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4215: ityādiṣvavadeyeṣu ājyapaśupuroḍāśeṣu haviḥṣu avadānahetavaḥ sruvādyā avyavasthitā
GSD36mvir_sau:4217: sahakāriṇītyaṅgīkartavyaṃ tasmācchaktisahāyo vidhireva yathāsāmarthyaṃ vidheyaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4218: tataśca dravadravyasyājyasya sruvo yogyaḥ chedanīyamāṃsasya svadhitiḥ śasraviśeṣaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:4221: arthātusāmarthyāt vidheḥ kalpanā = vyavasthitārthatvakalpanā syāt ekadeśatvātusāmarthyakalpitaśabdasya vidhivākyaikadeśatvāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4224: bhoktavyaṃ tatra pūrvāhṇe na madhyāhne kathañcana //
GSD36mvir_sau:4225: pūrvaṃ niśīthāhnrahaṇaṃ yadā candrasya ve bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:4226: tadā divā na kartavyaṃ bhojanaṃ śikhivāhana/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4249: mukti dṛṣṭvā tu bhuñjīta snānaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4252: kintu candragrahe sā rātristaduttaraṃ dinamityahorātramiti draṣṭavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4263: uparāgakāle tadvedhe ca bhojane prāyaścittamuktaṃ mādhavīye--
GSD36mvir_sau:4274: evaṃ ca raverapi grastāste prātaḥkālīnaṃ snānādi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4278: ahorātroṣitaḥ snānaṃ śrāddhaṃ dānaṃ tathā japam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4279: yaḥ karoti prasannātmā tasya syādakṣayaṃ ca tat //
GSD36mvir_sau:4285: atropoṣita iti niṣṭhayopoṣyeti ca pūrvakālavihitapratyayācca pūrvedyurupavāsa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:4295: candrasūryagrahe caiva na kuryāt putravān gṛhī //
GSD36mvir_sau:4301: (a. 1 pā. 8 adhi. 3)bhavatu vā paryudāsastathāpi saṅkrāntyādiprayukte svatantropavāsa eva yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4302: anyathā śuklaikādaśyādāvayanapāta ekādaśyupavāsa uparāge mahādānāṅgabhūtopavāse cāndrāyaṇādyupavāse 'pi paryudāsaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4304: “yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhate“ityatra pūrvapakṣe dīkṣāyā iva karttṛsaṃskāradvārā srānārthatvāvagamāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4306: ata eva puraścaraṇāṅgabhṛtamupavāsaṃ putravanto 'pi gṛhasthā ācaranto dṛśyante śiṣṭā avigonana /
GSD36mvir_sau:4307: tammādahorātroṣitaḥ snātvetyādyaṅgabhūta upavāsaḥ putravadgṛ hasthasyāpi bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4325: yatrāpi“rāhudarśana“ityādau na tttkāśrutiḥ kintu svaparasādhāraṇadarśanamātravācī dṛśistatrāpi“ekatra dṛṣṭa“iti nyāyena karttṛgatadarśanalābhaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4326: ata eva rātrau revardine candrasya grahaṇe na snānādiprāptiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4337: tatra snānaṃ na kurvīta dadyāddānaṃ ca na kvacit //
GSD36mvir_sau:4340: atha darśanaśabdena cākṣuṣajñānaviṣyatvayogyatā vivakṣyate tathā ca na rātridinoparāge 'tiprasaṅgastathāpi grahaṇadeśīyacākṣuṣatvena deśāntarīyāṇāmadhikārāpattiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4342: na ca yasmin deśe yaścandrasūryoparāgaścākṣuṣajñānayogyaḥ sa tasmin deśe uditahome sūryodayavat karmanimittamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4344: atha samānakartṛkacākṣuṣajñānaviṣayatvayogyatā vivakṣyate tarhi tadviṣayataivāstu viśeṣaṇatvena pūrvopasthiteḥ kiṃ yogyatayā jaghanyopasthitayā,
GSD36mvir_sau:4346: tasmāccākṣuṣa evoparāge snānādi kāryaṃ nāndhādibhirabhracchane voparāgaiti prācyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4352: (a. 6 pā. 4 adhi. 6)na ca“mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇam“itinyāyena haviṣārttirivoparāgeṇa
GSD36mvir_sau:4353: darśanaṃ viśeṣyata itivācyam prativasantaṃ somayāgāvṛttivat“amedhyaṃ dṛṣṭvā japatyavaddhaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:4362: naca niṣedhasya rāgaprāptaviṣayatvenopapatterna vaidhe darśane pravṛttiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4364: nanu na brhanāṇḍapurāṇāduparāgasvarūpaṇaśucitvāpādakaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ deśāntarīyoparāgeṇa deśāntarīyāṇāmāśaucāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4368: brahmāṇḍavacanaṃ tu samparkamātreṇāśucitvaṃ kimut taddarśanenetyevaṃparam ata eva mātracprayogāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4369: tathā cāśucitvāsyāpi sānānāderiva darśananimittakatvāt prāk darśanādaśucitvābhāvānniṣedhāpravṛttyāsti darśanaprasaktiriti syādeva nimittateticet
GSD36mvir_sau:4373: asnāyī mṛtyumāpyanoti snāyī pāpaṃ na vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:4376: sūtake mṛtake caiva na doṣo rāhudarśane /
GSD36mvir_sau:4377: ityanena jananamaraṇāśauce darśanapratiprasavadarśanādāśauce 'pi adhikārāvighāt iti cet, na /
GSD36mvir_sau:4378: na hyetena darśanaṃ pratiprasūyate kintu tannimittaṃ snānādi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4381: evaṃ ca jananādyāśauce niṣedhapravṛttyā darśanāprasakterna doṣo rāhudarśane ityanuvādānupapattiranadhikāraśca pūrvokta eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4387: tatra samānadeśīyadarśanayogyatvādinā viśeṣaṇe tatra tatroparāgasvarūpsaya nimittatvāvagateḥ sarvatra dadevāstu kimardhajaratyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4388: kiñca kvaciduparāga sya kvaciddarśanasya nimittatā śrūyate tatrāvaśyambhāvinyanyatarasya
GSD36mvir_sau:4392: ata eva“iḍānta ātithya“ityatra nityayā pūrveḍayaiva tadantatā nānityayottarayeḍayetyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4393: (a. 1 pā. 7 adi. 13) kiñca grahaṇasyāsambandhikatvānnimittatā yuktā na tu darśanasya sasambandhikasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:4395: (9 pā. 2 adhi. 5) kiñcoparāgasvarūpasya nimittatve“na doṣo rāhudarśane“ityanuvādānupapattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4396: na ca pramādādbuddhipūrvaṃ vā niṣedhātikramāt sañjāte darśane naimittikaṃ snānādi vidhīyata iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4397: niṣedhātikramajanitapratyavāyaparihārasyopāyāpekṣatvāt snānādeśca prayojanāpekṣatvāt aśvapratigraheṣṭimantrānuvacanayoḥ“na keśariṇo dadāti” (a. 3 pā. 4 adhi. 14)
GSD36mvir_sau:4400: tathāca niṣadhaikavākyatvena tadatikrama eva snānādividyāpattyoparāgasāmānye snānādividhirdurlabhaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4402: ca niṣiddhaviṣayatvānmantravacanasya ca“tasmādūyūpo nopaspṛśya“iti prakramya vidhānādyuktaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:4405: kintu kathañcidapi vidhito niṣedhābhāvādvā niṣedhātikramādvā prasaktaṃ darśanamanūdya yo darśanavān sa snāyaditividhānāt sulabhataraḥ sāmānyavidhiḥ syāditi cet, na /
GSD36mvir_sau:4411: kiṃ bahunā buddhipūrvakārī balānnimittaṃ sampādya na ko 'pi duḥkhākare snānādau pravartteteti sakalo vidhirapramāṇīkṛtaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4412: kiñca saṅkrame pūrvottarakālayoḥ puṇyatvam uparāge tu yāvaddarśanaviṣayatā tāvadeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4415: na ca dṛśerbhramapramāsādhāraṇatvājjale pratibimbabhramavataḥ sa evāyaṃ candra iti bimbapratyabhijñāpramāvato vā snānāvirodha iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4418: ata eva nopaghātāgnivaddarśa naviśiṣṭa uparāgo nimittaṃ pūrvoktadoṣānativṛtteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4420: na coddeśyaviśeṣaṇaṃ darśanaṃ vivakṣitaṃ havirubhayatvavadavi vakṣitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4421: nanvitthaṃ vyākulayato darśanasya māstu nimittatvaṃ kintu nīhārakarttṛkasandhyāharaṇe
GSD36mvir_sau:4422: darśanaviśaiṣṭajapavidhivaduparāga eva nimitte darśanaviśiṣṭaṃ snānādi tattadvākyavihitasnānādyanuvādena
GSD36mvir_sau:4427: noparaktamityādiniṣedhasya vaidhe 'pravṛtternāśucī rāhutārakā iti niṣedhasyai tanmate darśanottaraṃ pravṛtteḥ sarveṣāmadhikāro bhaviṣyatīti yukto 'yaṃ panthā iti cet, na yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4432: ṛtā vā yasya rodasī iti śaṃsati cakṣurvākṣataṃ tasmādyataro vivadamānayorāhāhamanuṣṭayā cakṣuṣādarśamiti tasya śraddadhati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4440: astu vā cākṣuṣajñānavācitā tathāpi na darśane vidhiḥ sambhavati tasya pakṣaprāptatve 'pūrvavidhyasambhavāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:4445: na hi kāmya iva naimittikeṣu sarvāṅgopasaṃhāraḥ nimittatvavyāghātāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4448: na hi sarvadā sarvaḥ sāṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ samarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4449: tasmāt kiñcidaṅgahānenāpi naimittikādhikārādandhādīnāṃ meghacchanne vā darśanarūpāṅgalope 'pi snānādyadhikāro durnirvāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4450: ata eva na naimittikānurodhena nimittasaṅkocaḥ nimittaśrutivyāghātāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4455: na ceha pradhānabhūtasnānādināndhādervirodho yena tadatiriktaviṣayatā kalpyeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:4469: (a. 11 pā. 3 adhi 5) tatra yūpasya tantratvena tadanuniṣpādiprathamaśakalasyaikatvāt tadrūpatvāt svarostantratā yuktā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4472: na ca darśanasya snānamātrāṅgatvācchrāddhādau ca taduttarakālatvasya snānottaratvenārthasiddhatvādanāvṛttiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4475: nanu darśanasya nimittaniścayatvenādhikārasampādanopayogitayāṅgatvāt sakṛddarśane 'pi tanniścayasya jātatvādanāvṛttiriticet, na, /
GSD36mvir_sau:4478: atha tatra sāyaṅkālāvacchinnajīvananiścayavato 'dhikārastadā prakṛte 'pi grasyamānādikālāvacchinnoparāgadarśanavataḥ snānādāvadhikāra iti tulyaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4479: kiñca sphayasya bhaktāśleṣanimittejyāyāṃ pūrvakartavyāvāhana iva jyotiḥśāstrādinā
GSD36mvir_sau:4481: trirātropavāsādau ca niṣkampaṃ na ko 'pi pravartteta /
GSD36mvir_sau:4482: kiñca darśanasya nimittatve uparāge snāyādityādau uparāgādipade darśanalakṣaṇāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4483: uparāgasya nimittatve darśane 'pi sā tulyaiveticet, satyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4484: rāhudarśane snāyāditi saptamīyuktavākyeṣu“yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam” (2 / 3 /
GSD36mvir_sau:4487: ca snānādeḥ kartumaśakyatvāt“sakṛtpravṛttāyā“itinyāyena yogyatālakṣaṇāyā api tatraiva ucitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4488: yasya gorbhāvena dohanakriyārūpadhātvarthena bhāvasya gamanasya lakṣaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ gamanaparicchedakālādipratipādanaṃ tatra saptamī syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4489: ata eva saptamyantadṛśiyukteṣu na darśanavidhiḥ prasiddhasya lakṣaṇatvādaprasiddhasya tadayogāt abhiśabdādivadbhāvalakṣaṇavihitasaptamyā vidhiśaktipratibandhāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4491: kiñca na ktvānteṣu darśanavidhiḥ ktvo 'vidhāyakatvātsnātyādeḥ parasya tu vidheḥ snānādividhāyakatvādviśiṣṭavidhau
GSD36mvir_sau:4498: tatra snānaṃ na kurvīta dadyāddānaṃ na ca kvacit //
GSD36mvir_sau:4499: itideśāntarīyoparāgasya paryudāsāt samāne deśe cākṣuṣatvayogyamuparāgaṃ śāstrato jñātvā tattatkāle snānādi kuryāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4500: janmarāśyādau grahaṇe doṣastatra ca śāntikāni śāntiprakāśe draṣṭavyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4516: evaṃ ca mantrasiddhiḥ syāddevatā ca prasīdati //
GSD36mvir_sau:4523: puraścaraṇaṃ ca na grastodaye grastāste ca bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4527: ata eva naśrāddhādyapi puraścaraṇānuṣṭhātṝṇā bhavati kāmyena nityasya bādhācceti kaścit /
GSD36mvir_sau:4528: vastutastu kāmyavidheḥ śrāddhādyanadhikāriṇaṃ pratyapi caritārthatvānna nityabādhakatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4549: ekabhaktaṃ tu tatproktaṃ nyūnaṃ grāsatrayeṇa tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:4559: tatra dinadvaye tadvyāpto tadasparśe vā pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4566: kṣayavṛddhisāmyāni ca sarvatra ṣaṣṭhighaṭikāpekṣayā na tu pūrvatithyādyapekṣayeti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:4576: yathā hi mukhyakālavyāptyanurodhena nirṇayaḥ sambhavati na yugmavākyādaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4581: tena yatra viśiṣya gauṇakālavidhistatra tadvyāptyāpi nirṇaya iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4582: anyāṅgabhūtamekabhaktaṃ tat pradhāne nirṇītāyāṃ tithau madhyāhne kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4585: (a. 12 pā. 2 adhi. 9 sū. 25) ata eva yatra
GSD36mvir_sau:4593: ata eva navarātravratasyāpi naktavratatvaṃ mādhavādyuktaṃ saṅgacchata ityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4602: yadā tu dviguṇā cchāyāṃ kurvaṃstapati bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4603: tatra naktaṃ vijānīyānna naktaṃ niśi bhojanam //
GSD36mvir_sau:4604: iti sauradharmādiṣu dināntyamuhūrtātmakau dviguṇacchāyopalakṣitaḥ kālo vihitaḥ sa gauṇaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4615: niśānaktaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ yāmārddhe prathame sadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4619: āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca caturthakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:4624: iti ghaṭikātraye 'pi sandhyāśabdaḥ sa sandhyāgarjitādau bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4626: ata eva ravivārādiprayuktarātribhojananiṣedhe satyapi tatra naktānuṣṭhānamuktaṃ hemādriprabhṛtibhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4628: vastutastu vidhiniṣedhayoravirodhāt tridhaṭikottarameva naktaṃ kāryaṃ mukhyakālalābhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4629: anyathā“na kesariṇodadāti“ityasyāpi vihitāśvadāne 'pravṛtteraśvānāmapi“tasya dvādaśaśataṃ“ityatra tasyeti tacchabdena parāmarṣāt dvādaśaśatāpattiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4637: itisumantunā evakāreṇa sauranakte sāmānyataḥ prāptarātribhojanasya niṣedhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4638: mādhavastu“ye tvādityadina“iti vākyādādityavārādau divaiva gauṇakāle naktamityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:4641: yatiśca vidhavā caiva kuryāt tat sadivākaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:4643: tadevaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ pradoṣa eva mukhyo naktakālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4644: tatra dinadvaye mukhyakālavyāpitve tadasparśe vā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4646: asparśa ca naikabhaktavanmukhyakāle bhojanaṃ kintu sāyāhna eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4650: evaṃ jñātvā tato vidvān sāyāhne tu bhujikriyām //
GSD36mvir_sau:4655: tatra sāyānharūpasya mukhyasya pradoṣarūpasya ca gauṇasya kālasya sattvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4656: ayaṃ ca nirṇayo na bhojanarūpa eva nakte kintu pūjādirūpe 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4658: anyāṅga upavāsapratinidhau vā nakte tu ekabhaktavadeva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4661: tatra yadekabhaktanaktādiviruddhaṃ tithidvayaprayuktamekasmin dine prāpnoti tatra pūrvaprārabdhayordvayoḥ pūrvatithiprayuktamanupasañjātavirodhitvānmukhyakalpena
GSD36mvir_sau:4663: idaṃ ca yadyuttaradine dvitīyagauṇakālo na labhyate tadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4673: ayācitānnabhojanaṃ tu yadaiva labhyate tadaiva divā
GSD36mvir_sau:4679: upoṣitavyaṃ yenāstaṃ yāti caiva tu bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4686: tatra saṅkramasvarūpaṃ tāvat ravibimbamadhyaparamāṇormeṣādirāśyādya paramāṇāśce sambandhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4693: te ca saṅkrāntisāmānyanimittakeṣu vidhipratiṣadheṣu samāḥ sādhāraṇā ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4710: golaṃ ca viṣuvāyanābhyāṃ yuktaṃ rāśicakraṃ tanmadhye 'parā ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4720: sūrye ghorā vidhau dvāṅkṣī bhaume caiva mahodarī /
GSD36mvir_sau:4723: mandā dhruveṣu vijñeyā mṛdau mandākinī tathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:4738: sannihitakāla anuṣṭhānamarthasiddhaṃ yathā sandhikālavihitayordarśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sandhāvanuṣṭhātumaśakyatvena sannihitakāle karaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4739: sa ca sannihitakālaḥ kimubhayataḥ kiṃvānyatarataḥ kiyāṃścetyapekṣāyām--
GSD36mvir_sau:4743: tadyogātusaṅkrāntiyuktātsūkṣmakālādadha urdhvaṃ ca militvā triṃśannāḍyo 'tra śāstrakāraiḥ pāvitritāḥ snānādyanuṣṭhānayogyāḥ kṛtā ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4744: idaṃ ca ubhayataḥ pañcadaśaghaṭikāpuṇyatvavacanaṃ ravibimbaparimāṇānāṃ jyotiḥ--śāstre matabhedena bhinnatvādyanmate spaṣṭabhuktyarddhaṃ ravibimbaṃ tanmatābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4746: taduttarakālaṃ ca tāvatībhireva ghaṭikābiruttarabhāgasyāpi meṣādirāśicakrānupraveśo jyotiḥśāstre grasiddhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4753: arvāk ṣoḍaśa vijñeyā nāḍyaḥ paścācca ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:4760: ityādīni śātātapamarīcijābālivākyāni tāni yanmate nijapañcadaśāṃśayuktabhuktyarthaṃ ravibimbaṃ tanmatābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4761: ataśca bimbaparimāṇabhedena ṣoḍaśa pañcadaśa vā ghaṭikā ubhayataḥ pratyekaṃ puṇyakāla iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4765: iti devalavacanāt saṅkrāntikālāt pūrvaṃ triṃśannāḍyaḥ puṇyāḥ paścācca triṃśannāḍyaḥ puṇyāḥ / yāni
GSD36mvir_sau:4769: yāni tu kvaciduttaratra kkacit pūrvatra kvacidubhayatretyevaṃ saṅkrāntiviśeṣakālavidhāyakāni vakṣyamāṇavacanāni tāni puṇyādhikyapratipādanārthāni
GSD36mvir_sau:4779: ayanādau sadā deyaṃ dravyamiṣṭaṃ gṛheṣu yat /
GSD36mvir_sau:4782: dānādividhipratīteḥ sūkṣmakāle ca dānādyanupapatteḥ sthūlakālāpekṣāyām“arvāk ṣoḍaśa
GSD36mvir_sau:4783: vijñeyā“ityādyuparitanena vacanena ubhayataḥ ṣoḍaśaghaṭikārūpasthūlakālavidheḥ sarvasaṅkrāntiviṣayatvasya spaṣṭatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4789: evaṃ ca sarvasaṅkrāntisādhāraṇyena ubhayataḥṣoḍaśaghaṭikāpuṇyatvavacanaiḥ ubhayataḥ puṇyatve sthite viśeṣavacanāni puṇyātiśayārthāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4792: madhye tu viṣuve puṇyaṃ prāgviṣṇau dakṣiṇāyane /
GSD36mvir_sau:4798: vastutastu vṛttaṃ vartanaṃ bhāve ktaḥ vartamānakāle iti anantabhaṭṭavyākhyaiva yuktā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4801: idaṃ ca viṣṇupadīṣu prāk puṇyatvavacanaṃ praśastataratvadyotanārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4804: ataśca viṣṇupadyāṃ parāḥ ṣoḍaśa ghaṭikā itarasaṅkrāntyepakṣayā puṇyatarāḥ pūrvāḥ ṣoḍaśa puṇyatamā iti vyavasthā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4806: anye tu viṣṇupadīpūrvakālapuṇyatvaprātapādavākyasya nirmulatvāt skāndavacanādubhayata eva ṣāḍaśa ghāṭakāḥ puṇyakāla ityāhnuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4811: iti vacane cabdena itarasaṅkrāntyapekṣayā ubhayataḥ puṇyataratvasya sūcitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4815: triṃśat karkaṭake nāḍyo makare viṃśatiḥ parā //
GSD36mvir_sau:4816: brahmavaivartte tu makare tu daśādhikā iti caturthapādaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4818: ayane viṃśatiḥ pūrvā makare viṃśatiḥ parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4820: atra sarvatra viruddhānāṃ vacanānāṃ puṇyādhikyaparatvena vyavasthā draṣṭavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4832: taṃ ca hemādriḥ pratyekaṃ pañcadaśeti militvā ṣaṣṭiriti vyākhyātavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:4833: viṣṇupadyāṃ tu saṅkhayāviśeṣasya aśravaṇāt sāmānyavacanoktā eva ṣoḍaśaghaṭikāḥ pūrvaṃ puṇyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4835: tulāmeṣayoḥ prāgūrcvaṃ daśa daśa ghaṭikāḥ puṇyāḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:4843: atra caitāḥ pūrvabhoginya uttarabhoginyo ubhayatobhoginyo vā yadi divāmadhryāhnādiṣu jāyante tadā divaiva tatra tatroktapraśastakālalābhāt sapteva
GSD36mvir_sau:4845: bhoginyāṃ vā astāt pūrvaṃ jāyamānāyāṃ divā pūrvottarau praśastakālau na labhyate
GSD36mvir_sau:4847: kālasya grahaṇaṃ na punaḥ praśastakālabhrāntyā rātreriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4852: atra hi pūrvārddham ahni madhyāhnādau saṅkramaṇe 'haḥpuṇyatvasya pūrvottaranāḍīpuṇyavacanaireva
GSD36mvir_sau:4853: siddhatvānna yathāśrutārthaparaṃ kintu uktaviṣaye praśastakālalābhena prasaktasya
GSD36mvir_sau:4855: ataścodayānantarame va pūrvabhoginyāmastāt pūrvaṃ vottarabhoginyāṃ jāyamānāyāmahanyeva snānādyanuṣṭhayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4856: yāsu tu ubhayatobhoginīṣu ubhayorapi kālayoḥ sāmyaṃ tāsu divāpi praśastakālalābhāt na rātrāvanuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4859: yā yāḥ sannihitā nāḍyastāstāḥ puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4863: iti vacanācca rātrerapi puṇyakālatvaṃ prāpnoti, tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:4864: rātrau saṅkramaṇe bhānordivā kuryāttu tat kriyām //
GSD36mvir_sau:4866: sa ca na sampūrṇaṃ dinaṃ kintu rātrau saṅkramaṇe bhānorddinārddhaṃ snānadānayoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4868: tadāpi ca yadyarddharātrāt pūrvaṃ saṅkramastadā pūrvadinasya yadyūrdhvaṃ tadottarasya yadā tu ardharātre tadobhayoriti vyavasthitamityāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:4872: sampūrṇe arddharātre tu yadā saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4878: mādhavastu tṛtīyapraharasya prathamaghaṭikā dvitīyasya cāntyetyevaṃ ghaṭikādvayamarddharātramityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:4879: dinadvayaṃ ca na sampūrṇaṃ kintu arddhāvacchinnameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4887: vastutastu etasya anantabhaṭṭena nirmūlatvasyoktatvāt hemādpyādivyākhyaiva jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:4888: tasmāt pūrṇe arddharātre saṅkrame pūrvadinottarārddhamuttaradinapūrvārddhaṃ ca puṇyaṃ sannidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4889: tadapi na samuccayena kintu vikalpena anyathā pradhānāvṛttyāpatteḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:4890: so 'pi pūrvadinottarārddhavarttitithyā yadyabhinnā saṅkramakālīnā tithirbhavet tadā pūrvadinottarārddham,
GSD36mvir_sau:4891: yadā tu dvitīyadinapūrvārddhatithyā abhinnā tadottaradinapūrvārddhaṃ grāhyamityevaṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4897: arddharātrasaṅkrame yadi pūrvadinottarārddhe saṅkramakāle ca ekaiva tithirbhavet tadādau
GSD36mvir_sau:4901: ardharātrottaraṃ sakraṅme tu bhinnāyāmabhinnāyāṃ vā pūrvadinatithau pare 'hanyevetyuttarārdhārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4902: yadā tu ardharātrasaṅkramakālīnā tithirdinadvayārdhayorapi bhavati tadā pūrvabhīginīṣu
GSD36mvir_sau:4913: ardharātrāt pūrvaṃ saṅkrame pūrvadinottarārdhaṃ taduttaraṃ saṅkrame uttaradinapūrvārdhe
GSD36mvir_sau:4914: niśīthasaṅkrame tu yadi pūrvadinottarārdhavarttitithyābhinnāyāṃ tithau saṅkramaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4915: tadā pūrvādanottarārdhaṃ yadi tu uttaradinapūrvārdhavarttitithyābhinnāyāṃ tithau
GSD36mvir_sau:4916: saṅkramastadā uttaradinapūvārdhaṃ yadā tu dinadvayārdhavarttitithyābhinnāyāṃ tithau
GSD36mvir_sau:4922: pūrvāhne pañca nāḍyastu puṇyāḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4923: aparāhṇe ca pañcaiva śraute smārtte ca karmaṇi //
GSD36mvir_sau:4926: iyaṃ ca rātrisaṅkramavyavasthā ayanabhinnaviṣayā pūrvodāhṛtavaśiṣṭhavacanena sakalasya rātrinirṇayasya ayane“muktvā makarakarkaṭau“iti paryudāsāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4929: prabhāte vā niśīthe vā kuryādahani pūrvataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4930: kārmukaṃ tu parityajya jñaṣaṃ saṅkramate raviḥ /
