GSD36mvir_sau:4931: pradoṣe vārdharātre vā snānaṃ dānaṃ pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:4932: ityādibhaviṃṣyottaravacanānusārādarddharātratadūrdhvasaṅkrame 'pi karke 'hanyeva puṇyaṃ pūrvaṃ makare tu arddharātratadadhaḥsaṅkrame 'pi pare 'hanyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4933: evaṃ ca rātrisaṅkrame 'pi divāpuṇyatvavidhānādarthādrātrau snānādipratiṣedha unnīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4935: yathātraiva tāvadvaśiṣṭhavacane sarvasaṅkrāntisādhāraṇarātrisaṅkramaṇanimittakadivākartavyatvasyāyane--“muktvā makarakarkaṭau“iti paryudāsāttatra rātrāvapi kartavyatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4947: itiparyudāso na sakalasya rātrinirṇayasya kintu sannihitasyārddharātrasaṅkramaṇanimittakasya dinadvayasyaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4949: yathā itarasaṅkrāntiṣu arddharātre jāyamānāsu dinadvayaṃ puṇyaṃ na tathā ayane tasmiṃstu
GSD36mvir_sau:4950: arddharātre jāyamāne pūrvodāhṛtabhaviṣyottaravacanānmakare uttaraṃ dinaṃ karke pūrvaṃ puṇyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4951: bhaviṣyottaravākye hi na pradoṣa arddharātre vā jāyamānāyā makarasaṅkrānteḥ paradine puṇyaṃ prabhāte 'rddharātre vā jāyamānāyāḥ karkasaṅkrānteḥ pūrvadine puṇyamiti pratipādyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4954: dinānte pañca nāḍyastu tadā puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4955: udaye ca tathā pañca daive pitrye ca karmaṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4957: ataśca bhaviṣyottaravacanamevaṃ vyākhyeyam“pradoṣe vārddharātre vā“ityatra vāśabdau yathātathārthe“vopamānavikalpayoḥ“iti nighaṇṭusmaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4959: yathā pradoṣe jāyamānāyā makarasaṅkrānteḥ pūrvadinārddhe puṇyaṃ tathā ardadharātre jāyamānāyāḥ pare 'hanīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4961: ataścārddharātrasaṅkrame makare uttaraṃ dinaṃ karke pūrvam,
GSD36mvir_sau:4962: ardharātrādadhaḥ paścādvā saṅkrame tu ubhayatrāpi itarasaṅkrāntisarūpa eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4963: na caivaṃ rātripuṇyatvapratipādakānāṃ yājñavalkyādivacanānāṃ nirviṣayatvāpattiḥ sarvasaṅkrāntiṣu rātrisaṅkrame divaiva puṇyakālābhidhānāditivācyam
GSD36mvir_sau:4967: prācyāstu rātrisannihitadinabhāgasaṅkrāntau ṣoḍaśaghaṭikādirūpavihitasamayena rātrerapi vyāvṛttatvā ttadviṣayatayā rātripuṇyatvavacanānāmupapattirityāhuḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4968: atra ca vihitaṃ snānaśrāddhadānādi niṣiddhaṃ ca yātrāmaithunādi anyato 'nusandheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4969: rave rāśisaṅkramavannakṣatrasaṅkrame grahāntarāṇāṃ ca rāśinakṣatrasaṅkrame snānādyanuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4974: nāḍyaścatasraḥ sapalāḥ kujasya budhasya tisno manavaḥ palāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4984: grahāntarasaṅkrame ca rātrau jāyamāne rātrāveva snānādi kāryaṃ ravisaṅkramavat
GSD36mvir_sau:4994: cāsaṅkrāntatvena saṅkrāntidvayavattvena ca bhavatīti dvedhāmalamāsaḥ adhikamāsaḥ kṣayamāsaśceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4997: yasmin māse na saṅkrāntiḥ saṅkrāntidvayameva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4998: malamāsaḥ sa vijñeyo māsaḥ syāttu trayodaśaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5014: indrāgnī yatra hūyete māsādiḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5017: ādyo malimluco jñeyo dvitīyaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5019: ādyadvitīyaśabdābhyāṃ tasyetaramāsāpekṣayā dvaiguṇyam uttaramāsasaṃjñatvaṃ ca sūcayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:5030: iti vyāsena mīnādisthe ravau pratipadādyalakṣaṇasambandhena caitrādilakṣaṇamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5036: itibrahmaguptoktaṃ caitrādilakṣaṇaṃ tacchuddhamāsābhiprāyeṇa prāyikam na tu mukhyaṃ malamāsāvyāpakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5041: iti jyotiḥśāstre tasya nāmaśūnyatvoktiḥ sā viruddhamalimlucādināmakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5043: atha vā brahmaguptoktameva lakṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ na tu vyāsoktaṃ kṣaye 'sambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5044: adhikasya ca ṣaṣṭidinātmakatvāt tena ca meṣadisaṅkrāntisambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5061: iti pūrvādhimāsānantarametāvati kāle 'tīte sati dvitīyo 'dhimāso madhyamamānena bhavatītyasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5062: atra ca vākye darśāntamāsavivakṣāyāṃ kṛṣṇadvitīyāyāṃ ghaṭikācatuṣṭaye gate 'dhimāsopakramaḥ prāpnoti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5071: yāni tu“māse triṃśattame bhavet“ityādivacanāni tāni sambhavābhiprāyeṇa na tu niyatāni vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5074: sa ca kārttikādiṣu triṣveva bhavati nānyeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:5075: yadā cāyaṃ tadā varṣamadhye kṣayamāsasyobhayato 'dhikamāsadvayaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:5077: kṣayaḥ kārttikāditraye nānyataḥ syāttadā varṣamadhye 'dhimāsadvayaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5079: varṣaṃ cātra pūrvāsaṅkrāntādikaṃ cāndramāsadvādaśakaṃ na tu caitrādikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5089: arthāt kvacit 141 varṣaiḥ kvacicca 122 varṣairvyavadhānaṃ bhavatīti māvaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5090: tathāca pūrvokta 974 saṅkhyāyāṃ 141 saṅkhyāyā melane 1115 jāyate tatra tanmelena 1256 jāyate tatra 122 melane 1378 jāyate ityavadheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5115: yatra māsi ravisaṅkramadvayaṃ tatra māsayugalaṃ kṣayāhvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5117: ata eva pūrvasaṅkrāntyupalakṣitasya kārttikāderuttarasaṅkrāntyupalakṣitamārgaśīrṣādyapekṣayā pṛthagavasthānābhāvāt dvisaṅkrāntaḥ kṣaya ityucyate
GSD36mvir_sau:5119: meṣādisthe savitari yo yo māsaḥ prapūryate cāndraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5121: iti vacanoktalakṣaṇānusārāt kṣaye pūrvarāśisthe ravau darśāntyasamāptyabhāvāduttararāśistharavāveva tatsamāpteruttaramāsarūpatvamevetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5124: yasmin māse na saṅkrāntiḥ saṅkrāntidvayameva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5127: atra pūrvāsaṅkrāntadvisaṅkrāntayoḥ saṃsarpaṃhaspatisaṃjñā uttarāsaṅkrāntatyādhimāsatvaṃ krameṇābhidhānādavagamyate iti madanaratnaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5128: saṃsarpaśca na malamāsaḥ kintu śuddhaḥ uttarastvaśuddhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5132: yadāśvinādiṣaṭke malamāsa ekaḥ aparaśca caitrādiṣaṭke tadā pūrvasya śuddhatvapratipādakaṃ vacanāntaramapi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5137: makare vātha kumbhe vā nādhimāso vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5141: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5152: atra ca malamāsasya trayodaśatvaṃ saṅkrāntiyuktaśuddhadvādaśamāsāpekṣayā na tu vāstavam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5153: atra yadyapi sarvā ityupādānāt sarvakarmaṇāṃ nivṛttipratītistathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5154: iṣṭyādi sarvaṃ kāmyaṃ tu malamāse vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5157: ityādipratiprasavavacanebhyaśca kāmyānāmeva nivṛttiḥ na tu nityanaimittikānām /
GSD36mvir_sau:5175: eteṣāṃ ca nityatvamakaraṇe pratyavāyaśrava ṇādinā bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5177: darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi tattatkālāvacchinne jīvane nimitte vihitānāṃ malamāsa eva kālasamāptiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5186: roge cālabhyayoge ca sīmante puṃsave 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5188: idaṃ cātra kartavyatāvacanaṃ tannimittakasya snānādereva na tu kāmyasya“kāmyaṃ naiva kadācana“iti niṣedhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5215: gauḍāstu na nityapadenāvaśyakartavyapārvaṇaśrāddhādigrahaṇaṃ tathā sati pretaśrāddhāderapi tata eva kartavyatāsiddhau teṣāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇavaiyarthyāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5219: indrāgnī yatra hūyete māsādiḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5222: ādyo malimluco jñeyo dvitīyaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5238: vaśiṣṭhaḥ, saṃvatsaramadhye yadyadhimāso bhavet māsikārthaṃ dinamekaṃ vṛddhiṃ nayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5239: yattvatra jīmūtavāhanenoktam-amāvāsyāmṛtasya tadadhikaraṇakaṃ māsikaṃ na māsavṛddhau varddhanīyaṃ“saṃvatsarātirekeṇa“iti pūrvodāhṛtakauthumivacanāditi, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:5240: asmin vacane māsikānupādānenaitasya tatparatve pramāṇābhāvāduktayuktyā pārvarṇaviṣayatvasyaiva yuktatvāt, /
GSD36mvir_sau:5255: astaṃ gate gurau śukre bāle vṛddhe malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5261: atipāte tu kartavyaṃ praśaste māsi puṣyade //
GSD36mvir_sau:5268: paramānnaṃ tu yo dadyāt pitṝṇāṃ madhunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5279: gajacchāyā tu sā proktā tatra śrāddhaṃ prakalpayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:5281: atra dākṣiṇātyamate gajacchāyādeḥ sagatitve 'pi vacanātkartavyatā bodhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5283: yāni tu sagatikāni tāni nityānyapi na tatra kāryāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5292: tasyā naimittikatve 'pi śeṣivirodhānnimittānantarakālabādhe jāte parvopasaṅgrahavacchuddhakālopasaṅgrahasya nyāyyatvāt sagatikatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5296: kāmyānyapi yāni śeṣivirodhādvilambaṃ na sahante yathā kārīryādīni tāni malamāse 'pi bhavantyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5298: tathā tathaiva kāryāṇi na kālastu vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5300: atra naimittikāni kāmyānīti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā ca duḥsvapnādinimittena kartavyatayopasthitāni kāmyānītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5302: asūryo nāma ye māsā na teṣu mama sammatāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5306: prārabdhaṃ karma yat kiñcit tat kāryaṃ syānmalimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5315: iti malamāse 'pi kāmyakarmaṇaḥ samāptipratipādakaṃ kāṭhakagṛhyaṃ tat sāvanamānopajīvikṛcchracāndrāyaṇāhīnasatrādiviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5320: yastu khamāpanamiti brahmasiddhāntavacane samāptiniṣedhaḥ sa malamāsa eva mohāt prārabdhasya tasya tatraiva samāpane doṣātiśayapradarśanārtha ityādda /
GSD36mvir_sau:5321: tadevaṃ saṅkṣepato varjyatve siddhe prapañcārthaṃ vacanānyudāhiyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:5326: bāle vā yadi vā śukre vṛddhe vāstamupāgate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5337: iti nāradavacena mahādānānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ sa pratyavāyātiśayārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5340: aste sandhyāgate bāle bhṛgau māsi malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5345: anye tu śeṣibādhāpatteravaśyakartavye dānādāvanyeṣāmeva pratiprasavo na mahādānānāṃ teṣāṃ punarniṣedhādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5346: nārāyaṇopādhyāyāstu dānāntarāṇi mumukṣoḥ phalābhisandhiviraheṇa kurvāṇasya malamāse 'pi bhavanti mahādānāni tu na tathā punarniṣedhādityāhuḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5354: kuryānna sāvakāśaṃ māṅgalyaṃ na tu viśeṣejyām //
GSD36mvir_sau:5356: atra sāvakāśamityanenaiva siddhe punarvivāhādigrahaṇaṃ nivakāśatve 'pi pratiṣedhārthamiti smārttaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5361: vastutastu dvitīyādirapi malamāse niṣiddha eva sagatikatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5368: atra hi pūrvārddhagatanindāpokṣito niṣedho na svatantraḥ kalpyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5378: ata eva tīrthayātrāṃ vivarjayediti gārgyavacane pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5384: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5387: malamāse na kartavyaṃ vyāghrasya vacanaṃ yathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5389: tena vārṣikaṃ śrāddhaṃ malamāse na kāryamityeva vivakṣitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5398: ityādiśātātapādivacanāni tāni malamāsamṛtānāṃ punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyāvdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityevaṃparāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5399: varṣe varṣe tu yacchrāddhaṃ mṛtāhe tanmalimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5402: malimluce tu samprāpte brāhmaṇo bhriyate yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5409: na cedaṃ vacanaṃ malamāsamṛtasya saureṇaiva māsena sarvadā pratyābdikakartavyatāparamiti samayaprakāśakṛdvyākhyānaṃ yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5411: tasmānmalaṃmāsamṛtasya punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyābdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityeva vyākhyā jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5412: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva kāryaṃ prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5419: ābdikaṃ prathamaṃ yat syāttat kurvīta malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5423: punarābdikaṃ dvitīyādyābdikaṃ tu yadi taddine malamāsapātastadā trayodaśe śuddhe kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5425: pratyabdaṃ dvādaśe māsi kāryā piṇḍakriyā sutaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5428: kvacid dvitīyābdikādau nalamāsapāte trayodaśe śuddhe kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5429: ādyābdikaṃ malamāsapāte 'pi dvādaśa eva māse kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5430: iyaṃ ca malamāsapāte dvādaśe māsi kartavyatā na saṃvatsaramadhye malamāsapāte /
GSD36mvir_sau:5431: tathāca sati dvādaśe māsi mṛtatithyalābhena sapiṇḍanānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5435: malamāsamṛtānāṃ yadā kālakrameṇa kadācinmṛtimāsa eva malamāsastadā tadīyamābdikaṃ tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5436: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5441: yāni tu“māsadvaye 'pi tatkāryaṃ vyāghrasya vacanaṃ yathā“
GSD36mvir_sau:5448: tathaiva kāmyaṃ yat karma vatsarāt prathamādṛte //
GSD36mvir_sau:5451: atra cābhyudayaniṣedhadvārā tadaṅgakasya caulopanayanādereva niṣedho draṣṭabyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5455: kecittu prathamasamvatsare sapiṇḍīkaraṇottaradine kriyamāṇamābhyudayikaṃ malamāse 'pi kāryamityarthamāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5457: tathā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇādūrdhvaṃ yāni prathamasaṃvatsarasambandhīni punarmāsikāni kriyante tāni malamāse 'pi kāryāṇi ityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5470: yacca“jyeṣṭhemāsi site pakṣe“ityādivacaneṣu daśaharādau cāndramāsavācijyeṣṭhādipadaśravaṇaṃ tadagatyā lakṣaṇayā sauramāsaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5471: ataśca tulādistharaveḥ śuddhamāse asambhavāt malamāsa eva yugādiprāpteranutkarṣasiddhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5474: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredbahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5478: ata eva“śravaṇena śrāvaṇasya“ityādāvāśvalāyanasūtre śrāvaṇapadaṃ na sauramāsaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5479: vṛṣādita ityasya prasiddhasauramāsopajīvicchandogaparatvenāpyupapattau śrāvaṇapadasya lākṣaṇikatve pramāṇābhāvāt / ataḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5492: mādhavādayastu daśaharāsu neti vacanasthaṃ vṛṣādita iti hetuvacanamanādṛtya--
GSD36mvir_sau:5493: pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe ca śrāddhaṃ yat prativatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:5498: tairthikasyobhayatrakartavyatā tu yadaiva tīrthaprāptiḥ śuddhe male vā tadaiva śrāddhaṃ kuryāditivyavasthā draṣṭavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5499: vastutastu manvādivākyena vairūpyāpatteḥ etadvacanabalāt tīrthaśrāddhamubhayatra kāryamitiyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5502: nabho vātha nabhasyo vā malamāso yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5504: iti nāgarakhaṇḍavacanenāṣāḍhītaḥ saptame pakṣe vihitatvāt malamāse niṣedhaḥ spaṣṭa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5505: yadā tvāśvinasyādhimāsatvaṃ tadāpi na kanyāsambandhabhrāntyā malināśvine mahālayaḥ kāryaḥ kintu bhādrāparapakṣa eva“anyatrava tu pañcamaḥ“ityabhidhānāt
GSD36mvir_sau:5506: na ca kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5507: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5508: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāsambandhābhāve 'pi bhādrapadakṛṣṇapakṣasya kanyāsaṅkrāntisparśavattvena tatra śrāddhasyānuṣṭhānaṃ śakyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5510: ante vā yadi vā madhye yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5511: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5512: iti kārṣṇājinivacane 'pi sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve 'pi tatra śrāddhamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5513: śūlapāṇyādimate tu kanyāsambandhanirapekṣasya pañcamapakṣasyaiva śrāddhakālatvādyuktameva tatra śrāddhānuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5514: yattu tanmate kanyāgatāparapakṣe sakṛtkriyamāṇaśrāddhāntara tat kanyāgatāparapakṣasya
GSD36mvir_sau:5516: vastutastu kanyāgatāparapakṣaśrāddhaṃ na pañcamapakṣaśrāddhādbhinnaṃ śrāddhabhede vidhikalpanāgauravāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5517: pañcamapakṣasya“ante vā yadi vā madhya“iti vacanena kanyopalakṣitasyaiva śrāddhakālatvapratīteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5521: śrāvaṇabhādrayorhi malamāsatve pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5522: tadā ca saptamapakṣasya vihitatvāt kanyopalakṣita eva śrāddhaprāptiriti na kāpi kṣatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5523: yadā tu āśvinasya malinatvaṃ tadāpi pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho 'styeva amāyāmeva kanyāpraveśāt tena ekameva śrāddhamiti yuktaṃ bahusammataṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5524: tadapi cāśvinasya malinatve 'pi kanyopalakṣitasya mukhyasyaiva pañcamapakṣasya lābhāttatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5527: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5528: iti jyotiḥ pitāmahavacanaṃ tulāstharavau kartavyatvabodhakaṃ tanmahālayātiriktavrīhipākādiśrāddhaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5529: athavā mahālayasya“yāvadvṛścikadarśanam“iti gauṇakāle 'pi vihitatvād gauṇakālabhrāntyā malināśvine kriyamāṇasya niṣedhadvārā tulāstharavau kartavyatābodhakam
GSD36mvir_sau:5532: iti kartavyeṣu mahālayaparigaṇanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat mahālayākhyatīrthaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5534: atra ca jyotiḥ pitāmahavākye daivasyāpi kanyākartavyasya tulāyāṃ kartavyatvapratīterdurgāsthāpanādikamapi tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5538: śete buddhyati vṛścike sa bhagavān māsaiścaturbhirhariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5540: durgā caiva tulāgame samadhike śeṣāstadanye surāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5546: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe //
GSD36mvir_sau:5550: ityādistu gauṇo 'tra na grāhya iti bahavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5560: bāle vā yadi vā vṛddhe śukre vāstaṃ gate ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5574: muṇḍanaṃ copavāsaṃ ca gautamyāṃ siṃhage ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5575: kanyāgate tu kṛṣṇāyāṃ na tu tattīravāsinām //
GSD36mvir_sau:5581: śaiśavaṃ prāk tu pañcāhaṃ paścāddaśadinaṃ smṛtam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5582: śaiśavaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakṣaṃ prāk paścācca bṛhaspateḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5589: bahavau darśitāḥ kālā ye bālye vārddhake 'pi ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5595: vaṅgeṣu hūṇeṣu ca ṣaṭ ca pañca
GSD36mvir_sau:5600: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5607: surāsurejyāstamaye 'pi tīrthe yātrāvidhiḥ saṅkramaṇe ca śastaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5613: darśaśrāddhaṃ tu yat proktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tat prakīrttitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5614: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ ca tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5632: iti mātsyānusārāttarpaṇamevocyate na tu piṇḍapitṛyajña iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5633: manuvacane pitṛyajñapadena tarpaṇasya grahaṇe piṇḍānvāhāryapadasya nāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5638: tacca na medhātithyuktaṃ pañcamahāyajñāntargatapitṛyajñarūpaṃ tarpaṇaṃ tasya śrāddhadine prasaṅgasiddhatvana tatpaścādbhāvavidhānānupapatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5640: tatpaścāddhāvo 'pi ca yadyapi snātasya śrāddhavidhānāttarpaṇasya ca snānāṅgatvāt prāpta eva tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5642: śrāddhaṃ vā pitṛyajñaḥ syāt pitryo balirathāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5643: iti vacanoktatriprakārapitṛyajñaprāptau jalatarpaṇapunarvacanaṃ sāgnikasya śrāddhadine pitṛyajñāntaravyāvṛttyarthamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5644: anye tu snānaprayogāntargatasya tarpaṇasya kātīyānāmeva prāpteranyeṣāṃ snānaprayogāntarbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt prasajyeta kadācicchrāddhottaraṃ tarpaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5645: ataśca tanniyamārthatve sambhavati parisaṅkhayāvidhyayogājjalatarpaṇottarabhāva eva matsyapurāṇavākye niyamyata
GSD36mvir_sau:5649: tādṛśaṃ ca tat piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇaḥ sāgnikasyaiva sambhavatīti tadbiṣayamevedaṃ jhandogapariśiṣṭavacanaṃ manuvacanaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5650: na tu sarvaviṣayam itarān prati tatsamākhyāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5651: ata eva pariśiṣṭokto vāsaratṛtīyāṃśarūpo 'parāṅṇaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇa āhitāgnereva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5652: “nātisandhyāsamīpata“ityapi ca dināntyamuhūrta eva taṃ prati niṣidhyate na tu sāyāhnarūpastrimuhūrtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5656: ayaṃ ca pariśiṣṭoktaḥ kālavidhiryeṣāṃ candradarśanavati pratipaddine darśeṣṭerniṣedhasteṣāmeveti pariśiṣṭaprakāśakāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5657: tena tādṛśānuṣṭhānakarttṝn sāgnikān prati yā gakālānurodhenāmāvāsyā parisiṣṭānusāreṇa mirṇīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:5659: candrakṣaye tu prāśastyamātraṃ“kṣīṇe rājani śasyate“iti vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5672: tadanta eva kṣayameti kṛtsna eva jyotiścakravido vadanti //
GSD36mvir_sau:5679: tṛtīyayā caturthabhāgonatvāt tribhāgamātrāvaśiṣṭayā kalayā paridṛśyo 'nayorapi amāvāsyayorādyayāme na jāyeta kintu itaramāsavadatrānayoraṇyāmāvāsyayoḥ kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5685: tadasparśena ekadeśavyāptyā vā bhavati tatra tadasparśacaturdaśyapekṣayāmāvāsyāyāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5687: tatra yā tāvat pūrvedyureva kṛtsnakālavyāpinī paredyuśca tadekadeśamapi na spṛśāti sā pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5688: yāpi tādṛsyevottaratra tade kadeśavyāpinī sāpi pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5689: paraṃ yadi yajanīyadine candradarśanādekadeśa vyāptidina eva yāgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5690: yadi tu tithivṛddhyā candrādarśanāt pratipadyeva yāgastadā ekadeśavyāptidina eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5697: yā tu paredyureva kutsnakālavyāpinī pūrvedyustadekadeśasparśena tadasparśena vā vidyamānā sottaraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5698: yā tu dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇaikadeśavyāpinī sā yaivādhikā saiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5699: yā tu dinadvaye sāmyenaikadeśavyāpinī sā yadi kṣayeṇa tādṛśī tadā“yadā caturdaśīyāmaṃ“iti pūrvādāhṛtakṣīyamāṇavākyāt pūrvaiva,
GSD36mvir_sau:5705: evaṃ yadā sāmyena tādṛsī tadāpi darśanādarśanakṛta eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5706: yadā ca keṣucitpakṣeṣu caturdaśīmiśrāmāyāmanuṣṭhānaṃ prāpnoti tadā yadi amāpratīkṣayā sarvānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavati tadā sā pratīkṣaṇīyā no ceccatuddeśyāmapi sarvamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5709: dinadvaye 'pyarāhṇavyāptau kṣaye pūrvā vṛddhau sāmye ca parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5711: kṣaye pūrvā parā vṛddhau sāmya'pi ca parā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5721: strībhiḥ śūdraiḥ kuhūḥ kāryā tathā cānagnikairdvijaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5726: dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā / iti
GSD36mvir_sau:5737: aṣṭakā ityetaccāśvalāyanamate śrāddhahomayoḥ kātyāyanamate ca homamātrasya nāmadheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5741: tathāpi sa“dravyaṃ brāhmaṇasampattiḥ“iti vadāśvalāyanoktasya kālasya lakṣaṇayā bodhakaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5745: evañca varṣe pañca aṣṭakā iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5746: āśvalāyanastu bhādrāṣṭakāyā māghyāvarṣamiti saṃjñāntaraṃ paraṃ kṛtavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:5748: evañcāśvalāyanīyairbhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ paurāṇāṣṭakā mādhyāvarṣaṃ ca tantreṇānuṣṭheyamiti nyāyavidaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5750: caturaṣṭako hemanta ityetacca triṛtuḥ saṃvatsara itye tatpakṣābhiprāyeṇa /
GSD36mvir_sau:5752: viṣṇvādismṛtau yatra tisro 'ṣṭakāstisro 'nvaṣṭakā ityetattrayāṇāmupādānaṃ tatra taddhemantagatānāmeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5756: aindṣāṃ tu prathamāyāṃ ca śākaiḥ santarpayetpitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5761: pauṣe kṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ tu śākaiḥ santarpayet pitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5762: itibrahmapurāṇavacanāntarāt pauṣakṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ śākasantarpaṇokteḥ pauṣamāghaphālgunagatā eva tisra uktā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5763: kūrmapurāṇe tu pauṣādigā eva tisra iti spaṣṭamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5769: evaṃ ca brahmapurāṇaviṣṇudharmottarayoḥ phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamīvyatiriktā hemantaśiśirayostisraḥ uktā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5772: kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā hi pūrvā caindrī vibhāvyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5775: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syādeṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5776: yā cāpyanyā caturthī syāttāṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5779: śākaṃ tu phālgunāṣṭamyāṃ svayaṃ patnyapi vā pacet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5780: ityanena phālgunāṣṭamyāḥ śākāṣṭakātvena pratyabhijñānānmārgaśīrṣāṣṭakāparityāgena tisra uktāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5786: caturthī tu bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyeva na tu phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamī kathamanyathā“etāstisra“iyaṃ caturthī“iti brūyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5787: gobhilavat prathamata eva catasra iti na vadediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5789: aśaktau tu“ekasyāṃ vā“ityāśvalāyanasūtroktaikā purāṇoktā ca bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamīti dve /
GSD36mvir_sau:5791: “yā māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭāt dvyaṣṭakā tasyāmaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyate tāmekāṣṭaketyācakṣate“ityāpastambenai kasyā eva phālgunāṣṭamyā uktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5793: sā prakāradvayena vyākhyātā tadbhāṣyakṛtā malamāsatvena khaṇḍatithisattvena vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5794: jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyata iti pradarśanārthaṃ na tu yadaiva jyeṣṭhāyuktā tadaivopādeyā nānyadetyevamarthamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5807: āsvalāyanena ca pūrvedyuḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāditi aṣṭakāśrāddhātpūrvedyuḥ śrāddhāntaramuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5838: nāniṣṭvā tu pitṝn śrāddhe karma vaidikamārabhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5840: atra nāniṣṭvetivacanenaiva sarvatra nāndīśrāddhaprāptau yajñodvāhapratiṣṭhāsvityādipunarvacanaṃ niyamārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5842: na cotpattiviniyogābhyāṃ sāptadaśya iva sārthakatobhayorapi viniyojakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5856: śrāddhatrayaṃ tu kurvīta vaiśvadevaṃ ca tāntrikam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5860: tato mātāmahānāṃ ca vṛddhau śrāddhatrayaṃ smṛtam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5884: śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai tebhyastatra pradīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5894: aparapakṣe kurvītorddhvraṃ vā caturthyā yadahaḥ sampadyeteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5896: yadāpyekadine tadāmāvāsyāśrāddhātpṛthak kāryam“amāvāsyāṣṭakā vṛddhiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe“iti pṛthaṅnirddeśāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5901: dviścaturvā yathāśrāddhaṃ māse māse dine dine //
GSD36mvir_sau:5913: ata eva gautamenānekān kālānabhidhāyoktam--kālanithamaḥ śaktita iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5921: tribhāgahīnaṃ pakṣaṃ vā tribhāgaṃ tvarddhameva vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5930: evaṃ caikasminneva dine śrāddhayogyatithidvayalābhe śrāddhadvayaṃ tithivṛddhau ca śrāddhāvṛttiḥ kṛtatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5943: yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ pañcamyādidaśamyā dikalpau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5951: bhānūpādhyāyastu yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ dvādaśyādiḥ kalpaḥ yeṣāṃ tadasti teṣāṃ trayodaśyādirityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5952: vastutastu asya vākyasyānekakālopadeśamātre tātparyādgurulaghukālopadeśasyārthikatvāduttarottaralaghukālopadeśakatvābhāvāt tribhāgamityatra bhāgitayā buddhisthīkṛtasya
GSD36mvir_sau:5955: iti gautamaikavākyatayā mūlaśrutikalpanālāghavācca ardhaṃ pakṣārdhamityeva vyākhyānamucitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5956: atra pakṣaśrāddhādikalpānāṃ gurulaghukalpatvenecchāvikalpāsambhavādekādayo tisro deyā itivatphalatāratamyamiti śrāddhavivekaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5957: nitye phalābhāvānna phale tāratamyaṃ kintu śaktyapekṣayā vyavatthito vikalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5958: ekakalpāśrayaṇe ca tadanirvāhena kalpāntarāśrayaṇe tasminprayoge tasyaiva pakṣasya kathañcinnirvāhyatvādvrīhiyavādivaditimiśrāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5960: nityasyāpi kathāñcitphalavattvācchaktasya laghukalpāśrayaṇe phalābhāvakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt ṣoḍaśigrahaṇādāvatiprasakteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5961: atra ca dine dina iti vīpsāśravaṇāccaturdaśyāmapi pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ“vajeyitvā caturdaśīm“iti niṣedhastu aparapakṣāntaracaturdaśīviṣaya iti pradīpavivekau
GSD36mvir_sau:5968: yo vai śrāddhaṃ naraḥ kuryādekasminnapi vāsare //
GSD36mvir_sau:5971: atra kanyāsaṃsthatvavacanaṃ prāśastyārthaṃ na tu tasyaiva śrāddhakālatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5973: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakurvīta kanyāṃ gacchatu vā na vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5976: madhye vā yadi vāpyante yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5977: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5982: nabho vātha nabhasyo vā malamāso yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5984: iti nāgarakhaṇḍokteḥ saptamapakṣa eva tat nyāyyamityuktaṃ malamāsakartavyanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:5998: ata eva brahmavāyupurāṇayoḥ paurṇamāsyāditithiṣoḍaśakasya phalamuktamityuktaṃ kāmarūpanibandhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:5999: atha vā yadā tithivṛddhyā ṣoḍaśadinātmakaḥ pakṣaḥ syāttadā vṛddhidine 'pi śrāddhaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:6014: eṣu śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta gṛhī putradhanakṣayāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:6017: prājāpatye ca pauṣṇe ca pitryarkṣe bhārgave tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6018: yastu śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tasya putro vinaśyati //
GSD36mvir_sau:6025: tathā tithiṃ ca nakṣatraṃ vāraṃ ca na vicārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6029: yā tithiryasya māsasya mṛtāhe tu pravartate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6030: sā tithiḥ pitṛpakṣe tu pūjanīyā prayatnataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6032: piṇḍaśrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ vicchitiṃ naiva kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6036: atra pratidinaṃ śrāddhakaraṇe nandādi na varjyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6038: naiva nandādi varjyaṃ syānnaiva varjyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:6042: caturdaśyāṃ kriyā kāryā anyeṣāṃ tu vigarhitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6047: śastreṇa tu hatā yevai tebhyastatra pradīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6050: nandādivarjanaṃ tu pañcamyādipakṣeṣu na bhavati vibhāgādiparimāṇahāniprasaṅgāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6056: ata ūrddhvaṃ tu kanyāyā yānyahāni tu ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:6060: sūrye kanyāsthite śrāddhaṃ yo na kuryādgṛhāśramī /
GSD36mvir_sau:6062: ityādivacanaiḥ pañcamapakṣanirapekṣameva kanyānimittakaṃ śrāddhāntaraṃ vidhīyate tasya cāparapakṣa eva kanyāsaṅkramaṇe tantraṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:6072: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṣoḍaśakaṃ prati /
GSD36mvir_sau:6073: iti karmaṇi saṅkhyāśravaṇaṃ na tadbhedakaṃ tasyaikadeśakanyāsambandhamātreṇāpi sakalapakṣapūjyatvaguṇaparatvena karmotpattiparatvā bhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6076: itivīpsāvaśāt“tribhāgahīnaṃ pakṣaṃ vā“ityādiṣu atyantasaṃyogadvitīyāvaśāt“sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjya“itisakalādiśabdavaśādabhyasapratīteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6077: evaṃ ca kālabhedātsāyamprātaḥ kālayoḥ sāṅgahomaprayogāvṛttivatsarvāsu tithiṣu sāṅgaśrāddhāvṛttiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6079: evaṃ ca yadabhyāsapakṣe 'ntedakṣiṇādānaṃ brāhmaṇaikyaṃ ceti hemādriṇoktaṃ taccintyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6082: evañca pakṣaśrāddhe nirvighnatārthaṃ sakṛdeva brāhmaṇaiḥ sahopasaṃvāde kṛte 'pi yadi brāhmaṇānāmāśaucaprāptistadā teṣāṃ tyāga eve /
GSD36mvir_sau:6084: tathā karturapi kenacidapyabhyāsapakṣeṇa pravṛttasyāntarā yadyāśaucanipātastadāpi “śrāddhe pākaparikriyā';
GSD36mvir_sau:6086: kintvāśaucāpagamottaraṃ sakṛdādipakṣeṇa yathāvanmahālayaśrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ kenāpi pakṣeṇa tasyājātatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6092: haṃse varṣāsu kanyāsthe śākenāpi gṛhe vasan /
GSD36mvir_sau:6096: atra prāptāprāptavivekenāmāvāsyāyā ūrdhvamarvāk pañcamyā gauṇakālavidhāne tātparyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6106: tāvacchrāddhaṃ pravāñchanti dattaṃ vai pitaraḥ sutaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6116: tasyāṃ dadyānna ceddattaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai mahālaye //
GSD36mvir_sau:6118: atra yadyapi kārttikapaurṇamāsyāmapi dīpadānaṃ vihitaṃ tathāpyamāvāsyaiva pañcadaśīśabdena grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6119: kṛṣṇapakṣasya pitrye praśastatvāt dīpāvalītvena tasyā eva khyātatvācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6124: asyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sa gayāśrāddhakṛdbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6129: prāpya śrāddhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ madhunā pāyasena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:6133: trayodaśyāṃ prayatnena varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6138: ityādi śaṅkhabrahmapurāṇamanvādivacaneṣu maghāyuktaiva trayodaśī śrāddhakālatvena yadyapi śrūyate tathāpi kevalāpi sā śrāddhakālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6145: api naḥ sa kule bhūyādyo no dadyāttrayodaśīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:6156: iti candrikāsthavākyena śuddhāmabhidhāya maghāyoge prāśastyābhidhā nācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6157: “varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca“ityādau cakārastu na tithyā sahetaretarayogārthaḥ kintu parasparanipekṣaikakriyānvayalakṣaṇasamuccayārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6159: eṣa no dāsyati śrāddhaṃ varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:6163: ityādau varṣāyā api pṛthakśrāddhakālatā syāditi vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6168: prāpya śrāddhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ madhunā pāyasena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:6170: api naḥ sakule bhūyādyo no dadyāttrayodaśīm //
GSD36mvir_sau:6176: eṣa no dāsyati śrāddhaṃ varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6178: ca sambhavati svatantravidhyantarakalpanānaicityā tkevalavākyānāṃ lakṣaṇayā śrutikalpanālāghavāya
GSD36mvir_sau:6183: tarhi tata eva lāghavādgajacchāyākhyayogayuktāyāmeva trayodaśyāṃ kuñjaraprākchāya eva ca deśe śrāddhaṃ syānnānyatra /
GSD36mvir_sau:6184: sarvopasaṃhāreṇa viśiṣṭaviṣayiṇyā eva śruteḥ kalpane lāghavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6201: prajāmiṣṭāṃ yaśaḥ svargamārogyaṃ ca dhanaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6202: nṝṇāṃ śrāddhe sadā prītāḥ prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6205: kṛṣṇapakṣe trayodaśyāṃ yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute naraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6211: na tṛptāstatra ye yasya prajāṃ hiṃsanti tasya te //
GSD36mvir_sau:6217: yadvā naiṃkavargasya pārvaṇamātraṃ na kartavyaṃ kintu sarveṣāṃ pitṛpitṛvyādīnāmapi pārvaṇaikoddiṣṭāni kāryāṇītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6223: mahālayatrayodaśīśrāddhaṃ ca yugādiśrāddhādabhinnaṃ yugāditvāvinābhāvena tadupasthiteriti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:6226: sasantāno naiva kuryānnityaṃ te kavayo viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6227: itibṛhatparāśareṇa viśiṣyāparapakṣatrayodaśīśrāddhe piṇḍaniṣedhāttadviṣayaḥ śrāddhaniṣedha ityadoṣaḥ kāmyaśrāddhaviṣayo vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6230: iti kāmyaśrāddhaṃ prakṛtya doṣokteḥ putravadgṛhasthaviṣayo vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6231: trayodaśyāṃ tu vai śrāddhaṃ na kuryāt putravāngṛhī /
GSD36mvir_sau:6237: atra trayodaśīmahālayamadhāśrāddhānāṃ tantraṃ yugādiśrāddhabhede tu tasyāpi /
GSD36mvir_sau:6243: caturdaśyāṃ kriyāḥ kāryā anyeṣāṃ tu vigarhitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6251: yuvānaḥ pitaro yasya mṛtāḥ śastreṇa vā hatāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6256: evaṃ ca kṛtapatyanugamanāyā api caturdaśīśrāddhaṃ bhavatyeveti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6257: anye tu avaidhamaraṇaṃ caturdaśīśrāddhaprayojakaṃ prāyo 'naśanābhyāṃ tu vidhito 'pi vipannānāṃ bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6285: śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāḥ sahasraṃ rahasyametat pitaro vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6290: nigamaḥ, aparaṇkṣe yadahaḥ sampadyetāmāvāsyā yā tu viśeṣeṇāṣṭakā tīrthatithidrabyabrāhmaṇasampatsu cikīrṣediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6294: pātraṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ prāpya sadyaḥ śrāddhaṃ vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:6308: viṣuve sati saṅkrāntyāṃ vyatīpāte ca putrakāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6320: ye syuḥ pitāmahādūrddhvaṃ te tu nāndīmukhāstrayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6324: āṣāḍhyāmatha karttikyāṃ māghyāṃ trīn pañca vā dvijān /
GSD36mvir_sau:6344: śrāddhasya pūjitaḥ kālo bhavetsa eva vā punaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6347: tatra kātyāyanaḥ--atha kāmyāni bhavanti striyo 'pratirūpāḥ pratipadi,
GSD36mvir_sau:6359: jñātiśraiṣṭhayaṃ trayodaśyāṃ yuvānastasminmriyante śastrahatasya caturdaśyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ sarvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6364: svargaṃ hyapatyamojaśca śauryaṃ kṣetraṃ balaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6368: vidyāṃ dhanaṃ bhiṣaksiddhiṃ kupyaṃ gā apyajāvikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6384: nabhasyamāsasya tamisrapakṣe trayodaśī pañcadaśī ca māghe //
GSD36mvir_sau:6386: pānīyamapyatra tilairvimiśraṃ dadyāt pitṛbhyaḥ prayato manuṣyaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6387: śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāḥ sahasraṃ rahasyametanmunayo vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6392: navamī kārttike śuklā tṛtīyā mādhave sitā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6393: amāvāsyā tapasye ca nabhasye ca trayodaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:6400: vaiśākhasya tṛtīyā yā navamī kārttikasya tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:6407: maghābhiḥ sahitā yā tu nabhasye tu trayodaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:6413: etāścatasrastithayo yugādyā dattaṃ kulaṃ cākṣayamāsu vindyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6414: yuge yuge varṣaśatena yacca yugādikāle divasena tadbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6417: vaiśākhasya tṛtīyā yā samā kṛtayugena tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:6418: navamī kārttike yā tu tretāyugasamā tu sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6425: tadā tu kriyate kiñcitsarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6427: kṛtayugena sameti sampūrṇakṛtayugadharmaprāptirasyāmekasyāṃ tithau bhavatītyāha hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6433: atra ca paurṇamāsī tu māghasyeti bhaviṣyavacanāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:6434: māghe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ tu ghoraṃ kaliyugaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6435: iti brahmavaivarttāt“amāvāsyā ca tapasa“iti nāgarakhaṇḍāt“māghe candrakṣaye 'hani”
GSD36mvir_sau:6439: śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāḥ sahasraṃ rahasyametanmunayo vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6443: māghāsite pañcadaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
GSD36mvir_sau:6444: ṛkṣeṇa kālaḥ sa paraḥ pitṝṇāṃ na hyalpapuṇyairnṛpa/
GSD36mvir_sau:6446: itimakarāditye tadasambhavāt kumbhāditye ca sambhavāt asminpakṣe ca pūrṇimāmāvāsyayorapi yugāditvasambhavāt cāndramāsayugādayo grāhyā iti pūrvapakṣamupanyasya-
GSD36mvir_sau:6449: iti ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanātsauramāsagatā eva grāhyā iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6450: etāstu pitṛkarmasu aparāhṇavyāpinyo grāhyā daivike pūrvāhnavyāpinyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6457: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādyāḥ kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6463: dinarkṣaṃ revatī yatra gamanaṃ caiva rāśiṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:6466: grahaṇaṃ viṣuve caiva saumye vā mihiro yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:6469: saumya udagayane yadi śuklā kṛṣṇā vā saptamī grahaṇaviṣuvottarāyaṇopetā sūryavāropetā tadā yugāntadivasa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6485: tṛtīyā caiva māghasya tathā bhādrapadasya ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:6488: śrāvaṇe cāṣṭamī kṛṣṇā tathāṣāḍhe ca pūrṇimā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6489: kārttikī phālganī caitrī jyeṣṭhā pañcadaśīṃ sitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6492: pitṝnuddisya yo dadyātsa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6493: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:6499: āśvine daśamī śuklā śrāvaṇī kārttikī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6507: yāsu śrāddhe kṛte tṛptiḥ pitṝṇāmakṣayā bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6517: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu tasyaiva kaurmaḥ pravavṛte nṛpa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6535: ekādaśyāṃ tu śuklāyāṃ māghe vyānaḥ prajagmivān /
GSD36mvir_sau:6547: śuklā trayodaśī māghe kārttikasya tu saptamau //
GSD36mvir_sau:6552: vaiśākhaphālgunayoḥ kṛṣṇatṛtīyā caitrapañcamī tadamāvāsyeti catasraḥ kṛṣṇāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6561: śataghnaṃ tattu saṅkāntyāṃ śataghnaṃ viṣuve tataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6585: sūryācandramasoḥ krāntisāmyaṃ jyotiḥśāstragamyaṃ vyatīpāta iti kalpataruḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6591: pañcānanasthau gurubhūmiputrau meṣe raviḥ syādyadi śuklapakṣe /
GSD36mvir_sau:6592: pāśābhidhānā karabheṇa yuktā tithirvyatīpāta itīha yogaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6593: asmin hi gobhūmihiraṇyavāsasāṃ dānena sarvaṃ ca vihāya pāpam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6602: vyatīpāte vaidhṛtau ca dattasyānto na vidyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6624: śuklapakṣe navaṃ dhānyaṃ pakvaṃ jñātvā suśobhanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6629: kṛṣṇapakṣe navānnaṃ tu na kuryānmānavo yataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6630: pitarastaṃ na gṛhṇanti dātā ca narakaṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6634: trijanmani = janmatithau janmanakṣatre janmacandre veti kāmarūpīye /
GSD36mvir_sau:6637: trayodaśīṃ janmadinaṃ ca nandāṃ janmarkṣatārāṃ sitavāsaraṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6648: mūlāyāṃ śravaṇe ca revatidhane citrānale vāruṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:6650: candre śobhanatārake ca śubhadaṃ śrāddhaṃ navānne kṛtam //
GSD36mvir_sau:6654: śyāmākairityetadvānaprasthaparam“gṛhamedhī hi yavābhyāṃ śaradvasantayoryajeta śyāmākairvanī varṣāsu“iti śruteriti kāmarūpīye /
GSD36mvir_sau:6670: jyeṣṭhasyetyanenāputrasyāpi kaniṣṭhasya bhrāturnāvaśyakaṃ śrāddhamiti gamyate na punaḥ sarvathā niṣedhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6676: sajātīyatvaṃ ca titherna pratipadāditvamātreṇa kintu tanmāsapakṣasajātīyamāsapakṣagatatvena ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6678: pratyakṣaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ kṣayāhaṃ tasya taṃ viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6685: iti bhaviṣyapurāṇe vatsarāntagrahaṇānna maraṇāghikaraṇakatitheḥ śrāddhādhikaraṇatvaṃ kintu vatsarāntatithisajātīyatvanirūpakatvameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6686: tena yatkena ciducyate pratisaṃvatsaramityaviśeṣaśravaṇādvarṣe bhavaṃ vārṣikamitivyutpannasamākhyābalācca
GSD36mvir_sau:6687: maraṇādhikaraṇakatitherapi śrāddhādhikaraṇātvam ataśca sāṃvatsarikaṃ maraṇādhikaraṇatithāvapi prāptam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6693: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:6696: ata eva tatraiva māse bhavaṃ māsikamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6697: sāṃvatsarike tu uktavākye vatsarāntagrahamādvarṣānte bhavaṃ vārṣikamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6698: atra ca“vatsarānte mṛtāhani“ityatra savatsarānte jāte mṛtāhanītyartho bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6700: atra hi na saṃvatsarasya grahaṇaṃ tithivṛddhihra /
GSD36mvir_sau:6709: tena dvitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithau śrāddhaṃ kāryam iti dākṣiṇātyasammato 'rthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6710: śūlapāṇistu māse bhavaṃ varṣe bhavamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ na caivaṃ sarvādyamṛtatithau māsikasāṃvatsarikādikaraṇāpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6716: 'hani“iti tu māsikādbhinnameva sarvaikodiṣṭaprakṛtibhūtaṃ śrāddhaṃ vidhatte na punarādyamāsikasyotkarṣamityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:6723: śrāddhavighne samutpanne tithilope ca vā punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6728: yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya udayaṃ yāti bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6730: yāṃ tithi samanuprāpya astaṃ yāti divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6732: itidevalādivacanādyathā karmakāleṣvavidyamānāyā api titheḥ sampūr ṇatvakalpanayā
GSD36mvir_sau:6733: grahaṇaṃ na tathā naraṇādhikaraṇāhorātre trimuhūrtādirūpeṇa udayāstamayavarttinyāstithermaraṇasambandhitayā grahaṇam, kintu--
GSD36mvir_sau:6737: tatra yasya maraṇatithirmaraṇapakṣaśca na jñāyate tanmāsastu jñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6744: atra ca yadyapi mṛtāhasyaivājñānamuktaṃ tathāpi pakṣajñāne vakṣyamāṇarītyā tattyāgasyānunitatvāt śuklapakṣagataikādaśyāmeva sāṃvatsarikaśrāddhaprāpteḥ pakṣājñāne 'pyetasya
GSD36mvir_sau:6751: atra ca sāmānyavacanātpitṛvyādīnāmapi mṛtāhādyajñāne ayameva nirṇaya ucitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6753: na jānāti dinaṃ yastu māsaṃ vātha narādhipa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6761: atra viśeṣata itiśravaṇāt śuklaikādaśyāmapi śrāddhaṃ bhavatīti gacchuklapakṣaikādaśyā eva mukhyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6762: yadi tu sa na jñāyate tadā kṛṣṇapakṣasya pitrye praśastatvena viśeṣata ityuktyā ca kṛṣṇaikādaśyeva mukhyaḥ kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6771: yadā tu maraṇamāso na jñāyate dinaṃ tu jñāyate tadā--
GSD36mvir_sau:6773: dinameva tu jānāti māsaṃ naiva tu yo naraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6776: tadā hyāṣāḍhake māsi māghe vā taddinaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6779: yadā tu trayāṇāmapi maraṇasambandhimāsapakṣatithīnāmajñānaṃ tadā yadi prasthānottarameva jīvanavārttā na jñātā tatra prasthānatithyādisajātīyamāsatithipakṣā grāhyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6782: dinamāsau na vijñātau maraṇasya yadā punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6793: yadā tu trayāṇāmapi prasthānatithyādisamānajātīyānāṃ māsapakṣatithīnāmajñānaṃ yasya
GSD36mvir_sau:6794: ca prasthānottaraṃ bahukālaṃ jīvanavārttā śrutā paścācca maraṇaniścayaśravaṇaṃ tasyākṛtapretakāryasya
GSD36mvir_sau:6800: ekadvyajñānakṛto yo nirṇayaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ so 'trāpi draṣṭavya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6801: atra ca yaddine maraṇaniścayaśravaṇaṃ taddine 'pi kṛtapretakāryasya ābdikakaraṇaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:6807: tena kāryamaṃmāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ māghe 'tha mārgake /
GSD36mvir_sau:6812: pratyavdaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ kṣayāhaṃ tasya taṃ viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6813: iti vyāsavacanena pakṣasyāpi mṛtāhopapādakatvena pakṣajñāne tattyāgasya kartumaśakyatvāt bhādrādimāsīyaśuklaikādaśyāmeva prāpteramāgrahaṇānupapattiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:6815: kintu anyatarājñāne 'pi vihitasya amāvāsyādikālasyārthādeva ubhayājñāne 'pi prāpteranuvādamātram /
GSD36mvir_sau:6816: anuvādakatvādeva ca mukhyakṛṣṇaikādaśīrūpagauṇaśuklaikādaśīrūpakālāntaropalakṣakatvamamāśabdasya māghādipadasya ca bādrādyupalakṣakatvaṃ na doṣāya /
GSD36mvir_sau:6817: ata eva smārttena svamatānusāreṇa eta dvacanavyākhyānāvasare kṛṣṇaikādaśyabhāve evāmāvasyā grāhyetyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6818: athaṃ ca neti maraṇapravāsamaraṇaśravaṇādinā kenāpi cihnenetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6819: evaṃ ca maraṇasambandhimāsajñāne ca maraṇamāsīyapravāsatithirgrāhyetyādyapi sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:6820: atra ca maraṇasambandhitithyādyajñāne prasthānasambandhino maraṇaśravaṇasambandhinaśca tithyāderjñāne prasthānasambandhitithyādikameva grāhyam
GSD36mvir_sau:6823: vastutastu śravaṇadine maraṇasya paramparayā mṛtāhasambandhāvagateḥ mukyatayāvagatasya
GSD36mvir_sau:6825: sambandhasāmānyasya sati sambhave ānubandhyāgnīṣomayoḥ sādyaske prakṛtidṛṣṭapaurvāparyamātrasyeva
GSD36mvir_sau:6828: maraṇasyeti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sambandhamātravācitvena śravaṇadvārakatve 'pi na kadācit kṣātiḥ“saptadaśāratnirvājapeyasya“itivat /
GSD36mvir_sau:6829: (a. 3 pā. 1 adhi. 9) tasmāt maraṇasambandhitithyādyajñāne śravaṇasambandhitithyādigrahaṇaṃ tadajñāne ca prasthānasambandhitithyādigrahaṇaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:6838: pitari proṣite yasya na vārttā naiva cāgatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6850: jīvan yadi sa āgacchet ghṛtakumbhe niyojayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6855: athaindrāgnena paśunā giriṃ gatvātha tatra tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:6859: kecittu pañcāśardvaṣanyūnavayaskasya pañcadaśavarṣapratīkṣā tadadhikavayaskasya dvādaśeti vyavasthāmāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6869: deye pitṝṇāṃ śrāddhe tu āśaucaṃ jāyate yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:6870: tadāśauce vyatīte tu teṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:6872: sā tithistasya kartavyā na tvanyā vai kadācana //
GSD36mvir_sau:6877: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛkarma ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6888: vastutastu pretapiṇḍakriyāpadaṃ na pretaikoddiṣṭaparaṃ tatparatve lakṣaṇāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6890: ataśca pretaikoddiṣṭasyāpi āśauce adeyatvānnātideśena sāṃvatsarikaikoddiṣṭe deyatvaprasaktirasti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6892: anye tu na deya itiviśeṣaṇena pārvaṇādīnāmāśaucānte akattevyatā kintu kāmadhenau
GSD36mvir_sau:6905: atra hi mṛtāhapadaṃ śrāddhavighne ityasyāpi viśeṣaṇaṃ madhyagatatvena viśeṣāgrahaṇātsākāṅkṣatvācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6906: atha vā yadyapi mṛtāhapadamavijñāt ityanenaiva sambadhyate tathāpi upasthitatvāttatratya eva vighno bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6908: na caikādaśyādikālapuraskāreṇātra deyatvāvagamānna ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanenāśau cāntakālavidhisambhava itivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6909: asya satyapi deyatāviśeṣaparatve ārthikasya deyatāsāmānyasyopajīvanenātra kālāntaravidhiḥ sambhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6910: yathā satyapi āgneyyāḥ stotrādiviśeṣasambandhe 'rthasiddhaṃ kratusāmānyasambandhaṃ lāghavādupajīvya“āgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhate“ityatrāgnidhropasthānāṅgatvena vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6911: evaṃ ca atratyasya ekādaśyādikālasya“na tvanyā vai kadācana“iti ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanena niṣedhānmṛtāhapratyāsannamukhyāśaucānantaradināpekṣayā gauṇatvam
GSD36mvir_sau:6912: niṣedhārthamupajīvyasya tasya sarvathā pratiṣeddhumaśakyatvena pratiṣedhasya sambhavadviṣayatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6914: etena yatkenaciduktamāśaucavighne āśaucāntatithau deyaṃ na kṛṣṇaikādaśī pratīkṣaṇīyā tasyā“na tvanyā vai kadācana“ityanena pratiṣedhāt vignāntaraviṣayatvamiti
GSD36mvir_sau:6917: ekādaśyāṃ na karttvayaṃ darśe vāpi vicakṣaṇaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6928: tatrāpyasambhave kṛṣṇekādaśyāṃ laghuhārītavacane vighnasāmānye tasyā vihitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6929: tatrāpyasambhave śuklaikādaśyāṃ tasyā api viśeṣata i tyuttyānukalpatvena sūcitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6930: yattvatra vācaspatinā laghuhārītavacanasya āśaucātiriktamṛtāhapratibandhaviṣayatvamuktaṃ tat“na tvanyā vai kadācana“ityaprāptakālapratiṣedhānupapatterayuktam
GSD36mvir_sau:6932: iyaṃ cāśaucavighne tadantakartavyatā puraṣaprayatnānapaneyāśaucavighne na tu puruṣaprayatnāpaneye tasya śrāddhāharvihitaśaucādevāpagamāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6933: tathā ca kṣatāśaucasyāpi puruṣaprayatnānapaneyatvāt kṣatāśaucena vighne tadanta eva kāryamititi kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:6934: anyetu kṣatāśaucasya āśaucatve pramāṇābhāvāt āśaucitve 'pi vā--
GSD36mvir_sau:6936: itipūrvodāhṛtavacanena jananamaraṇāśauca eva tadantakartavyatāvidhānāt na kṣatāśauce tadante kāryaṃ kintu ekādaśyādāvevetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6937: evañca yanmate tadantakartavyatā tanmate pūrvadinakartavyaniyamasyāpi uttaredyurevānuṣṭhānaṃ pūrvadine nirvraṇībhāvasaṃśayena pradhānakartavyatvāniścayāt
GSD36mvir_sau:6948: yadapi ca dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ tadapi daśame āvāhanasya nimittānantaraṃ kartavyatvābhidhānāt ākarājñānamūlam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6949: evañca jananamaraṇāśaucāntyadinottaradine śrāddhakaraṇe taddina eva pūrvadinakṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ pūrvadine āśaucasattvena anadhikārāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6950: yāni tu arthaluptāni ekabhaktādīni teṣāṃ lopa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6951: vācaspatistu pūrvadina eva kāryaṃ tatra śaucasyātantratvāt ekādaśāhaśrāddhavadityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:6952: atra ca“deye pitṝṇāṃ“ityatra mṛtāhanirūpyaśrāddhasya tasminnahani āśauce tadantakartavyatā bodhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6954: tena māsikasāṃvatsarikayorāśaucavighne tadante kartavyatā tadasambhave tu amāvāsyādau /
GSD36mvir_sau:6960: atra ca prathamasya kālasya sūtakavighnaviṣayatvaṃ ṛṣyaśṛṅgabacanaikavākyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6962: ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanasya sāmānyavacanatve 'pi anayoḥ pakṣayorvikalpasya aṣṭadoṣaduṣṭatvādbhinnaviṣayatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6968: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ grajāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6971: yadyapi cātra nimittakathanabelāyāmekoddiṣṭapadaṃ māsikābdikasādhāraṇaṃ pratīyate tathāpi māse 'nyasminnitivacanānmāsikaikoddiṣṭaparameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6973: idaṃ ca māsikāntaradinarūpakālavidhānaṃ na kṛṣṇaikādaśyādyasambhave tasya māsikapuraskāreṇa viśeṣavihitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6976: atra coktavacane ekoddiṣṭagrahaṇādekoddiṣṭarūpeṣveva māsikeṣu dināntarakālavidhānaṃ na pārvaṇarūpeṣu anumāsikeṣviti candrikākāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6977: atra ca patitamāsikaṃ kṛtvā paścāttaddinamāsikaṃ kāryaṃ kḷptakramatyāge pramāṇābhāvāt iti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6980: astu vā kramasyāṅgatvaṃ tathāpi anupādeyakālānurodhena tadbādho yukta eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6981: na ca aparāṅṇādeḥ atiśayamātrārthatvāttadbādhe 'pi na śrāddhakālabādha iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6983: anyathā kālabādhābhāve bhinnaprayogavacanaparigṛhītatvāt saṅkāntyamāvāsyādiśrāddhānāmapi bhedena karaṇāpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6987: tasmātpatitamāsikaṃ māsikāntaradine taddinamāsikena saha tantreṇa kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6988: ābdikaṃ tu āśaucātirikte pākāsambhavādinā vighne taduttarāmāvāsyādiṣu kāryaṃ na tu āmena /
GSD36mvir_sau:6994: vyādhyādinā aśaktena tu putrādidvārā taddina evānnena karaṇīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6999: ekohiṣṭaṃ tu kartavyaṃ pākenaiva sadā svayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7005: agotrajaiḥ = dvārabhūtaiḥ na tu sakṛtkarttṛbhiḥ sagotrāyetyananvayāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7015: tasmāttadahni upoṣaṇarūpaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇaikādaśyādau punaḥ śrāddhaṃ kāryameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7020: mṛtāhani tu samprāpte yasya bhāryā rajasvalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7021: śrāddhaṃ tadā na kartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ pañcame 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:7023: tat yasya mṛtasya śrāddhakartrī bhāryā rajasvaleti vyākhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7025: hemādristu gṛhasthasya bhāryayā sahaiva śrāddhe 'dhikārādrajasvalādaśāyāṃ srayanadhi
GSD36mvir_sau:7026: kārāt vyāsajyavṛtterbharttṛgatasyāpyadhikārasya nivṛttatvāttasyāstaddaśāpagama eva śrāddhaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7034: na ca“pāṇigrahaṇāddhi sahatvaṃ sarvakarmasu“iti vacanaṃ mūlamitivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7035: etasya yatra śrautasmārttāgnisādhyeṣu karmasu pramāṇāntareṇa ubhayādhikāro 'vagatastadanuvādakatvena pūrttādiṣviva śrāddhe ubhayādhikāravidhāyakatvābhāvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:7038: mṛtapitrādikasya amāvāsyādāvakaraṇapratyavāyaparihārārthe pitṛpitāmahādigatatṛptyuddhārādiphalārthe vā śrāddhe pitṛtvādyanirūpikāyāstasyā mṛtapitṛkatvābhāvena adhikārāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7040: ātmanepadāddhi agnisvāmigataṃ phalaṃ janayantyagnisādhyāni karmāṇi na asvāmigatamityetāvadavagamyate na tu sarvasvāmigataṃ phalaṃ janayanti iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7041: dampatyormadhye ekasya rogādipīḍitasya tatparihārārthamiṣṭau kriyamāṇāyāṃ tadasambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7042: na ca śrāddhāṅgapākasya madhyamapiṇḍaprāśanasya ca patnīsādhyatvāt patnīśabdasya ca yajñasvāmivacanatvāttasyā adhikārābhāve kathaṃ tatkarttṛkatvopapattiritivācyam
GSD36mvir_sau:7044: tasmādadhikārasadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāttasyāṃ rajasvalāyāmātmādipavkenānnena tadahareva śrāddhaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7047: tatra tāvat dvividhāni pretaśrāddhāni navāni navamiśrāṇi ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7053: trīṇi sañcayanasyārthe tāni vai śṛṇu sāmpratam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7054: yatra sthāne bhavenmṛtyustatra śrāddhaṃ tu kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7055: ekoddiṣṭaṃ tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7080: tatrāpi navamadivasakartavyasya navaśrāddhasya vighnādinā vicchede tadekādaśe 'hni kartavyamityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7092: aitareyiṇāṃ ca pañca ṣaḍ vetivikalpaṃ ca vakti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7097: viśāṃ nava rājñāṃ sapta vipraśūdrayoḥ ṣaḍiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7103: iti śaṅkhavacane yat ādyaṃ tadapi navamiti vyākhyātam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7104: kātyāyanagṛhye 'pi idaṃ nāvamityuktaṃ tadapi svārthe 'ṇukaraṇānnavameva nāvamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7109: tathā pi tatra brāhmaṇā yugmasaṅkhyākāḥ kāryāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7110: pretāya ca gṛhadvāri caturthe bhojayet dvijān /
GSD36mvir_sau:7127: gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vittaṃ ca gretamuddiśya śaktitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7128: iti bṛhaspatyuktaṃ ca dharmajātaṃ tat savistaramanyatra jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7132: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7134: iti yājñavalkyenādyamāsikasya mṛtadine prāptasyaikādaśe 'hani utkarṣābhidhānādādyamāsikaṃ ca tatra prasaktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7135: tathāpi vakṣyamāṇatadvākyaparyālocanayā ekādaśe 'hani kriyamāṇaṃ mahaikoddiṣṭaṃ tābhyāṃ bhinnameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7143: ityatra ca vidhīyamānaṃ pretoddeśena śrāddhaṃ tābhyāṃ bhinnameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7145: kūrmapurāṇe 'pi--“ekādaśe 'hni kurvīta pretamuddiśya“ityādinā sadharmakasya prakṛtibhūtasyaikādaśāhikasyaikoddiṣṭasyaiva dharmātideśo māsikeṣu dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7160: atrāpi navaśrāddhamāsikayoranupasthiterakoddiṣṭameva nānādharmaviśiṣṭaṃ bhinnameva tābhyāmiti kiṃ bhūyasā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7161: tatra ca pūrvodāhṛtamatsyapurāṇavacanādekasminneva pretasthāne ekādaśa brāhmaṇā iti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7163: athāśaucavyapagame prātaḥ suprakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ svācāntaḥ evaṃ vidhāneva brāhmaṇān yathāśaktyudahmukhān gandhamālyavastrālaṅkārādibhiḥ pūjitān bhojayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7166: varāhapurāṇe tu ekasyaiva brāhmaṇasya tatra tatra parāmarśādekasyāpi niyojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7170: pūjayiṣyāmi bhogena evaṃ vipraṃ nimantrayet / iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:7173: āgataṃ ca dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā kartavyā svāgatakriyā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7180: yadāpi bahubrāhmaṇapakṣastadāpi pretopabhuktavastraśayyādikamekasmā eva guṇavate deyamitarebhyo yathāśakti dakṣiṇāmātramityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:7188: iha ca bahuṣu vākyeṣu ekādaśāhagrahaṇaṃ na āśaucottaradinopalakṣakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7190: sarveṣāṃmeva varṇānāṃ sūtakaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak //
GSD36mvir_sau:7195: kṣatriyādibirapi vacanādāśauce satyapi maraṇādekādaśāha evādyaśrāddhaṃ kartavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7203: iti vaiṣṇavamātsyavacanataḥ kṣatrādibhirapi svasvāśaucānte ekāhatryahāśaucibhirapi tanmadhye daśāhakṛtyānuṣṭhāne tadanta evaikādaśāhaśrāddhaṃ naikādaśe 'hnīti vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7208: saṅkocamātraṃ hi tadā na tu kasyacillakṣaṇā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7212: brāhmaṇa ekādaśāhe tatkurvanna pavkena bhojayet kintu tatra tyaktena yathāsaṅkhayabrāhmaṇabhojanaparyāptenāmena sūtakānte paktvā bhojayediti
GSD36mvir_sau:7213: evaṃ ca sati ekādaśāhasūtakāntarūpakāladvayopetaṃ brāhmaṇakṣātriyādiviṣayaṃ vidhidvayamarthavadbhavati anyathā viṣṇuvacanādeva sūtakāntarūpakālopetenaikenaiva
GSD36mvir_sau:7222: evañca satyekādaśāhikānnavaśrāddhādāśaucānte vidhīyamānaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ karmāntaramiti gamyate iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7223: yadā ca“brāhmaṇe daśa piṇḍāḥ syuḥ“iti pāraskaravacanātprativarṇaṃ daśadvādaśapañcadaśatriṃśatpiṇḍāḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7224: yadā vā“sarvebhya“iti vākyāt dvitīyo daśaiva piṇḍā iti pakṣaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7225: sarveṣāṃ ca khasvāśaucāntyadine daśamaḥ piṇḍastadāpi kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādīnāmekādaśe
GSD36mvir_sau:7233: śāve tu sūtakaṃ cetsyānniśāśeṣe tathaiva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7238: eka eva vṛṣotsargo gaurekā tatra dīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:7247: navaśrāddhaṃ na kurvīta tripāde pañcake tathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7258: tatra brahmapurāṇādau“śirastvādyena piṇḍena“ityārabhya--“daśamena tu pūrṇatvaṃ“ityantena brāhmaṇe daśamapiṇḍasya daśamadine kartavyatāmuktvā--
GSD36mvir_sau:7259: deyastu daśamaḥ piṇḍo rājñāṃ vai dvādaśe 'hani /
GSD36mvir_sau:7261: śūdrāṇāṃ daśamaḥ piṇḍo māse pūrṇe vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7263: viṣṇunā tu āśaucadinasaṅkhayayā piṇḍasaṅkhayoktā“yāvadāśaucaṃ pretasyodakaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ ca dadyuḥ“iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7265: brāhmaṇe daśa piṇḍāḥ syuḥ kṣatriye dvādaśa smṛtāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7272: sampūrṇe tu tato māse piṇḍaśeṣaṃ samāpayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7276: rājñāṃ dvādaśe vaiśyānāṃ pañcadaśa ityādinā daśamapiṇḍamātrotkarṣastu madhyamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7280: māsaṃ yāvadvātrapūrakapiṇḍāsamāptau kathamekādaśāhikaśrāddhavidhiḥ kathaṃ ca viṣṇūktaḥ--
GSD36mvir_sau:7286: itvāṅgirasavacanātsarveṣāṃ daśāhamevāśaucamiti pakṣaḥ sāmprataṃ cāyameva bahudhā pracārībhūtaḥ kṣatriyādyācārasaṃvādī ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7291: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7292: dvau dvau piṇḍau pradātavyau śeṣāṃstu daśame 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:7296: evaṃ ca gātrapūrakapiṇḍadānaprakārāṇāmapi anayaiva rītyāvirodha iti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:7301: āśaucasya ca hrāse 'pi piṇḍān dadyāddaśaiva tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:7323: tatpātheyaṃ hi bhavati mṛtasya manujasya ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:7325: atra ca śiṣṭaiḥ prathamadine kriyamāṇatvādādyadinaṃ grāhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7326: smṛtyarthasāre tu sañcayane kṛte manuṣyalokātpretalokaṃ gacchata āmena pātheyaśrāddhamekoddiṣṭavidhānena ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7330: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7333: viṣṇustu caturthamapi dinamāha--“caturthe divase 'sthisañcayanaṃ kuryātteṣāṃ gaṅgāmbhasi prakṣepa“iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7339: sadyaḥ śauce tatkṣaṇaṃ tu kartavya iti niścayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7341: pālāśe tvasthidāhe ca sadyaḥ sañcayanaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7346: na ca brahmapurāṇoktavyavasthāpakṣe saptamanavamadinapakṣayornirviṣayatā syāditi vaktavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7370: dviraindave tu kurvāṇaḥ punaḥ śāvaṃ samaśnute //
GSD36mvir_sau:7372: darśātprācīna ekaḥ kṣīṇa indurdarśottaramaparo bhāvī vṛddhimān /
GSD36mvir_sau:7373: kālādarśe tu etadagre tatheti kṛtvā vacanāntaraṃ likhitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7376: evaṃ sāmānyena mātāpitṛviṣaye 'pi darśa eva piṇḍodakadānāditantrasamāpriprasaktau--
GSD36mvir_sau:7389: bhavatu vā pitṛviṣaye 'pi niyāmakaṃ tathāpi“asvargyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmyamapyācarenna
GSD36mvir_sau:7391: gālavavacanaṃ bādhyata iti pitryāśaucamadhye darśapāte 'pi yāvadāśaucaṃ piṇḍādikaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7393: atha vā kṣetrajasya bījipitṛviṣayaṃ dattakādiputrāṇāṃ pratigrahītrādimātāpitṛviṣayaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7394: vā gālavavacanaṃ gautamavacanaṃ tu aurasaputrikāputrayormātāpitṛviṣayam. atha vā
GSD36mvir_sau:7395: aurasādīnāṃ sarve ṣāmapi svamātāpitṛviṣaye āpadanāpatkalpāśrayaṇena vyavasthā vijñeyeti madanapārijātaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7396: mādhavanirṇayāmatādau tryahānantaraṃ darśapāte mātāpitṛtantrasyāpi samāptirna tu tryahamadhye darśapāte gautamavacanamapi tadviṣayakameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7397: mātāpitṛvyatiriktānāṃ tu daśāhamadhye yadā kadāciddarśapāte tantrasamāptireveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7398: daśāhamadhye darśapāte darśātpūrvaṃ pramādālasyādinā yadā pretatantramanārabdhaṃ tadā tasya darśottaramapi ārambhaḥ samāptiścocitaiva tadā dviraindavatādoṣo 'pi parihṛto bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7399: naca“ādyendāveva kartavyā“iti vacanāt darśānurodhenārambho 'pi darśātpūrvamākṣipta iti śahkanīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7400: ādyondāvevetyatra kartavyā iti na vidhīyate tathāsati“ādyandau“iti“kartavyā“iti ca vidheyadvaye vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7401: tenātrāpi dviraindava iti niṣedhāt dviraindavatvameva niṣidhyata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7402: kvaciddarśapātavat saṅkrāntivyatīpātayorapi pāte tantrasamāptiḥ vacanaṃ ca saṅgraha itikṛtvā likhitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7407: atha navamiśrāṇi ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni cetyevaṃprasiddhānāṃ māsikānāṃ kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7410: tāni ca maraṇamāsādārabhya saṃvatsaraṃ yāvatpratimāsaṃ vidhīyamānāni dvādaśa ūnamāsikaṃ traipākṣikam ūnaṣāṇmāsikamūnābdikaṃ cetyeva ṣoḍaśa bhavanti
GSD36mvir_sau:7441: ekāhena tu ṣaṇmāsā yadā syurapi vā tribhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7445: ekenāhnā nyūne ekadinapūrttinyūne tadantime dine ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7449: māsikāni svakīye tu divase dvādaśe 'pi vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7455: ūnā nyūneṣu māseṣu viṣamāhe same 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7459: ṣaṣṭhe ṣāṇmāsikaṃ kuryāt dvādaśe māsi cābdikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7466: kintu tripakṣa ityadhikaraṇasaptamyanurodhādvṛtte pravṛtte ityartha iti kaścit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7469: dvādaśe 'hani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param //
GSD36mvir_sau:7470: iti brahmapurāṇavākye 'pi pūrvodāhṛtavacanopātta-vṛtta iti padasya atīta iti yathāśrutamevārthaṃ kṛtvā atrāpi tripakṣe ityasyāgre 'tīta iti śeṣaṃ pūrayanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7479: atra ca dvitīyādimāsikāni dvitīyatṛtīyādi māseṣu mṛtāhe kartavyāni ādyamāsikaṃ tu ekādaśe 'hni kartavyamityāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:7482: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7488: ādyamṛtatithiṃ gṛhītvottaramutatitheḥ pūrvatithiparyantaṃ triṃśattithisamudāyātmakacāndramāsamānena caitraśuklapañcamyāṃ mṛtasyāgrimaśuklacaturthyāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7489: evamūnaṣāṇmāsikonābdakayorekāhanyūnatāpakṣe tryahanyūtāpakṣe ca tṛtīyāyāṃ pratipadi ca tayoranuṣṭhānamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7499: mādhavena tūnaṣāṇmāsikaṃ saptamāsagatamṛtāhadinātpūrvedyuranuṣṭheyam ūnābdikaṃ ca dvitīyavatsarādermṛtāhadinātpūrvedyuḥ kartavyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7504: māsādau bhavaṃ māsikamiti vyutpattyā vā māsikasya yadyapi tanmāsabhavanaṃ tanmāsasambandho
GSD36mvir_sau:7507: tathāpi prathamātikrame kāraṇā bhāvāt vakṣyamāṇasmārttabahuvacanānurodhācca māsopakrama eva kartavyatā niścīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7509: māsikāni svakīye tu divasa“iti“mṛtāheṣvitarāṇi tu“iti“mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ“iti ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7511: dvādaśe 'hani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:7512: māsi māsi tu kartavyaṃ yāvatsamvatsaraṃ dvijaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7517: ekādaśe caturthe ca māsi māsi ca vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7524: tṛtīyamāsikaṃ tṛtīyamāsasyādyamṛtatithau kriyamāṇatvāccaitraśuklapañcamīpramītasya vaiśākha śuklapañcamyāṃ kriyamāṇaṃ dvitīyamāsikaṃ jyeṣṭhaśuklapañcamyāṃ tṛtīyamāsikaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7525: evamagre 'pi tattanmāse budhvā dvādaśamāsasya phālgunasyādyamṛtatithau pañcamyāṃ dvādaśamāsikaṃ kṛtvā ūnābdikaṃ caitraśuklacaturthyāṃ bhavati
GSD36mvir_sau:7526: yadā tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇe“tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇam“itikātyāyanapakṣastadā tasminneva dine ūnābdikasapiṇḍīkaraṇayorbaddhakramatvādūnābdikaṃ kṛtvā sapiṇḍīkṛtiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7528: tadā pūrvadine caturthyāmūnābdikaṃ kṛtvā caitraśuklapañcamyāṃ dvitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tatraivābdikāmitiboddhavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7530: kātyāyanavākye 'pi saṃvatsare pūrṇe sati dbitīyadine sapiṇḍīkaraṇamiti vyākhyāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7533: nyūnābde yattadardhe yadapi tadapare dvādaśāhe tripakṣe /
GSD36mvir_sau:7535: tatrādyamāsikaṃ mṛtāhe prāptam--“ādyamekādaśe 'hani“itivacanādekā daśe 'hni utkṛṣya vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7537: tataścaikādaśī'hni śrāddhatrayaṃ navaśrāddhāntyam ādyamāsikaṃ svatantraikoddiṣṭaṃ ceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7538: smṛtyarthasāre 'pyuktaṃ svatantraikoddiṣṭe kriyamāṇe anyeṣāṃ tantreṇānuṣṭhānasiddhiricchatāmasti pṛthaganuṣṭhānapakṣe cādau svatantraikoddiṣṭaṃ kāryamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7541: anyathonānāṃ tattanmāsikottaratvaṃ traipakṣikasya ca dvitīyottaratvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7543: na caivaṃ sarvādyamṛtatithau māsikāpattirmṛtatithermṛtatithiṃ yāvaccāndrasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7544: mṛtatitheriti vāvadhau paccamī tenānyamṛtatithereva pūrvamāsaśabdārthatvam ataśca prathamamāsikaṃ dvitīyamṛtatithāveveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7547: nanu“pratisaṃvattsaraṃ caivaṃ“itivacanādādyamṛtatithiṃ gṛhītvā ādyasāṃvatsāṃrekasyāpi ādmāsikavatpravṛttiḥ syāditicet, satyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7549: pratyuta tasya dbitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithāvutpannatvādādyamatatithau prāptireva nāstīti dvitīyavatsarādau kriyamāṇamābdikamityucyate tṛtīyavatsarādau tu pratyābdikamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7552: dbitīyasaṃvatsarādāvābdikaṃ tṛtīyasaṃvatsarādau pratyābdi kamiti krama iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7567: iti ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacane trayodaśamāsikasya niṣedhaśravaṇādadhikamāse 'pi māsikavikalpa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7569: yattu hemādṣādau ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānāṃ prakārāntareṇa gaṇanaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇādīnāṃ ca ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāntargatatvenopavarṇanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7572: nṝṇāṃ tu tyaktadehānāṃ śrāddhāḥ ṣoḍaśa sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7580: riktayośca tithyorityekenānhā nyūne ṣaṣṭhe dvādaśe ca māse ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7597: viruddhagaṇanasya tu śākhābhadena deśabhedena vā vyavasthā draṣṭavyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7598: kṣatriyādibhirapyetadādyaṃ śrāddhaṃ satyapyāśauca ekā daśe 'hanyeva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7614: āhitāgnermaraṇadinā danyasmin dine dāhe sati dāhadinādārabhya navaśrāddhaikādaśāhikatraipakṣikāntāni kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7631: mukhyaṃ śrāddhaṃ māsi māsi aparyāptāvṛtuṃ prati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7634: pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe māsikaṃ śrāddhamiti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7636: ṛtoratra cāndrasya saurasya vāsambhavānmāsadvayaśrāddhamagrimamāsi kāryamiti tasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7638: pūrvamāse mṛtitithimullaṅdhyottaramāse mṛtitithau atikrāntaśrāddhaṃ prāptakālaṃ ca śrāddhaṃ ceti dvayaṃ tatra kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7640: yathā ekādaśāhe ādyaṃ nirvarttya ūnamāsikaṃ ca svakāle kṛtvā
GSD36mvir_sau:7641: tato dvitīyamāsikaṃ traipakṣikaṃ ca tṛtīyamāsikena saha,
GSD36mvir_sau:7649: atha vā dvādaśāhena dvādaśabhirdinaiḥ apavarge tṛtīyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7658: dvādaśabhirdinaiḥ ṣoḍaśa śrāddhāni kṛtvā taduttaradine sapiṇḍīkaraṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7659: śrāddhacintāgaṇau tu dvādaśāhamupakramya dvādaśabhirddinairdvādaśa māsikāni śrāddhāni kṛtvā tataḥ pareha'ni sapiṇḍīkaraṇamityuktam iti tṛtīyakalpaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:7660: atha vā ekasminneva dine ekāhe ekādaśāhe dva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7661: daśāhe vā dvādaśāpi māsikāni kṛtvā sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti caturthaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7668: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vivnaḥ grajāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7669: māse 'nyasmina tithau tasyāṃ kuryādantaritaṃ ca yat //
GSD36mvir_sau:7670: antaritaṃ māsikaṃ taduttarasambandhini māsi kuryāditi kālādarśe /
GSD36mvir_sau:7673: āśaucādinā tu māsikāntarāye āśaucānte uttaramāse mṛtatithau vā amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kṛṣṇaikādaśryāṃ vā anukalpena śuklaikādaśyāmapi veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7678: etāni ṣoḍaśa śrāddhāni saṃvatsarādarvāk dvādaśāhādau sipaṇḍīkaraṇe kartavye apakṛṣya sapiṇḍīkaraṇātpūrvaṃ karttaṃvyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:7683: sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt prāgapakṛṣya kṛtānyapi sapiṇḍanottaraṃ punastāni svasvakāle kartavyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:7687: māsikaṃ codakummaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:7698: ṣoḍaśānāṃ madhye yāni svasvakāle dvitrāṇi kṛtāni tataḥ sapiṇḍana upasthite tatpūrvaṃ yāni avaśiṣṭāni apakṛṣya kṛtāni tānyeva punaḥ kuryāt na tvanyāni svasvakāle kṛtānītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7699: vivāhādyupasthitau tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇātpūrvamapakṛṣya kṛtānyapi vūdhdyanantaraṃ punarnaiva kāryāṇītyāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:7701: nirvartya vṛddhitantraṃ tu māsikāni na tantrayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7704: vṛdhdyatantaraṃ māsikāni na kuryāttadā ayātayāmaṃ nūtanaṃ maraṇaṃ na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7716: yathākālaṃ tu kāryāṇi nānyathā mucyate tataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7719: arvāksapiṇḍīkaraṇe tu kena niroddhavyo 'pakarṣa iti ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvaiva sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ saṃvatsarātprāgapi kartavyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7721: yadā prāksapiṇḍīkaraṇāt pretaśrāddhāni karoti tadaikoddiṣṭavidhānena kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7722: yadā tu tadūrdhvaṃ karoti tadābdikaṃ śrāddhaṃ yo yathā karoti pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ vā tathā māsikāni kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7726: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi //
GSD36mvir_sau:7728: tathā saṃvatsaraparyantaṃ pratidinaṃ pretodde śena bhojanaparyāptānnasahita udakumbho deyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7738: pāraskareṇa piṇḍadānamapyatra pākṣikamuktam--aharaharannamasmai brāhmaṇāyodakumbhaṃ ca dadyātpiṇḍamapyeke nipṛṇantīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7749: annaṃ caiva svaśattyā tu saṅkhayāṃ kṛtvābdikasya tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:7750: dātavyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyastu yadvā tanniṣkrayaṃ ca yat //
GSD36mvir_sau:7757: ekasminnapi dine tāvanto yathāsambhavaṃ yadā kadācidvā vatsaramadhye tāvanto deyā
GSD36mvir_sau:7760: tathāpi guṇapradhānabhāvāvivakṣayā idamannameṣa kumbha iti pṛthageva tyāgaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7761: atra ca yadā pretoddeśenānnasya tatsthānīyasya vā dravyasya śraddhayā tyāgaḥ śrāddhamiti vijñāneśvaroktaṃ śrāddhalakṣaṇaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7763: pitrādīṃścaturthyantapadairuddiśya havistyāgaḥ śrāddhamiti śūlapāṣyuktaṃ ca śrāddha lakṣaṇaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7768: ahanyahani yaccoditaṃ tannityāmatyabhidhānādyatrāvadhidinaviśeṣānupādānena jīvanāvadhi niyojyatvaṃ pratīyate tannityam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7782: tripuṣkaraṃ ca tripānnakṣatraṃ bhadrā tithirgurubhaumaravivārāṇāmanyatamasya melane bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7792: dvitīyāsaptamīdvādaśīnāṃ bhadrātithīnāṃ punarvasūttarāphālgunīviśākhottarāṣāḍhāpūrvābhādrapadanakṣatrāṇāṃ bhānubhaumaśanaiścarāṇāṃ ca melane tripuṣkaraṃ dbimelane dvipuṣkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7807: tatra śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta gṛhī putradhanakṣayāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:7814: nakṣatre tu na kurvīta yasmin jāto bhavennaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7815: na prauṣṭhapadayoḥ kārṃyaṃ tathāgneye ca bhārata/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7816: dāruṇeṣu ca sarveṣu pratyarau ca vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7817: jyautiṣe yāni coktāni tāni yatnena varjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7862: atra hi karturuddeśyasya niragnitve nimitte kālo niyamyate tasyaiva karmāṅgatvena vidhīyamānatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7863: yattu kāle karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla itinyāyavidvacanaṃ tadanupādeyatvābhiprāyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7867: atra hi pūrṇa iti varṣasamāptyuttaradina ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7875: tatrāpi sati saptamyeva na tu daśānte paṭa itivadvācakatvaṃ pūrvodāhṛtavākyavirodhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7876: yacca smṛtyarthasāre dvādaśamāsopāntyadine ūnābdikaṃ taduttaradine sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ taduttaradine mṛtāharūpe prathamābdikamiti,
GSD36mvir_sau:7878: evañca sati ekoddiṣṭapradhānakatvena madhyāhne sapiṇḍanaṃ vidhāya pārvaṇapradhānakatvena
GSD36mvir_sau:7879: vāparāhṇe sapiṇḍanaṃ kṛtvā sambhave 'parāhṇa eva gauṇakālarūpasāyāhne vā sāṃvatsarikaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7881: kecittu mṛtāhadine sapiṇḍane ābdikalopa eva mukhyakālasyābhāvāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:7884: nahi gauṇakāle 'nuṣṭhānaṃ niṣiddhamapi tu mukhyakāle 'nadhikṛtasya gauṇakāle /
GSD36mvir_sau:7886: yacca śeṣabhojanaṃ vinā karmāsamāpterna karmāntarārambha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7889: taduttaraṃ ca rāgataḥ prāpte bhojane pratipattimākāṅkṣamāṇasya śeṣasya niyamo na tu śeṣabhojanaṃ śrāddhāṅgam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7892: vihitena vyavahitaṃ sadābdikaśrāddhāṅgakaśeṣabhojanena saha tantreṇaikasmin dine
GSD36mvir_sau:7895: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7898: gomilo 'pi yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate iti vṛddhirvā yadahaḥ syāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:7902: sapiṇḍīkaraṇasya madhyāhnakālatvāt vṛddhiśrāddhasya ca prātaḥ kālikatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7913: ayaṃ cāpakarṣaḥ sapiṇḍanaṃ vinā pitrādīnāṃ pārvaṇārhapitṛtvaprāptyabhāvena nāndīśrāddhasya kartumaśakyatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:7914: jñeyo na tu vācanika iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7915: apare tu na hyadṛṣṭārthe hetunā prayojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7916: na hyapakarṣe devatāsambhavaḥ prayojakaḥ kintu vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7917: devatāyā abhāve tu jīvatpitṛkasyeva karmalopa eva yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7920: kiñcāhitāgnairdaihitrasya vidyamāne 'pi niragnau mātule pārvaṇānuroghena mātāmahasapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ prāpnuyāddauhitrānurodhena vā mātulasya gauṇakāle
GSD36mvir_sau:7935: na cāstu saptamī paraṃ tu satisaptamī sā,
GSD36mvir_sau:7936: evaṃ ca māsikābdikādiśrāddhavanmṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇa miti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7937: “upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī“itinyāyātsa tisaptamīto 'dhikaraṇasaptamyā eva balīyastvātpūraṇārthakapratyayabalā hvitīyapakṣasyaiva lābhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7938: na ca“pūrṇe saṃvatsare ṣaṇmāse tripakṣe yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate“iti gobhilavākye
GSD36mvir_sau:7943: hemādristu pakṣatraye pūrṇa iti vadannapi tṛtīyapakṣasampūrttidinasyaivādhikaraṇatvamāha saptamīsvārasyāt na tu taduttaradinasyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7953: atrārvākdarśādityuktāvapi“ekādaśāhe dvādaśāhe vā“ityādi baudhāyanādyuktavihitakāla eva kartavyaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:7962: ddhāviṃśatidinādūrdhvaṃ bhavati tadāśaucātparato dvādaśasu divaseṣu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvā trayodaśadivase sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7964: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7969: tatronamāsikatraipakṣikonaṣāṇmāsikāni prathamadvitīyaṣaṣṭhadvādaśādivaseṣu kāryāṇi divasasya māsa tthānīyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7970: ata evāgre“saṃvatsarābhyantare yadyadhikamāsako bhavettadā māsikārthaṃ dinamekaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7971: vardhayet“iti tenaivoktam dvādaśāhaṃ trayodaśa iti cāśaucottaradinamārabhyaiva“parato
GSD36mvir_sau:7974: tatā sāgninā pravasitena vicchinnāgninā vā pārvaṇaśrāddhānurodhenāpi apakarṣaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7978: na pārvaṇaṃ nābhyudayaṃ kurvanna labhate phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:7981: etacca yanmate piṇḍapitṛyajñanimittaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇāpakarṣaṇaṃ tanmate 'pi pituriva māturapi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7982: ekatvaṃ sā gatā bharttuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake /
GSD36mvir_sau:7990: anyathā mātāmahena saha sapiṇḍane mātāmahapiṇḍabhoktṛtvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7992: tasmātsāgninā kartrā āśaucottaraṃ dvādaśasu divaseṣu māsikāni kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni maraṇadinādārabya vā dvādaśe dine ekādaśe 'hani eva vā darśapāte tatraiva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7993: atra ca pramādādakaraṇe tripakṣādiṣu vihiteṣu kāleṣu kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7999: tasyaiva dvādaśāhādīnāṃ mukhyatvāt tadagrimāṇāmanukalpatvena vidhānamuktaṃ na tu niragnikasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:8003: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8007: baudhāyanaḥ--atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tripakṣe tṛtīyamāsi ṣaṣṭhe vaikādaśe vā dvādaśāhe veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8008: atrāpi pūrvoktayuttyādhikaraṇatve siddhe yadatīte ṣaṣṭhe māsīti kasyacidvyākhyānaṃ tatra mūlaṃ mṛgyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8013: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāta /
GSD36mvir_sau:8018: asthitiśca rājopadravādinā deśatyāgasambhāvanārūpā rogādinā karmāsāmarthyarūpā vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8019: prāśastyaṃ ca mukhyakālānuṣṭhiteneva tasmin kāle 'nuṣṭhitenāpyanena pretatva nivṛttirbhavatīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8020: dvādaśāhaśca dvādaśañca tadahaścetivyutpattyā dvādaśaṃ dinaṃ tacca mṛtadināvadhikameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8021: dvādaśānāmahnāṃ saṅghāto dvādaśāhaḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāpakarṣakaḥ kālaḥ sa cābhyudayarūpa iti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8022: nanu kathamasya praśastatvaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ hi pitṛtvaprāptyarthaṃ na ca dvādaśāhe kṛtaṃ kevalaṃ tatpitṛtvāpādakaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:8032: ataḥ pūrvaṃ kṛte 'pi sapiṇḍane vatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛtteḥ kathamasya praśastatbamiticet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8033: ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyakṛtvā kṛte sapiṇḍane na pitṛtvaprāptirityetatparamidaṃ vacanadvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8038: nanu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣya kṛte sapiṇḍana pretatvanivṛtterjātatvātpunarmāsikodakumbhaśrāddhaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8042: māsikaṃ codakumbhaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:8045: kecittu vṛddhinimittaṃ vināpakṛṣṭe sapiṇḍane saṃvatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛttiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8051: pretatvācceha nistīrṇāḥ prāptā pitṛgaṇaṃ tu te //
GSD36mvir_sau:8053: yadi vāśavatyā gauṇekāle 'nuṣṭhāna daivāttaduttaraṃ vṛddhyādyāpadyeta tadā vṛddhikālaṃ prāpya pretatvaparihāro bhavati tasya vatsarāntakālatulyatvāditi vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8056: yadi cāhitāgnerdvādaśāhasyeva mukhyatvena pretatvanivṛttiphalakasya sapiṇḍanasyātra vihitatvāditi,
GSD36mvir_sau:8058: mukhyakālaśca na svarūpeṇa prayojakaḥ anyathā vatsarānte sapiṇḍanābhāve 'pi pretatvanivṛttiḥ syādeva tasmānmakhyakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva sapiṇḍanaṃ pretatvanivartakaṃ vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8059: evaṃ sati vihitasyānarthakatvānupapattyā vihitakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva pretatvanivartakamityastu kṛtaṃ mukhyatvenota /
GSD36mvir_sau:8061: kecittu sarveṣāmapi kālānāhitāgniṃ prati mukhyatvena dvādaśādikāleṣu kṛtaṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ vṛddhipūrvaṃ kṛtamiva pretatvanivartakamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8067: kecittu idaṃ sakalasādhāraṇamukhyakālasaṅgrāhakaṃ na tu niragnerekādaśāhādipratipādakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8069: evaṃ ca“yā tupūrvamamāvāsyā“ityādivākyaistāṃstān prati prāprāneva kālān vidadhannāpūrvaśrutimūlamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8073: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8080: anye tu vatsarānto mukhyastatsannihita ekādaśo māso jaghanyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8082: yadā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇārthaṃ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣyante tadā mṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau kāryāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8084: asambhave tu sapiṇḍanadine eva nimitte sannidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8085: atha vā sati kālavyavadhāne prāgudāhṛtaviṣṇuvākyāt dvādaśasu divaseṣu
GSD36mvir_sau:8092: iti vidhānānmāsaṃ śūdrasyāśaucasattvādavayavapiṇḍasya daśamasya taṃ prati sūtakānte vihitatvāt kathaṃ dvādaśāhe śūdrasya sapiṇḍanamitivācyam
GSD36mvir_sau:8094: ityetatpakṣamāśritya vā sacchūdrasya darśaśrāddhānurodhena ekādaśāhavidhivadvacanabalātsūtakanivṛttimabhyupetya vā vacanāt sūtakamadhya eva vā kāryamiti na doṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8095: vastuto dvādaśāhapadaṃ na maraṇadinādārabhya dvādaśāhaparaṃ kintu sūtakāntadivasādūrdhvaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8096: dvijātivat dvādaśasu divaseṣu dvādaśa māsikāni kṛtvā dvādaśāha eva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8098: ata eva tatroktam--yadyadhimāsastadā trayodaśe dina iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8102: deśāntaragatānāṃ ca putrāṇāṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8103: śrutvā tu vapanaṃ kāryaṃ daśāhaṃ tu tilodakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8108: raudrahaste ca rohiṇyāṃ maitrabhe vā samācaret //
GSD36mvir_sau:8112: śrāddhaṃ ca trividhaṃ pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ daivikaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8115: trīnuddiśya tu yattaddhi pārvaṇaṃ munayo viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8119: tatra yasyāṃ tithau pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ vihitaṃ sā yadi dinadvayasambandhinībhavettadā yasminpūrvasminparasminvā dine 'parāhṇavyāpinī tasmin dine pārvaṇamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8121: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8129: sā pitṛbhyo yato dattā hyaparāhṇaḥ svayaṃbhuvā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8130: yasyāmaparāhṇasambandhinyāṃ ravirastaṃ yāti sā pitṛkārye praśaste tyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8133: sā grāhyā pitṛkārye tu na pūrvāstānuyāyinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8135: tathā ca yāparāhṇavyāpinyastānuyāyinī sā pitṛkārye grāhyetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8136: yadā tu dinadvaye 'pi nāparāhṇavyā pinī tadāpi pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8143: mūlaṃ hi pitṛtṛptyarthaṃ paitraṃ coktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8145: titheḥ prāntaṃ surākhyaṃ hi upoṣyaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8146: pitryaṃ mūlaṃ titheḥ proktaṃ śāstrajñaiḥ kālakovidaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8148: na tatraudayikī grāhyā daive hyaudayikī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8150: sāyāhnavyāpinī yā tu pārvaṇe sā uhāhṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8153: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8155: bhānāvudite sati yad dvimuhūrtaṃ muhūrtadvayaṃ taddaivataṃ = daivakarmayogyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8156: astamite astaṃ gantumārabdhe bhānau astamayātpūrvaṃ yat trimuhūrtaṃ tatpitryaṃ = pitryakarmayogyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8158: dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptau tadādhikyavatī grāhyā “aṇurapi viśeṣo 'dhyavasāyakara'; iti nyāyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8159: dinadvaye 'pi sāmyenāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptiśca śrāddhāṅgatithervṛdhdyā kṣayeṇa sāmyena vā bhavati,
GSD36mvir_sau:8167: atra sarvatvādīnāṃ grāhyatithigatatvaṃ kharvadarpayoḥ parayorhisāyāśca pūrvasyā grāhyatvābhidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8169: yadā viṃśatighaṭīparimitā pūrvatithir bhavati dvāviṃśatighaṭīparimitā cottaratithistadā
GSD36mvir_sau:8174: yadā ca pūrvottaradinayoḥ pūrvottare tithī ekaviṃśatighaṭīparamite stastadāpi sāmyenaiva ghaṭītrayaparimitāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptirbhavati tithiśca sāmyamupaiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8175: atra vṛddhisāmyayoḥ parā grāhyā kṣaye pūrveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8178: āmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhṇa ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu madhyataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8185: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8188: madhyāhnavyāpinī yā tu tithiḥ pūrvā parāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8189: tasyāṃ pitṛbhyo dātavyaṃ hāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8205: prātaḥkāle tu na śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8208: śrāddheṣu prātaḥ kālasya niṣedhāttadatiriktapūrvāhṇo daivikaśrāddhakālaḥ tadvyāptyaiva pūrvavannirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8209: viśeṣastu yadā vṛddhikṣayādibhirdinadvaye 'pi tulyakālā karmakālavyāptistadottaraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8210: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitrye cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8220: āvartanaṃ nāma dinamadhyaṃ tathā ca āvartanāvadhikaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvahṇastadavadhikaḥ paro bhāgo 'parāhṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8228: pūrvāhṇo vai devānāṃ madhyandino manuṣyāṇāmaparāhṇaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tasmādaparāhṇe dadātīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8230: pramāṇāntarāpratītatvātpūrvāhṇe devebhyo dadāti madhyandine manuṣyebhya iti vidhī kalpyete iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8233: pūrvāhṇaḥ prathamaḥ prokto madhyāhnastu tataḥ paraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8239: pūrvāhṇaḥ praharaṃ sārddhaṃ madhyāhnaḥ praharaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8242: pañcadhā vibhāgadyotikā śatapathaśrutiḥ--ādityastveva sarva ṛtavaḥ sa yadaivodetyatha vasanto yathā
GSD36mvir_sau:8243: saṅgavo 'tha grīṣmo yathā madhyandino 'tha varṣā yadāparāhno 'tha śaradyadaivāstametyatha hemanta iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8252: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadāṃ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8254: ahnastriṃśadghaṭīparimitatve nyūnādhikatve vā muhūrtāḥ pañcadaśaiveti sarvadetyasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8256: raudraḥ śvetaśca maitraśca tathā sārabhaṭaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8267: madhyāhno 'pi tridhāvibhāge pañcamuhūrtaparimitaścaturdhāvibhāge praharapa rimitaḥ pañcadhāvibhāge trimuhūrtapāramita iti trividhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8274: ete ca pūrvāhṇādayastu tattatkarmasu yathāviniyojakaṃ yathālābhaṃ grāhyā yavabrīhyādivat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8281: kuṃ yatra gopatirgobhiḥ kārtsnyena tapati kṣaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:8282: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyastatra dattaṃ mahāphalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8286: sarvapṛthivītāpakatvaṃ khamadhyagatasya sūryasya bhavatīti tadupalakṣitaḥ kālaḥ kutapaśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8291: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8294: tilā darbhāśca madhyāhno navaite kupāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8304: rātrau śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta rākṣasī kīrttitā hi sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8316: caturthe prahare prāpte śrāddhaṃ tatra na kārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8321: yattvatra śūlapāṇyādibhiruktaṃ na vikalpabhiyā paryudāsāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatvena tulyabalatvābhāvāt tadaprasakteḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:8326: eteṣāṃ ca paryudāsatvam amāvāsyāvidhiśeṣatayā rātryādītarāmāvāsyāyāmi ti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8332: te hi ahorātraṃ vinā karmakaraṇāśaktestadvadahorātraparā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8335: purāṇeṣvapi ca“adya janmāṣṭamīṃ prāpya“iti sahkalpavākyaṃ sāvanadinasya vidhiṃ sūcayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:8337: nanu paryudāsasyāpi paryudasanīyaprāptisāpekṣatvātsarvaśrāddheṣu ca pūrvāhṇāparāhṇāditattadvelānāṃ niyatatvena rātryādiprāptyabhāvātkathamete paryudāsā iti cet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8350: darśaprakaraṇagatasyāpi ca niṣedhasya prakaraṇe niveśāmbhavādutkarṣa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8353: sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti na tu grahaṇādivattatpuraskārema vidhirastīti tatra vikalpaprasattyabhāvātsa
GSD36mvir_sau:8357: ityādivacanaṃ tadapi vāśabdopanibandhādvacanāntaraparyudastaparātreranyatra prāptaprātassāyāhnādigauṇakālasyāpi mukhyatvadyotanārthaṃ na punā rātrāvapi tatkartavyatāparamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8358: apare tu prakaraṇābādhe sambhavati tadvādhasyāyogātprakṛtāveva daivānmānuṣādvā pratibandhādasamāpte
GSD36mvir_sau:8359: śrāddhe yadi ravirastamiyāttadā prārabdhatvādrātrāvapi tatsamāpane prasakte na naktaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8361: tathā ca sāmikṛtameva sthāpayitvā paredyuḥ kṛtvātatsamāpanīyaṃ yajamānenāpi ca taduttarameva bhoktavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8363: vastutastu aparāhṇādividhayo na niyamārthāḥ kintu prāśastyātiśayārthāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8365: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ tu tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8367: ataśca teṣāmaniyatatvāttatra sarvabelānāṃ prasaktau yukte rātriparyudāsaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8376: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8382: dināṣṭamabhāgāntyamuhūrtayoḥ punarniṣedhāt na tu sarvathā vihitatvameva rātriprātaḥ kālavat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8387: bhavatu vā ekodiṣṭavṛddhyādiṣu madhyāhnaprātarādiśrutirniyamārthā aparāhṇaśrutistu pārvaṇe pūrvodāhṛtavākyaiḥ prāśastyātiśayārthaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8389: atra ca pārvaṇasyāparāhṇakālatve 'pi prārambhaḥ kutapa eva /
