GSD36mvir_sau:8390: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8391: tatrāṣṭamo muhūrto yaḥ sa kālaḥ kutapaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8397: etasyāpi ca vikṛtibhūte pārvaṇe vyavasthā smaryate mārkaṇḍeyena--
GSD36mvir_sau:8399: kṛṣṇapakṣāparāhṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8402: idaṃ hi vacanaṃ śuklapakṣasambandhināṃ yugamanvādisāṃvatsarikādīnāṃ sarveṣā sarvasya prayogasya pūrvāhṇakālatvaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣasambandhināṃ cāparāhṇakālatvaṃ na vidadhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8404: naca kṛṣṇapakṣāṃśe 'nuvādaḥ śuklapakṣāṃśa eva tu prakṛtiprāptāparāhṇabādhenaiva pūrvāhṇavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8407: ca taduttarabhāgasya pakṣabhedenopakramakālatvavyavasthāpanamevānena vākyena kriyata iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:8409: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8420: evamāmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhne ityatrāpi sa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8424: ayaṃ cāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhnavidhirdvijātikarttṛkāmaśrāddha eva na tu śūdrakarttṛkāmaśrāddhe 'pi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8438: vacanaṃ tu yadi sākaraṃ tadā sarvatrāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhṇavikalpitaṃ kālāntaraṃ vidhattāṃ na tu śūdrāmaśrāddhe kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8442: atra ca prātaḥkālaḥ pañcadhāvibhāgena pakṣāntareṣu prātarvibhāgābhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8443: yastu tredhācaturdhāvibhaktadinādyabhāgayorapi kvacitprātaḥśabdaprayogaḥ sa gauṇa ityuktaṃ parvanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:8458: na coktavacane niṣedhānupapattiḥ tasya samūlatve vikalpenopapatteriti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:8461: naca tripiṇḍapadena piṇḍamātravidhānaṃ tritvaṃ tu avayutyānuvāda iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8462: bhavanmate niṣedhavākyasya nirmūlatvena piṇḍadānarūpaprākṛtāṅgasya punārvidhāne pūrvatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8463: piṇḍadānasya prādhānyapakṣe tu tasya śrāddhapadenaiva siddheḥ punarvidhāne
GSD36mvir_sau:8465: na ca niṣedhasya samūlatvāṅgīkāreṇaiva pākṣikatvopapādanārthaṃ piṇḍadānavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8477: bharaṇīṣu ca kurvīta piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ na hi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8481: asyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sa gayāśrāddhakṛdbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8495: ityādīni śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vacanāni tadekavākyatayā śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vyākhyeyānīti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8496: vastutastu hemādrau tithau vāre ca śrāddhasya bihitatvāttatprayuktaśrāddha eva piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8525: śāstraprāptasya piṇḍadānasya niṣedhe“natau paśau karoti“iti vadvikalpāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8528: atra hi anekāni śrāddhāni ekasmin vākye upādāya piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ śṛyamāṇo na tattacchrāddhaprakaraṇe paṭhita iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8532: ityādivākyeṣu smṛtyantaravihitaśrāddhānuvādena na piṇḍadānaṃ paryudatyate yenoktadoṣāvakāśaḥ syāt kintu apūrvakarmotpattiḥ kriyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8553: māsaṃ samagraṃ parayā bhattyā snāyīta kārttike //
GSD36mvir_sau:8565: darśaṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vā prārabhya snānamācaret /
GSD36mvir_sau:8577: na tasya duritaṃ kiñcinnādhayo vyādhayo nṛpa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8580: kārttikāśvayuje māsi caitre vāpi tathā nṛpa/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8586: āśvine māsi vai pūṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8601: māghe māsi tṛtīyāṃ guḍasya lavaṇasya ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8609: māsi bhādrapade śuklā śivā lokeṣu pūjitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8610: māsi māghe tathā śuklā yā caturthī mahīpate/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8611: jñeyā sā śāntidā nityaṃ śāntiṃ kuryātsadaiva tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8612: yadā śuklacaturthyāṃ tu vāro bhaumasya vai bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8613: tadā sā sukhadā jñeyā sukhānāmeti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8623: śuklā mārgaśire puṇyā śrāvaṇe yā ca pañcamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8627: yeyaṃ bhādrapade māsi ṣaṣṭhī tu bharatarṣabha/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8639: māsi bhādrapade śuklā saptamī yā gaṇādhipa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8641: yā tu mārgaśire māsi śuklapakṣe tu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8662: tasyāṃ snānaṃ prakurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8665: tasyāṃ vratādi kurvāṇo labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8672: caitre trayodaśī puṇyā tasyāṃ daśaguṇaṃ phalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8676: māghasya kṛṣṇapakṣe yo dāne bahuphalā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8699: śuklapakṣe tu saptamyāṃ yadā saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8702: sarveṃ koṭiguṇaṃ proktaṃ bhāskarasya vaco yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8716: tadā sā tu mahāpuṇyā jayantī cāṣṭamī smṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8727: nāmnā sā vijayā khyātā tithīnāmuttamā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8728: yo dadāti tilaprasthaṃ prāpya kālaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:8734: hastayuktā tu vaiśākhe jyeṣṭhe tu svātisaṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8735: jyeṣṭhayā tu tathāṣāḍhe mūlopetā tu vaiṣṇave //
GSD36mvir_sau:8737: tathā bhādrapade māsi śravaṇena ca saṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8745: māghyāṃ tu samatītāyāṃ śravaṇena tu seyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8746: dvādaśī yā bhavet kṛṣṇā proktā sā tilavaiṣṇavī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8762: mahatī pūrṇamāsī sā yuktā pūrṇendunā gurau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8765: paurṇamāsī tu mahatī proktā saṃvatsare tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8769: pūrṇimā jīvavāre tu mahacchabdā hi sā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8771: harikṣetre ca gaṅgāyāṃ sāmudre naimiṣe tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8774: aindre guruḥ śaśī caiva prājāpatye ravistathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8775: pūrṇamāsī tu sā jñeyā mahājyaiṣṭhīti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8777: āgneyaṃ ca yadā ṛkṣaṃ kārtikyāṃ tu bhavetkvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8779: yadā yāmyaṃ bhavedṛkṣaṃ puṇyaṃ tasyāṃ tithau kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8781: prājāpatyaṃ yadā ṛkṣaṃ yadā tasyāṃ narādhipa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8783: mande vārke gurau vāpi vāreṣveteṣu ca triṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8784: trīṇyetāni ca ṛkṣāṇi proktāni vrahnaṇā svayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8791: meṣasthasca yadā sauriḥ siṃhe ca gurucandramāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8792: bhāskaraḥ śravaṇākhye tu mahāmāghī tu sā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8797: amā somena bhaumena guruṇā raviṇā tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8803: amāvāsyā yadā puṣye raudrarkṣe vā punarvasau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8807: māghāsite pañcagaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
GSD36mvir_sau:8808: ṛkṣeṇa kālaḥ sa paraḥ pitṝṇāṃ na hyalpapuṇyairnṛpa/
GSD36mvir_sau:8820: divaiva yogaḥ śasto 'yaṃ na tu rātrau kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:8826: kapilāṃ ca dvijāgryāya dattvā kratuphalaṃ labhet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8828: bhādramāsyasite pakṣe bhānau caiva kare sthite /
GSD36mvir_sau:8829: pāte kuje ca rohiṇyāṃ sā ṣaṣṭhī kapilābhidhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8833: ayaṃ ca yadā sampūrṇaḥ tadaiva puṇyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8835: saṃyoge tu caturṇāṃ tu nirddiṣṭā paraṇeṣṭhinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8838: amāvāsyā tu somena saptamī bhānunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:8846: ekādaśyāṃ site pakṣe puṣyarkṣaṃ yadi jāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8849: śukle vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe caturthī vā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8854: rātrau snānaṃ na kurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8855: naimittikaṃ ca kurvīta snānaṃ dānaṃ ca rātriṣu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8858: madhyaṃ dine 'rdharātre ca śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tu sāmiṣam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8863: tatra siṃhārke śuklacaturthyāṃ candradarśanaṃ na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8871: ṣaṣṭhīṣu tailaṃ palamaṣṭamīṣu kṣaurakriyāṃ caiva caturdaśīṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8876: saptamyāṃ na spṛśettailaṃ nīlavastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8877: na cāpyāmalakaiḥ snānaṃ na kuryātkalahaṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8886: atra sannihitaṃ pāpaṃ taile māṃse bhage kṣure //
GSD36mvir_sau:8890: iti smaraṇāt tato 'nyatra doṣābhāva iti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:8893: tailaniṣedhe ca sarvatra tilatailasyaiva niṣedhaḥ tailapadasya tatraiva
GSD36mvir_sau:8899: caturdaśī aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā ca pūrṇimā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8908: parvasu nādīyīta na māṃsamasnīyāt parvasu hi rakṣaḥpiśācavyabhicārivīnnatambinīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8913: tailaṃ māṃsaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca kṣuraṃ caiva vivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8916: bhage māṃse kṣure taile nityaṃ tiṣṭhati parvasu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8919: patraṃ vā pāṭayetteṣāṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:8930: vasyā vāsyā vasī vāsī amāpūrvā ameti ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8940: māse nabhasyamāvāsyāṃ darbho grāhyo navaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8943: kuśāḥ śākaṃ ca puṣpāṇi gavārthe ca tṛṇādikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8950: amāvāsyāsu sarvāsu navaṃ vastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8965: vastraṃ ca pīḍayennaiva kṣureṇāpi na hiṃsyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8966: hemādrau tu caturthacaraṇe kareṇāpi hi budhyate iti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8968: tailaṃ na saṃspṛśedāmaṃ vṛkṣādīn chedayenna ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8969: pakṣādau ca ravau ṣaṣṭyāṃ riktāyāṃ ca tathā tithau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8979: nandāsu nābyaṅgamupācareta kṣauraṃ ca riktāsu jayāsu māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8980: pūrṇāsu yoṣit parivarjanīyā bhadrāsu sarvāṇi samārabheta //
GSD36mvir_sau:8981: nābhyaṅgamarke na ca bhūmiputre kṣīraṃ ca śukre ca kuje ca māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8982: budhena yoṣā na samācareta śeṣeṣu sarvāṇi sadaiva kuryāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:8983: citrāsu haste śravaṇeṣu tailaṃ kṣīraṃ viśākhāpratipatsu varjyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8989: na mṛcca nodakaṃ vāpi na niśāyāṃ tu gomayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8991: ayaṃ ca niṣedhaḥ śaucādyatiriktakarmasu tatra mṛdgrahaṇasya vihita tvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8994: ravibhavanasthe kāryaṃ jīve na kāryo vivāhastu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8999: siṃhe gurau siṃhalave vivāho neṣṭaśca godottarataśca yāvat /
GSD36mvir_sau:9006: supte viṣṇau nivartante kriyāḥ sarvāḥ śubhādikāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9009: puṇyāni yāni karmāṇi na syuḥ supte jagatpatau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9013: āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca caturthakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:9019: adhyetā narakaṃ yāti dātā nāpnoti tatphalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9022: rātrau dānaṃ na kurvīta kadācidapi kena cit /
GSD36mvir_sau:9024: viśeṣato niśīthe tu na śubhaṃ karma śarmaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:9040: tailābhyaṅgo nārkavāre na bhaume no saṅkrāntau vaidhṛtau viṣṭiṣaṣṭhyoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9041: parvasvaṣṭamyāṃ ca neṣṭaḥ sa iṣṭaḥ proktānmuktvā vāsare sūryasūnoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9043: mohātpratipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kuhūṃ riktāṃ tithiṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9048: tailābhyaṅgaṃ na kurvīta kuryurvā navamīṃ vinā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9050: pañcamī daśamī caiva tṛtīyā ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9057: snāne vā yadi vāsnāne pavkatailaṃ na duṣyati //
GSD36mvir_sau:9063: ghṛtaṃ ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ yattailaṃ puṣpavāsitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9070: yadi nāma caturdaśyāṃ sadā māṃsaṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9072: caturthī cāṣṭamī caiva dvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9074: saṅkrame cāpi sūryasya viṣuve cāpi vārṣike /
GSD36mvir_sau:9075: māṃsāttu virato martyo yāti svargaṃ dinatrayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:9079: yo naraḥ kārttike māsi māṃsaṃ tu perivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9081: kālanirṇayadīpikāyāṃ tu yadi nāma caturdaśyāmiti sthāne yadi nāma ca śarvaryāmiti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9084: viṣṇuḥ--parvasu avaśyaṃ tilahomān kuryādalaṅkṛtastiṣṭhet evamācārasevī syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9097: prājāpatyena brahmacaryakālena ca jāyayā sahaitāṃ rātriṃ sūryācandramasau vasata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9109: ca tatpratipādakaśrutyādipramāṇasyāpi bheda uktastatra karmabhede hetumāhottarārdhena--nānādharmā ityādinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9128: śrutyādīnāmapi bheda iva bhavati na punaḥ śrutyādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā vāstavo bheda ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9129: anayaiva ca diśā evañjātīyakāni vacanāni bodhyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:9147: dvāpare yajñamevāhuḥ kalau dānaṃ dayā damaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9149: tapo dharmaḥ kṛtayuge jñānaṃ tretāyuge sthitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9150: dvāpare cādhvaraḥ proktastiṣye dānaṃ dayā damaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9156: dhyānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ yajanaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9159: jñānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ ca tataḥ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:9160: dvāpare ca tathā yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhā tu kalau yuge //
GSD36mvir_sau:9163: kṛte tu mānavā dharmāstretāyāṃ gautamā matāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9165: tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge ityādyuktaṃ tatra hetumāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:9168: dvāpare rudhire caiva kalau tvannādiṣu sthitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9174: yuge yuge ca ye dharmāstatra tatra ca ye dvijāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9175: teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyā yugarūpā hi te dvijāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9177: kāmakrodhalobhādīn sarvān doṣānkālakṛtān jñātvā kasyāpi nindāṃ na kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9179: jito dharmo hyadharmeṇa satyaṃ caivānṛtena ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:9184: sthitirhi satyaṃ dharmasya tasmātsatyaṃ na lopayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9185: ityādīni vidhiniṣedhāviṣayāṇi śrutismṛtiśāstrāṇyapramāṇīkṛtāni syuriti cet, na /
GSD36mvir_sau:9186: yugānurūpaṃ svasvasāmarthyamālocya mukyakalpenānukalpe na vā nityanaimittikāni karmāṇyanutiṣṭhatā
GSD36mvir_sau:9187: pratiṣiddhāni ca varjayatāṃ pramādakṛtapātakaprāyaścittāni cācaratāmatyantāśaktānāṃ vānindyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9189: evaṃ satyapi vastuto nindyasyāpi svayaṃ doṣānnāviṣkuryāditi teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyetyasyābhiprāya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9201: dvāpare bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kalau devo maheśvaraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9205: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kalirityatra keśavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9209: manuṣyāstu tadā śāntā nirvairāḥ suhṛdaḥ samāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9210: yajante tapasā devaṃ śamena ca damena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:9215: taṃ tadā manujā devaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ harim /
GSD36mvir_sau:9235: puṣkaraṃ tu kṛte sevyaṃ tretāyāṃ naimiṣaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9236: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgāṃ samāśrayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9238: kṛte tu sarvatīrthāni tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:9239: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgā viśiṣyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:9244: dvāpare kulamekaṃ tu karttāraṃ tu kalau yuge //
GSD36mvir_sau:9252: sarvāvasthāṃ gato vāpi yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9253: yastvoṃnamaḥ śivāyeti mucyate tu kalau naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9257: sadā taṃ yajate yastu śraddhayā munipuṅgava/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9263: ye taṃ viprāstu sevante yena kenāpi śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:9272: na hyataḥ paramo lābho dehināṃ bhrāmyatāmiha /
GSD36mvir_sau:9273: yato vindeta paramāṃ śāntiṃ naśyati saṃsṛtiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9278: yadabhyarcya hariṃ bhattyā kṛte varṣaśataṃ nṛpa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9282: ye 'rcayanti narā nityaṃ te 'pi vandyā yathā hariḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9296: ubhe vimuktide plaṃsāṃ prāpte dāvānale kalau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9302: mantrervinā na sidhdyānti prajñāḥ śuddhistu durlabhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9303: kāle kalau viśeṣeṇa śuddhaṃ ghastu na dṛśyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9304: kalau yuge hi tamasā naṣṭadharme bhayaṅkare //
GSD36mvir_sau:9306: vinā gaṅgāṃ dharmamayīṃ gatiḥ syācca kathaṃ kalau /
GSD36mvir_sau:9307: śirasaḥ karttanaṃ tasya prāṇatyāgo 'pi vā varaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9308: samarthastu kalau kāle gaṅgāṃ yo nābhigacchati //
GSD36mvir_sau:9312: anāśritya tu gaṅgāṃ hi muktimicchati yaḥ kalau /
GSD36mvir_sau:9314: vṛthā kulaṃ vṛthā vidyā vṛthā yajñā vṛthā tapaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9315: vṛthā dānāni tasyeha kalau gaṅgāṃ na yāti yaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9321: narāśvamedhau madyaṃ ca kalau varjyaṃ dvijātibhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9324: kalau pañca na kurvīta bhrātṛjāyāṃ kamaṇḍalum //
GSD36mvir_sau:9327: na yajñe govadhaḥ kāryaḥ kalau ca na kamaṇḍaluḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9375: kalau pañca na kurvīta bhrātṛjāyāṃ kamaṇḍalum //
GSD36mvir_sau:9377: akṣatā gopaśuścaiva śrāddhe māṃsaṃ tathā madhu /
GSD36mvir_sau:9402: vaiśākhe dhanadāyī ca jyeṣṭhe mṛtyuprado bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9412: phālgune mārgaśīrṣe ca jyeṣṭhe dīkṣātra madhyamā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9422: na vinā parva dīkṣā syāt varṣāsu madhupauṣayoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9423: anyatra tu sadā kāryā viśuddhau guruśiṣyayoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9425: iti varṣādiniṣiddhakāleṣvapi śubhaśakunādyupalamme sati dakṣikāryetyāha hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9433: pūrṇimā pañcamī caiva dvitīyā saptamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9440: dvitīyā pañcamī caiva ṣaṣṭhī cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9445: paurṇamāsīṃ vinā śeṣā hitā muktau mumukṣubhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9447: saptamyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca ekādaśyāmathāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9451: guṇairyuktā tu saṅgrāhyā guṇairhīnāṃ tu vrajayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9463: tāṃ tāṃ tithiṃ samālocya tadbhaktāṃstatra dīkṣayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9469: dvitīyā ca śriyaḥ proktā pārvatyāstu tṛtīyikā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9470: nityā mārgeṣu pārvatyā aṣṭamī ca caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:9471: caturthī gaṇanāthasya bhānoḥ proktā tu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9476: ādityaṃ maṅgalaṃ sauriṃ tyaktvā vārāstu bhūtaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:9479: ravau gurau site some kartavyaṃ budhaśukrayoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9487: hastaḥ svātiranurādhā maghā mūlaṃ ca revatī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9488: abhijit śravaṇaṃ ce ti śivayoge caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:9512: varīyāṃśca śivaḥ siddho brahmā aindraśca ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:9527: lagnadoṣā grahadoṣāḥ sarve naśyanti vai śubhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:9528: lagnasthe bhārgave prauḍhe kendrasthe vā bṛhaspatau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9530: maumukṣavīṃ pratyayaṃ tu na kālaniyamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9535: tridhā sthāpyātra yaḥ śeṣo yāmasaṅkhyoditā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9536: tridhā sthāpyātra yaḥ śeṣo yāmasahkhyoditā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9539: māsi tasmin tathā yāme kurvīta grahaṇaṃ manoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9544: pṛthakkṛtya tanmadhye siddhasusiddhavarṇānekīkṛtya sādhyavairivarṇān pratyekaṃ daśabhirguṇayitvā
GSD36mvir_sau:9549: tatra tasmin māse śuklapakṣe tasmin dine tasmin prahare mantramupadiśet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9583: tasminkāle yadgurorgṛhītaṃ tat nṛṣu iṣṭaṃ dadātīti sambandhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9605: prayāge śrīgirau kāśyāṃ kālākālau na śodhayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9616: grāme vā yadi vāraṇye kṣetre vā divase niśi //
GSD36mvir_sau:9619: na tithirna jalaṃ homo na snānaṃ na japakriyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9620: dīkṣāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ kintu svecchāvāpte hi sadgurau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9621: iha kecit candragrahe dīkṣā na kāryā jaḍatvaṃ tadā syādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9622: te tu“sattīrthe 'rkavidhugrāse” “candrasūryoparāgeṣu ca” “śaśidivākarayorgrahaṇe” “rāhudarśanaṃ guruparva ca“ityādibahumunivacanavirodhāt anādaraṇīyā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9632: evaṃ grahaṇādikāleṣu uktamāsaśukladvādaśyādiṣu viṣṇudīkṣā kāryā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9638: cakriṇaṃ halinaṃ caiva śārṅgiṇaṃ khaṅginaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9641: ajitaṃ cācyutaṃ caiva sarvaṃ sarveśvaraṃ pṛthum /
GSD36mvir_sau:9643: kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ matsyaṃ vā jalaprataraṇe smaret /
GSD36mvir_sau:9655: vāmanaṃ khaṅginaṃ caiva duḥsvapneṣu ca saṃsmaret //
GSD36mvir_sau:9659: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgale viṣṇuṃ māṅgalyeṣu ca kīrttayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9677: tāmāśiṣamāśāse taṃ tave jyotiṣmatīmiti brūyādyadyasya putro jātaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9679: evaṃ ca upalakṣyavayovasthāviśeṣaṇībhūtavayasa ādhānakālatvaṃ sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9682: vivāho vyākhyāto 'trāgnyādheyasya kālo yathāśraddhamata ūrddhaṃ jīvati pitaryagnīnādadhīteti baudhāyanaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9685: jīvati pitarīti pakṣe caupāsanaṃ dhārayato na pratyavāya ityuktaṃ baudhāyanenaiva--“na durbrāhmaṇo bhavatyaupāsanaṃ dhārayamāṇa“iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9686: eṣa traivarṇikasādhāraṇaḥ kālo 'dhunā varṇāviśeṣapuraṣkāreṇa ṛtuviśeṣā vivicyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:9691: rathakāro na“māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyāṃ tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate“iti yājñabalkyokto jātiviśeṣaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9693: āpastambastu--vasanto brāhmaṇasya grīṣmo rājanyasya hemanto vā śaradvaiśyasya varṣāsu rathakārasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:9694: ye trayāṇāṃ varṇānāmetatkarma kuryusteṣā meṣa kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9697: ye brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyāḥ eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ madhye etatkarma rathakarma kuryusteṣāmeṣa kāla iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:9698: evaṃ ca rathakāro na jātiviśeṣaḥ kintu traivarṇiṃka eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9700: baudhāyanaḥ--yadaivainaṃ śraddhopanamedathādadhīta saivāsyarddhiḥ tadetadārttasyātivelaṃ vā śraddhāyuktasyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9704: kātyāyanena--vasanto brāhmaṇabrahmavarcasakāmayoḥ grīṣmaḥ kṣatriyaśrīkāmayoḥ varṣāḥ prajāpaśukāmavaiśyarathakṛtāmiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9705: etena brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ kāmyā anye 'pi kālā iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:9708: saurā api mīnameṣau meṣavṛṣau vetyādibhedena dvividhā ityapi coktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9709: evaṃ ca caitravaiśākhajyeṣṭhāstathā pūrvodāhṛtāt“śiśiraḥ sārvavarṇika“ityetasmānmāghaphālgunau ca militvā pañca māsā brāhmaṇasyādhānakāla iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:9713: tathā phālgunīpūrṇamāsa ādadhītetyuktvā dvyahe puraikāhe veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9718: baudhāyanasaktu-yā vaiśākhyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭādamāvāsyā bhavati sā sakṛtsavaṃtsarasya rohiṇyā sampadyate tasyāmādadhīteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9720: satyāṣāḍhastu--ādadhītetyupakramya--āmāvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmāpūryamāṇapakṣe vā puṇye nakṣatre 'tra yattrīṇi nipatanti tatsamūham /
GSD36mvir_sau:9726: tatra kātyāyanaḥ--kṛttikārohiṇīmṛgaśiraḥ phalgunīṣu hasto lābha kāmasya citrā ceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9728: āśvalāyanaḥ-agnyādheyaṃ kṛttikāsu rohiṇyāṃ mṛgaśirasi phalgunīṣu viśākhayoruttarayoḥ prauṣṭhapadayoreteṣāmekasmin kasmiṃścit /
GSD36mvir_sau:9729: āpastambastu--kṛttikāsu brāhmaṇa ādadhīta mukhyo brhanavarcasī bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9732: mṛgaśīrṣe brahmavarcasakāmo yajñakāmo vā yaḥ purābhadraḥ sanpāpīyān syātsa punarvasvorādadhīta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9736: etadeva viparītamathāparaṃ pūrvayorādhāya pāpīyān bhavati uttarayorvaśīyān haste
GSD36mvir_sau:9737: yaḥ kāmayeta prame dīyeteti citrāyāṃ rājanyo bhrātṛvyavān viśākhayoḥ prajākāmo 'nurādhe
GSD36mvir_sau:9738: vṛddhikāmaḥ uttareṣu prauṣṭhapadeṣu pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ sarvāṇi nityavadeke samāmananti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9744: atra akāmyamānamapi aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhavati vastu sāmarthyāt“yo brāhmaṇāyāvaguret itivat /
GSD36mvir_sau:9754: yaḥ sarvakarmabhyo 'gnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ somameva kartumicchati sa ṛtuṃ nakṣatraṃ ca na sūrkṣetaunādriyeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9757: rudradattena tu nakṣatragrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārthamiti na parvādara iti uktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9760: nādyaḥ, prakaraṇādādhānakālamātrabādho yukto na somasya tasyāprakṛtatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9761: kiñca na hi some āpastambena nakṣatrāṇyuktāni yena kathañcidbuddhisthatāmātreṇa bādha ucyeteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9763: evaṃ sati atra vākye brāhmaṇaṃ prati ṛtvanādarakathanamanarthaṃ syāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:9765: na ca vasantastadānīṃ somāṅgameva nādhānāṅgamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9769: kiñca utkarṣādbrāhmaṇasya somaḥ syādityantarāgarbhiṇyadhikaraṇe“somena yakṣyamāṇa“ityatra darśapūrṇamāsottarakālatārūpaḥ somakāla ādhānasomayorekāhasambandhena bādhyata ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9770: tattulyanyāye nātrāpi vasantānādareṇa kālāntare ādhāne kriyamāṇe somādhānayorekāhasambandhārthaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:9771: somasyāpyṛturbādhyata eva tasmānna somakālamātrasya na vādhānakālamātrasya bādhaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:9778: ata eva“yadaivainaṃ yajña upanamedathādadhīta“iti bhāradvājena nakṣatrādyanādara ukto yakṣyamāṇatvābhisandhimata iti na kiñcidanupapannam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9779: uttarāyaṇaṃ sarvamādhānakāla ityuktamācāryairityuktaṃ baudhāyanabhāṣye keśavasvā minā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9782: apare tu smārttatvenāsya smārttādhāna evopasaṃhāro na śrautādhāna iti vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9783: etacca malamāsādiṣu tathā guruśukramauḍhyādiṣu na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9790: ayanam ayanaṃ pratīti pratyayanaṃ pratidakṣiṇāyanaṃ pratyuttarāyaṇaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9796: āpastambaḥ--saṃvatsare saṃvatsare yajeta ṣaṭsu ṣaṭūsu vā māseṣvityeke /
GSD36mvir_sau:9799: tena varṣāntare ādhānadivasa ityartha ityeke bhāṣyakṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9801: “upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī“ityanuśāsanāt saṃvatsarasyaivādhikaraṇatve tatra ca kadetyapekṣite ṛtuvyāvṛttāvityekaḥ suvayasa ityapara iti kāladvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9802: ṛtuvyāvṛttau = rsavatsaramadhye yasmin kasmiṃścit ṛtuvyāvṛttidina ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9804: bhāṣyakāramate ṛtuvyāvṛttau pratiṛtuvyāvṛttāvevaṃ saṃvatsare ṣaṭ iti pakṣāntaraṃ suyavasa iti ca pakṣāntaraṃ svatantrameva saṃvatsarapakṣāditi
GSD36mvir_sau:9805: ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣu iti ca pakṣāntaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:9807: keṣāṃcinmate tu ṣaṇmāse ityetatpakṣe āvṛttimukha iti yojayanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9808: evaṃ ca bhāṣyakāramate pratisaṃvatsaramādhānadina ityekaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9814: keṣācinmate tu saṃvatsare saṃvatsare iti pakṣe yasmin kasmiṃścidṛtāvekaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9816: ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣ iti pakṣe ca āvṛttimukha iti tṛtīya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9819: kātyāyano 'pi kāladvayamāha--paśvijyā saṃvatsare saṃvatsare prāvṛṣi āvṛttimukhayorveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9820: kālāntaramāha baudhāyanaḥ-paśubandhena yajetetyupakramya āmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9822: apare tu śuklapakṣaḥ sampūrṇa iti āhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9824: athavā na kṣīyate candramā asminniti nakṣatraṃ paurṇamāsītyartha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9825: etanmate paurṇamāsyāṃ darśapaurṇamāsa prayogārambhātpaurṇamāsīmārabhya darśaparyantaṃ na karmāntarārambhaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9828: ādhānadivasātsaṃvatsaramadhye yasmin kasmiṃścitparvaṇi paśuḥ kārya iti ṣaṣṭhaṃ kālamāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:9829: eṣa ca puśurnityaḥ“saṃvatsare saṃvatsare“iti pratyayanamiti ca vīpsāśravāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:9833: tatra cāturmāsyāni kartavyānītyuktaṃ yājñabalkyena--cāturmāsyāni caiva hīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9842: eteṣāṃ prayogāṇāṃ bhede ca pramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇatattatkālavidhita evāvaseyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9846: tatra sāṃvatsarikaprayoge ṛtuyājikalpe vaiśvadevādikāla ukta āpastambena /
GSD36mvir_sau:9847: vasante vaiśvadevena yajate prāvṛṣi varuṇapraghāsaiḥ śaradi sākamedhairiti vijñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9848: atra triṣu parvasu niyataḥ kāla uktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9849: śunāsīrīye tu ṛtuyājisaṃjñānurodhācchiśira eva grāhya iti pratibhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9852: anekeṣu kāleṣu satsvapi“ityanena bhāradvājavacanenoktasya tasyābādhenaivopapattau bādhakalpanāyogāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9853: cāturmāsyayājikalpe tathā yāvajjīvaprayoge 'pi kāla uktenaiva yaścaturṣu caturṣu māseṣu yajate sa cāturmāsyayājī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9854: tatrāpi niyamamāha-phālgunyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ caitryāṃ vā vaiśvadevena yajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9855: tataścaturṣu māseṣu āṣāḍhyāṃ vā śrāvaṇyāṃ varuṇapraghāsairyajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9856: tataścaturṣu māseṣu pūrvasmin parvaṇyupakramya dvyahaṃ sākamedhairyajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9857: tato dvyahetryahe caturahe 'rddhamāse māli caturṣu vā māseṣu śunāsīrīyairiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9861: ṛtuyājipakṣādayameva bhedo yadṛtuyāji pakṣe vasantānte vaiśvadevairiṣṭvā prāvṛḍādyaparvaṇi varuṇapraghāsānuṣṭhānamapi sambhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9862: cāturmāsyayājipakṣe caturṣu caturṣu ca māseṣviti niyama iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9864: tatra bhāradvājaḥ--dvādaśāhāni yakṣyamāṇaḥ pratipadi vaiśvānarapārjanyābhyāṃ dvitīye
GSD36mvir_sau:9865: vaiśvadevena tṛtīye caturthe voparamya pañcame varuṇapraghāsaiḥ ṣaṣṭhe saptame voparamyāṣṭame
GSD36mvir_sau:9866: navame vā sākamedhairdaśame ekādaśe voparamya dvādaśe śunāsīrīyayā,
GSD36mvir_sau:9867: trayodaśe paśuriti saṃvatsarapratimā vai dvādaśa rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarameva yajeteti vijñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9868: trayodaśe paśuriti yadi paśunā samāptistatpakṣe bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9869: atra dvitīyādipadāni dvitīyāditithiparāṇi pratipadīti upakramāt spaṣṭe coktaṃ baudhāyanena--
GSD36mvir_sau:9870: dvādaśāhe 'pi cāturmāsyairyajetātha prathamāyāṃ vaiśvadeveneṣṭvā caturthyāṃ varuṇapraghāsairaṣṭamyāṃ navamyāṃ ca sākamedheḥ dvādaśyāṃ śunāsīrīyaiḥ puruṣo yajeteti vijñāyata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9872: nakṣatre prayoga ityeka āhurūdagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇyāhe prayuñjīteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9873: atra pakṣe āpūryamāṇasya pakṣasya puṇyanakṣatre upakramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9877: kathamu khalu yāvajjīvaprayuktānāṃ cāturmāsyānāmanuprayogo bhavatīti phālgunyāṃ vā
GSD36mvir_sau:9878: caitryāṃ vā paurṇamāsyāṃ śunāsīrīyapuruṣo ya jetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset vaiśvadeveneṣṭvā
GSD36mvir_sau:9879: paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyāṃ yajetātha cediṣṭayā paśunā somena vā yajeta kathaṃ tatra
GSD36mvir_sau:9880: kuryāditi pratikṛṣyaitasya pakṣasya śunāsīrīyapuruṣo yajetaiṣāmekena yajetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset
GSD36mvir_sau:9882: atho etadbaudhāyanasya pakṣaṃ vedayante yāvjajīvikānyeva cāturmāsyāni syuriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9884: atra yadā phālgunyāṃ pūrvasaṃvatsare upakramastadā phālgunyāṃ yadā caitryāmupakramastadā caitryāmiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9885: atha cediṣṭhyeti yadi prayogasamāptyarthaṃ iṣṭyādi kriyate tadāyaṃ kramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9887: atho etadbaudhāyanasyetyādyuttyā ca yāvajjīvikaprayogo 'pi pākṣiko bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9890: yathāprayogamiti yāvatā kālena prayogasamāptirbhavati tāvati kāle santataṃ pūrvāhnādau kuryāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:9893: na hi yathāprayogamityanena cāturmāsyakālavidhānaṃ kintu brahmacaryakālasya niyamaḥ prayogadinamitaiva vratacaryeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9896: yāvajjīvaprayuktānyeva cāturmāsyāni syurantaramithunāni prathame tveva saṃvatsare vrataṃ caredityatrohasmāha śālākiḥ sāṃvatsarikānyeva cāturmāsyāni brahmacaryavantīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9901: śālikimate tu sāṃvatsarikeṣve vāyaṃ niyamo na yāvajjīvikeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:9903: apare tu māstu yathāprayogamityataḥ santatakaraṇaṃ tathāpi“udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe samastāni“iti bhāradvājavacanātsamastānāṃ saṃlagnānāṃ prayoga iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9908: ayamapi darśapaurṇamāsottaraṃ kartavya ityuktaṃ“darśapaurṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeteti vacanāt /
